276 void PlayerBase()

280
281 void Init()
282 {
283 //Print("PSOVIS: new player");
284 //PrintString( "isServer " + GetGame().IsServer().ToString() );
285 //PrintString( "isClient " + GetGame().IsClient().ToString() );
286 //PrintString( "isMultiplayer " + GetGame().IsMultiplayer().ToString() );
287 SetEventMask(EntityEvent.INIT|EntityEvent.POSTFRAME|EntityEvent.FRAME);
288 //m_Agents = new array<int>; //transmission agents
289 m_StoreLoadVersion = 0;
290 m_IsCraftingReady = false;
291 m_Recipes = new array<int>;
292 m_LastShavedSeconds = 0;
293 m_BloodType = 0;
294 m_HasBloodTypeVisible = false;
295 m_LifeSpanState = 0;
296 m_LifespanLevelLocal = -1;
297 m_CorpseState = 0;
298 m_CorpseStateLocal = 0;
299 m_HasBloodyHandsVisible = 0;
300 m_PlayerLoaded = false;
301 m_PlayerSelected = false;
302 m_ProcessUIWarning = false;
303 m_FlagRaisingTendency = true;
304 m_LiquidTendencyDrain = false;
305 m_UAParamMessage = new Param1<string>("");
306 m_UnconParam = new Param1<float>(0);
307 m_DeathDarkeningParam = new Param1<float>(0);
308 m_UAParam = new Param2<int,int>(0,0);
309 m_UAProgressParam = new Param2<float,float>(0,0);
310 m_QuickBarBase = new QuickBarBase(this);
311 m_QuickBarBonus = Math.Max(ConfigGetInt("quickBarBonus"), 0);
312 m_CargoLoad = 0;
313 m_VisibilityCoef = 1.0;
314 m_Hud = GetGame().GetMission().GetHud();
315 m_RecipePick = 0;
316 m_ActionQBControl = false;
317 m_QuickBarHold = false;
318 m_HideHairAnimated = true;
319 m_WorkingNVGHeadset = false;
320 m_LoweredNVGHeadset = false;
321 m_AreHandsLocked = false;
322 m_ItemsToDelete = new array<EntityAI>;
323 m_AnimCommandStarting = HumanMoveCommandID.None;
324 m_EmptyGloves = new HiddenSelectionsData(ConfigGetString("emptyGloves"));
325 m_CanDisplayHitEffectPPE = true;
326
327 #ifdef DEVELOPER
328 m_CanBeTargetedDebug = true;
329 //RegisterNetSyncVariableBool("m_CanBeTargetedDebug");
330 #endif
331
332 m_AnalyticsTimer = new Timer( CALL_CATEGORY_SYSTEM );
333
334 m_StaminaHandler = new StaminaHandler(this);//current stamina calculation
335 m_InjuryHandler = new InjuryAnimationHandler(this);
336 m_ShockHandler = new ShockHandler(this); //New shock handler
337 m_HCAnimHandler = new HeatComfortAnimHandler(this);
338 m_PlayerStats = new PlayerStats(this);//player stats
339 if( GetGame().IsServer() )
340 {
341 m_PlayerStomach = new PlayerStomach(this);
342 m_NotifiersManager = new NotifiersManager(this); // player notifiers
343 m_AgentPool = new PlayerAgentPool(this); // agent pool manager
344 m_BleedingManagerServer = new BleedingSourcesManagerServer(this);
345 m_Environment = new Environment(this);//environment effects on player
346 m_ModifiersManager = new ModifiersManager(this); // player modifiers
347 m_PlayerSoundManagerServer = new PlayerSoundManagerServer(this);
348 m_VirtualHud = new VirtualHud(this);
349
350 m_AdminLog = PluginAdminLog.Cast( GetPlugin(PluginAdminLog) );
351 }
352
353 m_SymptomManager = new SymptomManager(this); // state manager
354 m_ModuleRecipesManager = PluginRecipesManager.Cast(GetPlugin(PluginRecipesManager));
355
356 m_TrasferValues = new TransferValues(this);
357 m_EmoteManager = new EmoteManager(this);
358 m_SoftSkillsManager = new SoftSkillsManager(this);//Soft Skills calculation
359
360 m_WeaponManager = new WeaponManager(this);
361 m_DebugMonitorValues = new DebugMonitorValues(this);
362 m_RGSManager = new RandomGeneratorSyncManager(this);
363
364 if( !GetGame().IsDedicatedServer() )
365 {
366 m_MeleeDebug = false;
367 m_UALastMessage = "";
368 m_UALastMessageTimer = new Timer;
369 m_InventoryActionHandler = new InventoryActionHandler(this);
370 m_BleedingManagerRemote = new BleedingSourcesManagerRemote(this);
371 m_PlayerSoundManagerClient = new PlayerSoundManagerClient(this);
372 m_StanceIndicator = new StanceIndicator(this);
373 m_ActionsInitialize = false;
374 ClientData.AddPlayerBase( this );
375
376 m_ProcessAddEffectWidgets = new array<int>;
377 m_ProcessRemoveEffectWidgets = new array<int>;
378 m_ActiveNVTypes = new array<int>;
379 m_ProcessAddGlassesEffects = new array<int>;
380 m_ProcessRemoveGlassesEffects = new array<int>;
381 }
382
383 m_ActionManager = NULL;
384 //m_PlayerLightManager = NULL;
385 //m_VehicleManager = new VehicleManager(this,m_ActionManager);
386
387 m_ConfigEmotesProfile = PluginConfigEmotesProfile.Cast( GetPlugin(PluginConfigEmotesProfile) );
388
389 if ( GetDayZGame().IsDebug() )
390 {
391 PluginConfigDebugProfileFixed m_ConfigDebugProfileFixed = PluginConfigDebugProfileFixed.Cast( GetPlugin(PluginConfigDebugProfileFixed) );
392 PluginConfigDebugProfile m_ConfigDebugProfile = PluginConfigDebugProfile.Cast( GetPlugin(PluginConfigDebugProfile) );
393 PluginDeveloper m_Developer = PluginDeveloper.Cast( GetPlugin(PluginDeveloper) );
394
395 PlayerBase player = this;
396
397 if( m_ConfigDebugProfile )
398 {
399 string default_preset = m_ConfigDebugProfile.GetDefaultPreset();
400 if ( player && default_preset != "" )
401 {
402 TStringArray preset_array = new TStringArray;
403 m_ConfigDebugProfileFixed.GetPresetItems( default_preset, preset_array );
404
405 bool is_preset_fixed = true;
406 if ( preset_array.Count() == 0 )
407 {
408 m_ConfigDebugProfile.GetPresetItems( default_preset, preset_array );
409 is_preset_fixed = false;
410 }
411
412 if ( preset_array.Count() > 0 )
413 {
414 m_Developer.ClearInventory(player);
415
416 for (int i = 0; i < preset_array.Count(); i++)
417 {
418 float health = -1;
419 int quantity = -1;
420 if ( is_preset_fixed )
421 {
422 health = m_ConfigDebugProfileFixed.GetItemHealth( default_preset, i );
423 quantity = m_ConfigDebugProfileFixed.GetItemQuantity( default_preset, i );
424 }
425 else
426 {
427 health = m_ConfigDebugProfile.GetItemHealth( default_preset, i );
428 quantity = m_ConfigDebugProfile.GetItemQuantity( default_preset, i );
429 }
430 m_Developer.SpawnEntityInInventory(player, preset_array.Get(i), health, quantity );
431 }
432 }
433 }
434 }
435 }
436
437 m_MapNavigationBehaviour = new MapNavigationBehaviour(this);
438
439 m_ModulePlayerStatus = PluginPlayerStatus.Cast( GetPlugin(PluginPlayerStatus) );
440 m_ModuleLifespan = PluginLifespan.Cast( GetPlugin( PluginLifespan ) );
441
442 m_BleedingSourcesLow = new array<string>;
443 m_BleedingSourcesLow.Insert("RightToeBase");
444 m_BleedingSourcesLow.Insert("RightFoot");
445 m_BleedingSourcesLow.Insert("LeftToeBase");
446 m_BleedingSourcesLow.Insert("LeftFoot");
447 m_BleedingSourcesLow.Insert("RightUpLegRoll");
448 m_BleedingSourcesLow.Insert("RightUpLeg");
449 m_BleedingSourcesLow.Insert("RightLegRoll");
450 m_BleedingSourcesLow.Insert("RightLeg");
451 m_BleedingSourcesLow.Insert("LeftUpLegRoll");
452 m_BleedingSourcesLow.Insert("LeftUpLeg");
453 m_BleedingSourcesLow.Insert("LeftLegRoll");
454 m_BleedingSourcesLow.Insert("LeftLeg");
455
456 m_BleedingSourcesUp = new array<string>;
457 m_BleedingSourcesUp.Insert("RightForeArmRoll");
458 m_BleedingSourcesUp.Insert("LeftForeArmRoll");
459 m_BleedingSourcesUp.Insert("RightForeArm");
460 m_BleedingSourcesUp.Insert("RightArmRoll");
461 m_BleedingSourcesUp.Insert("RightArm");
462 m_BleedingSourcesUp.Insert("RightShoulder");
463 m_BleedingSourcesUp.Insert("LeftForeArm");
464 m_BleedingSourcesUp.Insert("LeftArmRoll");
465 m_BleedingSourcesUp.Insert("LeftArm");
466 m_BleedingSourcesUp.Insert("LeftShoulder");
467 m_BleedingSourcesUp.Insert("Spine3");
468 m_BleedingSourcesUp.Insert("Spine2");
469 m_BleedingSourcesUp.Insert("Spine1");

474 RegisterNetSyncVariableInt("m_LifeSpanState", LifeSpanState.BEARD_NONE, LifeSpanState.COUNT);
475 RegisterNetSyncVariableInt("m_BloodType", 0, 128);
476 RegisterNetSyncVariableInt("m_ShockSimplified",0, SIMPLIFIED_SHOCK_CAP);
477 RegisterNetSyncVariableInt("m_SoundEvent",0, EPlayerSoundEventID.ENUM_COUNT - 1);
478 RegisterNetSyncVariableInt("m_SoundEventParam", 0, ((EPlayerSoundEventParam.ENUM_COUNT - 1) * 2) - 1);
479 RegisterNetSyncVariableInt("m_StaminaState",0, eStaminaState.COUNT - 1);
480 RegisterNetSyncVariableInt("m_BleedingBits");
481 RegisterNetSyncVariableInt("m_Shakes", 0, SHAKE_LEVEL_MAX);
482 RegisterNetSyncVariableInt("m_BreathVapour", 0, BREATH_VAPOUR_LEVEL_MAX);
483 RegisterNetSyncVariableInt("m_HealthLevel", eInjuryHandlerLevels.PRISTINE, eInjuryHandlerLevels.RUINED);
484 RegisterNetSyncVariableInt("m_MixedSoundStates", 0, eMixedSoundStates.COUNT - 1);
485 RegisterNetSyncVariableInt("m_CorpseState",-PlayerConstants.CORPSE_STATE_DECAYED,PlayerConstants.CORPSE_STATE_DECAYED);//do note the negative min, negative sign denotes a special meaning
486 RegisterNetSyncVariableInt("m_RefreshAnimStateIdx",0,3);
487 RegisterNetSyncVariableInt("m_BrokenLegState", -eBrokenLegs.BROKEN_LEGS_SPLINT, eBrokenLegs.BROKEN_LEGS_SPLINT);
488 RegisterNetSyncVariableInt("m_SyncedModifiers", 0, ((eModifierSyncIDs.LAST_INDEX - 1) * 2) - 1);
489 RegisterNetSyncVariableInt("m_HasBloodyHandsVisible", 0, eBloodyHandsTypes.LAST_INDEX - 1);
490
491 RegisterNetSyncVariableBool("m_IsUnconscious");
492 RegisterNetSyncVariableBool("m_IsRestrained");
493 RegisterNetSyncVariableBool("m_IsInWater");
494
495 RegisterNetSyncVariableBool("m_HasBloodTypeVisible");
496 //RegisterNetSyncVariableBool("m_LiquidTendencyDrain");
497 RegisterNetSyncVariableBool("m_IsRestrainStarted");
498 RegisterNetSyncVariableBool("m_IsRestrainPrelocked");
499 //RegisterNetSyncVariableBool("m_CanPlayBrokenLegSound"); //Temporary
500 RegisterNetSyncVariableBool("m_HasHeatBuffer");
501
502 RegisterNetSyncVariableFloat("m_CurrentShock"); //Register shock synchronized variable
503
504 m_OriginalSlidePoseAngle = GetSlidePoseAngle();
505
507 m_DefaultHitPosition = SetDefaultHitPosition(GetDayZPlayerType().GetDefaultHitPositionComponent());
508
509 m_DecayedTexture = ConfigGetString("decayedTexture");
510 m_FliesIndex = -1;
511 GetGame().GetCallQueue(CALL_CATEGORY_SYSTEM).Call(this.OnPlayerLoaded);
512 }
513
514 void IncreaseAntibioticsCount()
515 {
516 m_AntibioticsActive++;
517 }
518
519 void DecreaseAntibioticsCount()
520 {
521 m_AntibioticsActive--;
522 if(m_AntibioticsActive < 0)
523 {
524 m_AntibioticsActive = 0;
525 Error("DecreaseAntibioticsCount called more times than IncreaseAntibioticsCount (should be equal) - check your code, forcing clamp to 0");
526 }
527 }
528
529 bool IsAntibioticsActive()
530 {
531 return (m_AntibioticsActive > 0);
532 }
533
534
535
537 ItemBase GetItemOnSlot(string slot_type)
538 {
539 int slot_id = InventorySlots.GetSlotIdFromString( slot_type );
540 EntityAI item_EAI = this.GetInventory().FindAttachment( slot_id );
541 ItemBase item_IB = ItemBase.Cast(item_EAI);
542
543 if (item_EAI && !item_IB)
544 {
545 string str = "Warning! GetItemOnSlot() >> found item on slot " + slot_type + " can't be cast to ItemBase! Found item is " + item_EAI.GetType() + " and the player is " + GetType() + "!";
546 Error(str);
547 return null;
548 }
549
550 return item_IB;
551 }
552
554 ItemBase GetItemOnHead()
555 {
556 return GetItemOnSlot("Headgear");
557 }
558
559 override int GetQuickBarBonus()
560 {
561 return m_QuickBarBonus;
562 }
563
564 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------
565 // Inventory overrides
566 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------
567 override bool CanDropEntity (notnull EntityAI item)
568 {
569 if( GetInventory().HasInventoryReservation( item, null ) )
570 {
571 return false;
572 }
573
574 if( IsRestrained() )
575 {
576 if( GetHumanInventory().GetEntityInHands() == item )
577 return false;
578 }
579
580 return true;
581 }
582
583 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------
584 // PLAYER DAMAGE EVENT HANDLING
585 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------
586
587 int GetBreathVapourLevel()
588 {
589 return m_BreathVapour;
590 }
591
592 // adds state to and syncs sound states variable which is used to generate sound client-side
593 void UnsetMixedSoundState(eMixedSoundStates state)
594 {
595 int bit_mask_remove = ~state;
596
597 eMixedSoundStates new_states = m_MixedSoundStates & bit_mask_remove;
598
599 if(new_states != m_MixedSoundStates)
600 {
601 m_MixedSoundStates = new_states;
602 SetSynchDirty();
603 }
604 }
605
606 // adds state to and syncs sound states variable which is used to generate sound client-side
607 void SetMixedSoundState(eMixedSoundStates state)
608 {
609 eMixedSoundStates new_states = m_MixedSoundStates | state;
610
611 if(new_states != m_MixedSoundStates)
612 {
613 m_MixedSoundStates = new_states;
614 SetSynchDirty();
615 }
616 }
617
618 override bool IsPlayer()
619 {
620 return true;
621 }
622
623 bool IsBleeding()
624 {
625 return (m_BleedingBits != 0 );
626 }
627
628 void SetBleedingBits(int bits)
629 {
630 if( m_BleedingBits != bits )
631 {
632 if( m_BleedingBits == 0 )
633 {
634 OnBleedingBegin();
635 }
636 else if( bits == 0 )
637 {
638 OnBleedingEnd();
639 }
640 }
641 m_BleedingBits = bits;
642 SetSynchDirty();
643 }
644
645 int GetBleedingBits()
646 {
647 return m_BleedingBits;
648 }
649
650 void IncreaseDiseaseCount()
651 {
652 m_DiseaseCount++;
653 }
654
655 void DecreaseDiseaseCount()
656 {
657 m_DiseaseCount--;
658 }
659
660 void IncreaseHealingsCount()
661 {
662 m_HealingsCount++;
663 }
664
665 void DecreaseHealingsCount()
666 {
667 m_HealingsCount--;
668 }
669
670
671 bool HasHealings()
672 {
673 return m_HealingsCount;//0 for no healings, 1+ for healings, gets truncated to 1
674 }
675
676 bool HasDisease()
677 {
678 return m_DiseaseCount;//0 for no disease, 1+ for disease, gets truncated to 1
679 }
680
681
682 EPulseType GetPulseType()
683 {
684 return m_PulseType;
685 }
686
687 void SetPulseType(EPulseType pulse_type)
688 {
689 m_PulseType = pulse_type;
690 }
691
692 void QueueAddEffectWidget(array<int> effects)
693 {
694 m_ProcessAddEffectWidgets.InsertArray(effects);
695 }
696
697 void QueueRemoveEffectWidget(array<int> effects)
698 {
699 m_ProcessRemoveEffectWidgets.InsertArray(effects);
700 }
701
702 void QueueAddGlassesEffect(int id)
703 {
704 m_ProcessAddGlassesEffects.Insert(id);
705 }
706
707 void QueueRemoveGlassesEffect(int id)
708 {
709 m_ProcessRemoveGlassesEffects.Insert(id);
710 }
711
712 DamageDealtEffect GetDamageDealtEffect()
713 {
714 return m_DamageDealtEffect;
715 }
716
717 override void SpawnDamageDealtEffect()
718 {
719 if (m_DamageDealtEffect)
720 {
721 delete m_DamageDealtEffect;
722 }
723
724 if (m_CanDisplayHitEffectPPE)
725 {
726 m_DamageDealtEffect = new DamageDealtEffect();
727 }
728 }
729
730 void SpawnDamageDealtEffect2(Param param1 = null, Param param2 = null)
731 {
732 if (m_EffectRadial)
733 {
734 delete m_EffectRadial;
735 }
736
737 m_EffectRadial = new EffectRadial(param1,param2);
738 }
739
740 FlashbangEffect GetFlashbangEffect()
741 {
742 return m_FlashbangEffect;
743 }
744
745 void SpawnFlashbangEffect(PlayerBase player, bool visual)
746 {
747 if (m_FlashbangEffect)
748 {
749 m_FlashbangEffect.Stop();
750 delete m_FlashbangEffect;
751 }
752
753 m_FlashbangEffect = new FlashbangEffect(player, visual);
754 }
755
756 ShockDealtEffect GetShockEffect()
757 {
758 return m_ShockDealtEffect;
759 }
760
761 void SpawnShockEffect(float intensity_max)
762 {
763 if (m_ShockDealtEffect)
764 {
765 delete m_ShockDealtEffect;
766 }
767
768 m_ShockDealtEffect = new ShockDealtEffect(intensity_max);
769 }
770
771 override void EEKilled( Object killer )
772 {
773 //Print(Object.GetDebugName(this) + " STS=" + GetSimulationTimeStamp() + " event EEKilled, player has died at STS=" + GetSimulationTimeStamp());
774
775 if ( m_AdminLog )
776 {
777 m_AdminLog.PlayerKilled( this, killer );
778 }
779
780 if (GetBleedingManagerServer())
781 delete GetBleedingManagerServer();
782
783 if (GetModifiersManager())
784 GetModifiersManager().DeactivateAllModifiers();
785
786 // kill character in database
787 if (GetHive())
788 {
789 GetHive().CharacterKill(this);
790 }
791
792 // disable voice communication
793 GetGame().EnableVoN(this, false);
794 if( !GetGame().IsDedicatedServer() )
795 ClientData.RemovePlayerBase( this );
796 GetSymptomManager().OnPlayerKilled();
797
798 if ( GetEconomyProfile() && !m_CorpseProcessing && m_CorpseState == 0 && GetGame().GetMission().InsertCorpse(this) )
799 {
800 m_CorpseProcessing = true;
801 //Print("EEKilled - processing corpse");
802 }
803
804 if ( GetGame().IsMultiplayer() && GetGame().IsServer() )
805 {
806 if (GetGame().GetMission())
807 {
808 GetGame().GetMission().SyncRespawnModeInfo(GetIdentity());
809 }
810 }
811
812 super.EEKilled( killer );
813 }
814
815 override void EEHitBy(TotalDamageResult damageResult, int damageType, EntityAI source, int component, string dmgZone, string ammo, vector modelPos, float speedCoef)
816 {
817 super.EEHitBy(damageResult, damageType, source, component, dmgZone, ammo, modelPos, speedCoef);
818
819 if( m_AdminLog )
820 {
821 m_AdminLog.PlayerHitBy( damageResult, damageType, this, source, component, dmgZone, ammo );
822 }
823
824 if( damageResult != null && damageResult.GetDamage(dmgZone, "Shock") > 0)
825 {
826 m_LastShockHitTime = GetGame().GetTime();
827
828 if(!IsUnconscious())
829 {
830 if(GetGame().ConfigIsExisting("cfgAmmo " + ammo + " unconRefillModifier"))
831 {
832 m_UnconRefillModifier = GetGame().ConfigGetInt("cfgAmmo " + ammo + " unconRefillModifier");
833 }
834 else
835 {
836 m_UnconRefillModifier = 1;
837 }
838 }
839 }
840
842 if( damageType == DT_EXPLOSION && ammo == "FlashGrenade_Ammo" )
843 {
844 GetStaminaHandler().DepleteStamina(EStaminaModifiers.OVERALL_DRAIN);
845 }
846
847 //new bleeding computation
848 //---------------------------------------
849 if( damageResult != null && GetBleedingManagerServer() )
850 {
851 float dmg = damageResult.GetDamage(dmgZone, "Blood");
852 GetBleedingManagerServer().ProcessHit(dmg, source, component, dmgZone, ammo, modelPos);
853 }
854 //---------------------------------------
855
856 #ifdef DEVELOPER
857 if (DiagMenu.GetBool(DiagMenuIDs.DM_MELEE_DEBUG_ENABLE))
858 Print("EEHitBy() | " + GetDisplayName() + " hit by " + source.GetDisplayName() + " to " + dmgZone);
859
860 PluginRemotePlayerDebugServer plugin_remote_server = PluginRemotePlayerDebugServer.Cast( GetPlugin(PluginRemotePlayerDebugServer) );
861 if(plugin_remote_server)
862 {
863 plugin_remote_server.OnDamageEvent(this, damageResult);
864 }
865 #endif
866 if( GetGame().IsDebugMonitor() )
867 m_DebugMonitorValues.SetLastDamage(source.GetDisplayName());
868
869 if( m_ActionManager )
870 m_ActionManager.Interrupt();
871
872 if ( ammo.ToType().IsInherited(Nonlethal_Base) )
873 {
874 //Print("PlayerBase | EEHitBy | nonlethal hit");
875 AddHealth("","Health",-ConvertNonlethalDamage(damageResult.GetDamage(dmgZone,"Shock")));
876 if (dmgZone != "Head")
877 AddHealth(dmgZone,"Health",-damageResult.GetDamage(dmgZone,"Shock")); //Also deal damage to zone health, no dmg reduction
878 }
879
880 if (GetGame().IsServer())
881 {
882 if ( GetHealth("RightLeg", "Health") <= 1 || GetHealth("LeftLeg", "Health") <= 1 || GetHealth("RightFoot", "Health") <= 1 || GetHealth("LeftFoot", "Health") <= 1 )
883 {
884 if ( GetModifiersManager().IsModifierActive( eModifiers.MDF_BROKEN_LEGS ) )//effectively resets the modifier
885 {
886 GetModifiersManager().DeactivateModifier( eModifiers.MDF_BROKEN_LEGS );
887 }
888 GetModifiersManager().ActivateModifier( eModifiers.MDF_BROKEN_LEGS );
889 }
890 }
891
892 //m_ShockHandler.SetShock(damageResult.GetDamage("", "Shock")); //TESTING
893 m_ShockHandler.CheckValue(true);
894
895 //analytics
896 GetGame().GetAnalyticsServer().OnEntityHit( source, this );
897 }
898
899 override void EEDelete(EntityAI parent)
900 {
901 SEffectManager.DestroyEffect( m_FliesEff );
902// ErrorEx("DbgFlies | StopSoundSet | exit 1 ",ErrorExSeverity.INFO );
903 StopSoundSet(m_SoundFliesEffect);
904 }
905
906 float ConvertNonlethalDamage(float damage)
907 {
908 float converted_dmg = damage * GameConstants.PROJECTILE_CONVERSION_PLAYERS;
909 return converted_dmg;
910 }
911
915 override void OnPlayerRecievedHit()
916 {
917#ifndef NO_GUI
918 SpawnDamageDealtEffect();
919 CachedObjectsParams.PARAM2_FLOAT_FLOAT.param1 = 32;
920 CachedObjectsParams.PARAM2_FLOAT_FLOAT.param2 = 0.3;
921 SpawnDamageDealtEffect2(CachedObjectsParams.PARAM2_FLOAT_FLOAT);
922 CloseMapEx(true);
923#endif
924 }
925
926 void OnPlayerReceiveFlashbangHitStart(bool visual)
927 {
928 SpawnFlashbangEffect(this, visual);
929 }
930
931 void OnPlayerReceiveFlashbangHitEnd() {}

934 {
935 super.EEHitByRemote(damageType, source, component, dmgZone, ammo, modelPos);
936
937 //Print("DayZPlayerImplement : EEHitByRemote");
938 }

972 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------
973
974 override void EEItemAttached(EntityAI item, string slot_name)
975 {
976 super.EEItemAttached(item, slot_name);
977 SwitchItemSelectionTexture(item, slot_name);
978 Param1<PlayerBase> p = new Param1<PlayerBase>(this);
979 item.SwitchItemSelectionTextureEx(EItemManipulationContext.ATTACHING,p/*new Param1<PlayerBase>(this)*/);
980 m_QuickBarBase.updateSlotsCount();
981 CalculateVisibilityForAI();
982 UpdateShoulderProxyVisibility(item, slot_name);
983
984 HideHairSelections(ItemBase.Cast(item),true);
985
986 GetGame().GetAnalyticsClient().OnItemAttachedAtPlayer(item, slot_name);
987 Clothing clothing = Clothing.Cast(item);
988 if ( clothing )
989 {
990 if ( !GetGame().IsDedicatedServer() )
991 {
992 if ( clothing.GetEffectWidgetTypes() )
993 {
994 QueueAddEffectWidget(clothing.GetEffectWidgetTypes());
995 }
996
997 if ( clothing.GetGlassesEffectID() > -1 )
998 {
999 QueueAddGlassesEffect(clothing.GetGlassesEffectID());
1000 }
1001
1002 GetGame().GetCallQueue( CALL_CATEGORY_GUI ).CallLater( UpdateCorpseStateVisual, 200, false);//sometimes it takes a while to load in
1003 UpdateCorpseStateVisual();//....but if possible, we don't want a delay
1004 }
1005 else if ( GetGame().IsServer() )
1006 {
1007 if ( clothing.IsGasMask() )
1008 {
1009 GetModifiersManager().ActivateModifier(eModifiers.MDF_MASK);
1010 }
1011 }
1012
1013 clothing.UpdateNVGStatus(this,true);
1014 }
1015
1016 AdjustBandana(item,slot_name);
1017 }
1018
1019 override void EEItemDetached(EntityAI item, string slot_name)
1020 {
1021 super.EEItemDetached(item, slot_name);
1022 SwitchItemSelectionTexture(item, slot_name);
1023 item.SwitchItemSelectionTextureEx(EItemManipulationContext.DETACHING);
1024 m_QuickBarBase.updateSlotsCount();
1025 CalculateVisibilityForAI();
1026
1027 HideHairSelections(ItemBase.Cast(item),false);
1028
1029 Clothing clothing = Clothing.Cast(item);
1030
1031 if ( clothing )
1032 {
1033 if ( !GetGame().IsDedicatedServer() )
1034 {
1035 if ( clothing.GetEffectWidgetTypes() )
1036 {
1037 QueueRemoveEffectWidget(clothing.GetEffectWidgetTypes());
1038 }
1039
1040 if ( clothing.GetGlassesEffectID() > -1 )
1041 {
1042 QueueRemoveGlassesEffect(clothing.GetGlassesEffectID());
1043 }
1044 }
1045
1046 if ( GetGame().IsServer() )
1047 {
1048 if ( clothing.IsGasMask() )
1049 {
1050 GetModifiersManager().DeactivateModifier(eModifiers.MDF_MASK);
1051 }
1052 }
1053
1054 clothing.UpdateNVGStatus(this);
1055 GetGame().GetCallQueue( CALL_CATEGORY_GUI ).CallLater( UpdateCorpseStateVisual, 200, false);//sometimes it takes a while to load in
1056 UpdateCorpseStateVisual();//....but if possible, we don't want a delay
1057 }
1058 }
1059
1060 void SwitchItemTypeAttach(EntityAI item, string slot)
1061 {
1062 //Print("SwitchItemTypeAttach: " + item.GetType());
1063 if( !GetGame().IsServer() )
1064 return;
1065
1066 /*InventoryLocation invloc = new InventoryLocation;
1067
1068 item.GetInventory().GetCurrentInventoryLocation(invloc);
1069 //Print(invloc.DumpToString());
1070 if (item.ConfigIsExisting("ChangeIntoOnAttach") && invloc.GetType() != InventoryLocationType.UNKNOWN)
1071 {
1072 string str = item.ChangeIntoOnAttach(slot);
1073 if (str != "")
1074 {
1075 string typestr = item.GetType();
1076 MiscGameplayFunctions.TurnItemIntoItem(ItemBase.Cast( item ), str, this);
1077 }
1078 }*/
1079 }
1080
1081 void SwitchItemTypeDetach(EntityAI item, string slot)
1082 {
1083 //Print("SwitchItemTypeDetach: " + item.GetType());
1084 }
1085
1086 void UpdateShoulderProxyVisibility(EntityAI item, string slot_name)
1087 {
1088 string slot = slot_name;
1089 bool boo;
1090 boo = item.IsWeapon();
1091
1092 if ( slot == "Melee" )
1093 {
1094 SetSimpleHiddenSelectionState(SIMPLE_SELECTION_MELEE_RIFLE,boo);
1095 SetSimpleHiddenSelectionState(SIMPLE_SELECTION_MELEE_MELEE,!boo);
1096 }
1097 else if ( slot == "Shoulder" )
1098 {
1099 SetSimpleHiddenSelectionState(SIMPLE_SELECTION_SHOULDER_RIFLE,boo);
1100 SetSimpleHiddenSelectionState(SIMPLE_SELECTION_SHOULDER_MELEE,!boo);
1101 }
1102 }
1103
1104 override void SwitchItemSelectionTexture(EntityAI item, string slot_name)
1105 {
1106 super.SwitchItemSelectionTexture(item,slot_name);
1107
1108 //shirt + armband
1109 EntityAI armband = FindAttachmentBySlotName("Armband");
1110 if (slot_name == "Body" && armband)
1111 {
1112 Param1<PlayerBase> p = new Param1<PlayerBase>(this);
1113 armband.SwitchItemSelectionTextureEx(EItemManipulationContext.UPDATE,p);
1114 }
1115 }
1116
1117 void RemoveAllItems()
1118 {
1119 array<EntityAI> itemsArray = new array<EntityAI>;
1120 ItemBase item;
1121 GetInventory().EnumerateInventory(InventoryTraversalType.PREORDER, itemsArray);
1122
1123 for (int i = 0; i < itemsArray.Count(); i++)
1124 {
1125 Class.CastTo(item, itemsArray.Get(i));
1126 if (item && !item.IsInherited(SurvivorBase)) GetInventory().LocalDestroyEntity(item);
1127 }
1128 }
1129
1130 bool GetHitPPEEnabled()
1131 {
1132 return m_CanDisplayHitEffectPPE;
1133 }
1134
1135 void SetHitPPEEnabled(bool enabled)
1136 {
1137 m_CanDisplayHitEffectPPE = enabled;
1138 }
1139
1140 bool IsMale()
1141 {
1142 if (ConfigGetBool("woman") != 1)
1143 {
1144 return true;
1145 }
1146 return false;
1147 }
1148
1149 int GetVoiceType()
1150 {
1151 int voice_type = ConfigGetInt("voiceType");
1152
1153 if (voice_type == 0)
1154 {
1155 voice_type = 1;
1156 }
1157
1158 return voice_type;
1159 }

1162 {

1164 }

1166
1167 UndergroundHandlerClient GetUndergroundHandler()
1168 {
1169 if (!m_UndergroundHandler && IsAlive())
1170 {
1171 m_UndergroundHandler = new UndergroundHandlerClient(this);
1172 }
1173
1174 return m_UndergroundHandler;
1175 }

1178 {
1179 m_UndergroundHandler = null;
1180 }

1197 AddAction(ActionOpenCarDoors,InputActionMap);

1199 //AddAction(ActionTakeMaterialToHandsSwitch);

1207 AddAction(ActionLockedDoors, InputActionMap);
1208 AddAction(ActionWashHandsWaterOne, InputActionMap);
1209 AddAction(ActionGetOutTransport, InputActionMap);
1210

1214 //AddAction(ActionSwitchLights);
1215 //AddAction(ActionTakeMaterialToHands);

1232
1233 void SetActions() // Backwards compatibility, not recommended to use
1234 {
1235 }
1236
1237 void SetActionsRemoteTarget( out TInputActionMap InputActionMap)
1238 {
1239 AddAction(ActionCPR, InputActionMap);
1240 AddAction(ActionUncoverHeadTarget, InputActionMap);
1241 AddAction(ActionUngagTarget, InputActionMap);
1242 AddAction(ActionCheckPulse, InputActionMap);
1243 AddAction(ActionPullBodyFromTransport, InputActionMap);
1244 //AddAction(AT_GIVE_ITEM);
1245 }
1246
1247 void SetActionsRemoteTarget() // Backwards compatibility, not recommended to use
1248 {
1249 }
1250
1251 void InitializeActions()
1252 {
1253 // Backwards compatibility
1254 if (IsControlledPlayer())
1255 {
1256 m_InputActionMap = new TInputActionMap;
1257 SetActions();
1258 }
1259 else
1260 {
1261 m_InputActionMap = new TInputActionMap;
1262 SetActionsRemoteTarget();
1263 }
1265
1266 m_InputActionMapControled = new TInputActionMap;
1267 SetActions(m_InputActionMapControled);
1268
1269 m_InputActionMapAsTarget = new TInputActionMap;
1270 SetActionsRemoteTarget(m_InputActionMapAsTarget);
1271 }
1272
1273 override void GetActions(typename action_input_type, out array<ActionBase_Basic> actions)
1274 {
1275 if (!m_ActionsInitialize)
1276 {
1277 m_ActionsInitialize = true;
1278 InitializeActions();
1279 }
1280
1281 // Backwards compatibility
1282 array<ActionBase_Basic> bcActions = m_InputActionMap.Get(action_input_type);
1283 if (!bcActions)
1284 {
1285 if (IsControlledPlayer())
1286 actions = m_InputActionMapControled.Get(action_input_type);
1287 else
1288 actions = m_InputActionMapAsTarget.Get(action_input_type);
1289 }
1290 else
1291 {
1292 if (!actions)
1293 actions = new array<ActionBase_Basic>();
1294
1295 if (IsControlledPlayer())
1296 actions.InsertAll(m_InputActionMapControled.Get(action_input_type));
1297 else
1298 actions.InsertAll(m_InputActionMapAsTarget.Get(action_input_type));
1299
1300 actions.InsertAll(bcActions);
1301 }
1302 }
1303
1304 void AddAction(typename actionName, out TInputActionMap InputActionMap )
1305 {
1306 ActionBase action = GetActionManager().GetAction(actionName);
1307
1308 typename ai = action.GetInputType();
1309 if (!ai)
1310 {
1311 m_ActionsInitialize = false;
1312 return;
1313 }
1314
1315 ref array<ActionBase_Basic> action_array = InputActionMap.Get( ai );
1316
1317 if (!action_array)
1318 {
1319 action_array = new array<ActionBase_Basic>;
1320 InputActionMap.Insert(ai, action_array);
1321 }
1322 action_array.Insert(action);
1323 }
1324
1325 void AddAction(typename actionName) // Backwards compatibility, not recommended to use
1326 {
1327 AddAction(actionName, m_InputActionMap);
1328 }
1329
1330 void RemoveAction(typename actionName, out TInputActionMap InputActionMap)
1331 {
1332 ActionBase action = GetActionManager().GetAction(actionName);
1333 typename ai = action.GetInputType();
1334 ref array<ActionBase_Basic> action_array = InputActionMap.Get( ai );
1335
1336 if (action_array)
1337 {
1338 for (int i = 0; i < action_array.Count(); i++)
1339 {
1340 if (action == action_array.Get(i))
1341 {
1342 action_array.Remove(i);
1343 }
1344 }
1345 action_array = new array<ActionBase_Basic>;
1346 InputActionMap.Insert(ai, action_array);
1347 }
1348 action_array.Insert(action);
1349 }
1350
1351 void RemoveAction(typename actionName) // Backwards compatibility, not recommended to use
1352 {
1353 RemoveAction(actionName, m_InputActionMap);
1354 }
1355
1356 int GetCurrentRecipe()
1357 {
1358 return m_RecipePick;
1359 }
1360
1361 void SetNextRecipe()
1362 {
1363 m_RecipePick++;
1364 }
1365
1366 void SetFirstRecipe()
1367 {
1368 m_RecipePick = 0;
1369 }

1389 {
1390 return m_VehicleManager;
1391 }*/
1392
1394 override void OnLadder(float delta_time, HumanMovementState pState)
1395 {
1396 ProcessHandDamage(delta_time, pState);
1397 }
1398
1399 void ProcessHandDamage(float delta_time, HumanMovementState pState)
1400 {
1401 if( GetInstanceType() == DayZPlayerInstanceType.INSTANCETYPE_SERVER || !GetGame().IsMultiplayer() )
1402 {
1403 if(pState.m_iMovement == DayZPlayerConstants.MOVEMENTIDX_SLIDE)
1404 {
1405 //Print("sliding down");
1406 EntityAI gloves = GetInventory().FindAttachment(InventorySlots.GLOVES);
1407
1408 if( gloves && gloves.GetHealthLevel() < 4 )
1409 {
1410 gloves.AddHealth("","", PlayerConstants.GLOVES_DAMAGE_SLIDING_LADDER_PER_SEC * delta_time);
1411 return;
1412 }
1413
1414 if( Math.RandomFloat01() < PlayerConstants.CHANCE_TO_BLEED_SLIDING_LADDER_PER_SEC * delta_time)
1415 {
1416 if(Math.RandomFloat01() < 0.5)
1417 {
1418 if(GetBleedingManagerServer().AttemptAddBleedingSourceBySelection("LeftForeArmRoll"))
1419 {
1420 SendSoundEvent(EPlayerSoundEventID.INJURED_LIGHT);
1421 }
1422 }
1423 else
1424 {
1425 if(GetBleedingManagerServer().AttemptAddBleedingSourceBySelection("RightForeArmRoll"))
1426 {
1427 SendSoundEvent(EPlayerSoundEventID.INJURED_LIGHT);
1428 }
1429 }
1430 }
1431
1432 }
1433 }
1434 }
1435
1436 override void ProcessFeetDamageServer(int pUserInt)
1437 {
1438 //InventorySlots.HEADGEAR
1439 EntityAI shoes = GetInventory().FindAttachment(InventorySlots.FEET);
1440
1441 string surface; int liquid;
1442 GetGame().SurfaceUnderObject(this, surface, liquid);
1443 float modifier_surface = Surface.GetParamFloat(surface, "footDamage");
1444
1445 if( shoes && shoes.GetHealthLevel() < 4 )
1446 {
1447 shoes.AddHealth("","", - 1 * modifier_surface * PlayerConstants.SHOES_MOVEMENT_DAMAGE_PER_STEP * (float)PlayerConstants.CHECK_EVERY_N_STEP);
1448
1449 /*
1450 Print("modifier_surface:"+modifier_surface);
1451 Print(shoes.GetHealth("",""));
1452 */
1453 return;
1454 }
1455
1456 float rnd = Math.RandomFloat01();
1457
1458 float modifier_movement = GetFeetDamageMoveModifier();
1459
1460
1461
1462 /*
1463 Print(surface);
1464 Print(Surface.GetParamFloat(surface, "footDamage"));
1465 */
1466
1467 float chance = modifier_movement * modifier_surface * PlayerConstants.BAREFOOT_MOVEMENT_BLEED_MODIFIER * (float)PlayerConstants.CHECK_EVERY_N_STEP;
1468 //Print(chance);
1469 //Print("chance:" +chance);
1470 if( rnd < chance )
1471 {
1472 if(pUserInt % 2 == 0)
1473 {
1474 if(GetBleedingManagerServer().AttemptAddBleedingSourceBySelection("RightFoot"))
1475 {
1476 //added
1477 //Print("right foot bleeding");
1478 SendSoundEvent(EPlayerSoundEventID.INJURED_LIGHT);
1479
1480 }
1481
1482 }
1483 else
1484 {
1485 if(GetBleedingManagerServer().AttemptAddBleedingSourceBySelection("LeftFoot"))
1486 {
1487 //added
1488 //Print("left foot bleeding");
1489 SendSoundEvent(EPlayerSoundEventID.INJURED_LIGHT);
1490
1491 }
1492 }
1493 }
1494 }
1495
1496 float GetFeetDamageMoveModifier()
1497 {
1498 float modifier;
1499 switch(m_MovementState.m_iMovement)
1500 {
1501 case DayZPlayerConstants.MOVEMENTIDX_SPRINT:
1502 modifier = 1;
1503 break
1504 case DayZPlayerConstants.MOVEMENTIDX_RUN:
1505 modifier = 0.5;
1506 break
1507 case DayZPlayerConstants.MOVEMENTIDX_WALK:
1508 modifier = 0;
1509 break
1510 }
1511 return modifier;
1512 }
1513
1514 void SetStamina( int value, int range )
1515 {
1516 if( m_ModulePlayerStatus )
1517 m_ModulePlayerStatus.SetStamina( value, range );
1518 }
1519
1520 #ifdef DEVELOPER
1521 void SetStaminaEnabled(bool value)
1522 {
1523 if (m_StaminaHandler)
1524 {
1525 m_StaminaHandler.SetStaminaEnabled(value);
1526 }
1527 }
1528 #endif

1569
1570 bool CanBeRestrained()
1571 {
1572 if( IsInVehicle() || IsRaised() || IsSwimming() || IsClimbing() || IsClimbingLadder() || IsRestrained() || !GetWeaponManager() || GetWeaponManager().IsRunning() || !GetActionManager() || GetActionManager().GetRunningAction() != null || IsMapOpen() )
1573 {
1574 return false;
1575 }
1576 if( GetThrowing() && GetThrowing().IsThrowingModeEnabled() )
1577 {
1578 return false;
1579 }
1580 return true;
1581 }
1582
1583 void SetRestrainStarted(bool restrain_started)
1584 {
1585 m_IsRestrainStarted = restrain_started;
1586 SetSynchDirty();
1587 }
1588
1589 bool IsRestrainStarted()
1590 {
1591 return m_IsRestrainStarted;
1592 }
1593
1594 void SetRestrainPrelocked(bool restrain_prelock)
1595 {
1596 m_IsRestrainPrelocked = restrain_prelock;
1597 SetSynchDirty();
1598 }
1599
1600 bool IsRestrainPrelocked()
1601 {
1602 return m_IsRestrainPrelocked;
1603 }
1604
1605 void SetRestrained(bool is_restrained)
1606 {
1607 m_IsRestrained = is_restrained;
1608 SetSynchDirty();
1609 }
1610
1611 override bool IsRestrained()
1612 {
1613 return m_IsRestrained;
1614 }
1615
1616 override bool IsInventoryVisible()
1617 {
1618 return true;
1619 }
1620
1621 bool CanManipulateInventory()
1622 {
1623 if( IsControlledPlayer() )
1624 {
1625 return !IsRestrained() && !IsRestrainPrelocked();
1626 }
1627 return true;
1628 }

1649
1650 /*override bool CanReceiveAttachment(EntityAI attachment, int slotId)
1651 {
1652 ClothingBase headgear = ClothingBase.Cast(GetInventory().FindAttachment(InventorySlots.HEADGEAR));
1653 ClothingBase mask = ClothingBase.Cast(GetInventory().FindAttachment(InventorySlots.MASK));
1654 ClothingBase eyewear = ClothingBase.Cast(GetInventory().FindAttachment(InventorySlots.EYEWEAR));
1655
1656 bool check_legacy = true;
1657 if ( headgear && headgear.ConfigGetBool("noEyewear") && slotId == InventorySlots.EYEWEAR && !attachment.ConfigGetBool("isStrap") )
1658 {
1659 check_legacy = false;
1660 }
1661 if ( eyewear && (eyewear.ConfigGetBool("noHelmet") || eyewear.ConfigGetBool("isStrap")) )
1662 {
1663 check_legacy = false;
1664 }
1665 if ( ClothingBase.Cast(attachment) && ((attachment.ConfigGetBool("noMask") && mask) || (attachment.ConfigGetBool("noEyewear") && eyewear && !eyewear.ConfigGetBool("isStrap")) || (attachment.ConfigGetBool("noNVStrap") && eyewear && eyewear.ConfigGetBool("isStrap"))) )
1666 {
1667 check_legacy = false;
1668 }
1669
1670 if ( !check_legacy )
1671 {
1672 return false;
1673 }
1674
1675 return super.CanReceiveAttachment(attachment, slotId);
1676 }*/
1677
1678 override bool CanReceiveItemIntoHands(EntityAI item_to_hands)
1679 {
1680 if ( IsInVehicle() )
1681 return false;
1682
1683 if ( !CanPickupHeavyItem(item_to_hands) )
1684 return false;
1685
1686 return super.CanReceiveItemIntoHands(item_to_hands);
1687 }

1692 }
1693
1694 override bool CanReleaseFromHands(EntityAI handheld)
1695 {
1696 return super.CanReleaseFromHands(handheld);
1697 }

1699 int GetCraftingRecipeID()
1700 {
1701 if( GetInstanceType() == DayZPlayerInstanceType.INSTANCETYPE_CLIENT )
1702 {
1703 return GetCraftingManager().GetRecipeID();
1704 }
1705 else
1706 {
1707 return m_RecipeID;
1708 }
1709 }
1710
1711 void SetCraftingRecipeID(int recipeID)
1712 {
1713 if( GetInstanceType() == DayZPlayerInstanceType.INSTANCETYPE_CLIENT )
1714 {
1715 GetCraftingManager().SetRecipeID(recipeID);
1716 }
1717 else
1718 {
1719 m_RecipeID = recipeID;
1720 }
1721 }

1768 // --------------------------------------------------
1769 // QuickBar
1770 //---------------------------------------------------
1771
1772 void RemoveQuickBarEntityShortcut(EntityAI entity)
1773 {
1774 int index = m_QuickBarBase.FindEntityIndex(entity);
1775 if(index != -1)
1776 m_QuickBarBase.SetEntityShortcut(entity,-1);
1777 }
1778 //---------------------------------------------------
1779 void SetEnableQuickBarEntityShortcut(EntityAI entity, bool value)
1780 {
1781 int index = m_QuickBarBase.FindEntityIndex(entity);
1782 if(index != -1)
1783 m_QuickBarBase.SetShotcutEnable(index,value);
1784
1785 }
1786 //---------------------------------------------------
1787 int FindQuickBarEntityIndex(EntityAI entity)
1788 {
1789 int index;
1790 index = m_QuickBarBase.FindEntityIndex(entity);
1791
1792 if(m_QuickBarBase.GetEntity(index) == NULL )
1793 return -1;
1794
1795 return index;
1796 }
1797 //---------------------------------------------------
1798
1799 int GetQuickBarSize()
1800 {
1801 return m_QuickBarBase.GetSize();
1802 }
1803 //---------------------------------------------------
1804 EntityAI GetQuickBarEntity(int index)
1805 {
1806 return m_QuickBarBase.GetEntity(index);
1807 }
1808 //---------------------------------------------------
1809 void UpdateQuickBarEntityVisibility(EntityAI entity)
1810 {
1811 int i = FindQuickBarEntityIndex(entity);
1812 if( i >= 0 )
1813 m_QuickBarBase.UpdateShotcutVisibility(i);
1814 }
1815 //---------------------------------------------------
1816 void SetQuickBarEntityShortcut(EntityAI entity, int index, bool force = false )
1817 {
1818 m_QuickBarBase.SetEntityShortcut(entity, index, force);
1819 }
1820 //---------------------------------------------------
1821 void OnQuickbarSetEntityRequest(ParamsReadContext ctx)
1822 {
1823 m_QuickBarBase.OnSetEntityRequest(ctx);
1824 }
1825 //---------------------------------------------------
1826
1827 // Applies splint on all limbs.
1828 void ApplySplint()
1829 {
1830 float add_health_coef = 0.33;
1831 // The idea is to slightly increase health of broken limb so the player is still limping. Using more splints will help but each time less. 100% recovery can be achieved only through long term healing.
1832 if (GetBrokenLegs() == eBrokenLegs.BROKEN_LEGS)
1833 {
1834 AddHealth("LeftLeg", "Health", ( GetMaxHealth("LeftLeg", "Health") - GetHealth("LeftLeg", "Health") ) * add_health_coef );
1835 AddHealth("RightLeg", "Health", ( GetMaxHealth("RightLeg", "Health") - GetHealth("RightLeg", "Health") ) * add_health_coef );
1836 AddHealth("RightFoot", "Health", ( GetMaxHealth("RightFoot", "Health") - GetHealth("RightFoot", "Health") ) * add_health_coef );
1837 AddHealth("LeftFoot", "Health", ( GetMaxHealth("LeftFoot", "Health") - GetHealth("LeftFoot", "Health") ) * add_health_coef );
1838 }
1839 }
1840
1841 void ProcessDrowning(float dT)
1842 {
1843 GetStaminaHandler().DepleteStamina(EStaminaModifiers.DROWN,dT );
1844 PPERequester_Drowning req = PPERequester_Drowning.Cast(PPERequesterBank.GetRequester( PPERequesterBank.REQ_DROWNING ));
1845
1846 req.SetStamina01(GetStaminaHandler().GetStaminaNormalized());
1847
1848 }
1849
1850 void ProcessHoldBreath(float dT)
1851 {
1852 if ( IsTryingHoldBreath() && CanStartConsumingStamina(EStaminaConsumers.HOLD_BREATH) )
1853 {
1854 DepleteStamina(EStaminaModifiers.HOLD_BREATH,dT);
1855 if( !m_IsHoldingBreath )
1856 {
1857 OnHoldBreathStart();
1858 m_IsHoldingBreath = true;
1859 }
1860 }
1861 else if ( IsTryingHoldBreath() && m_IsHoldingBreath && CanConsumeStamina(EStaminaConsumers.HOLD_BREATH) )
1862 {
1863 DepleteStamina(EStaminaModifiers.HOLD_BREATH,dT);
1864 }
1865 else
1866 {
1867 if ( m_IsHoldingBreath ) OnHoldBreathEnd();
1868 m_IsHoldingBreath = false;
1869 }
1870 }
1871
1872 void OnHoldBreathStart()
1873 {
1874 //SendSoundEvent(SoundSetMap.GetSoundSetID("holdBreath_male_Char_SoundSet"));
1875 RequestSoundEventEx(EPlayerSoundEventID.HOLD_BREATH, true, EPlayerSoundEventParam.SKIP_CONTROLLED_PLAYER );
1876 }
1877
1878 void OnHoldBreathExhausted()
1879 {
1880 RequestSoundEventEx(EPlayerSoundEventID.EXHAUSTED_BREATH, true, EPlayerSoundEventParam.SKIP_CONTROLLED_PLAYER );
1881 }
1882
1883 void OnHoldBreathEnd()
1884 {
1885 //SendSoundEvent(SoundSetMap.GetSoundSetID("releaseBreath_male_Char_SoundSet"));
1886 RequestSoundEventEx(EPlayerSoundEventID.RELEASE_BREATH, true, EPlayerSoundEventParam.SKIP_CONTROLLED_PLAYER );
1887 }
1888
1889 override bool IsHoldingBreath()
1890 {
1891 return m_IsHoldingBreath;
1892 }
1893
1894 override bool IsRefresherSignalingViable()
1895 {
1896 return false;
1897 }
1898
1899 eMixedSoundStates GetMixedSoundStates()
1900 {
1901 return m_MixedSoundStates;
1902 }
1903
1904 AbstractWave SaySoundSet(string name)
1905 {
1906 if( m_SaySoundLastSetName != name )
1907 {
1908 m_SaySoundParams = new SoundParams(name);
1909 m_SaySoundBuilder = new SoundObjectBuilder(m_SaySoundParams);
1910
1911 m_SaySoundLastSetName = name;
1912 }
1913
1914 m_SaySoundObject = m_SaySoundBuilder.BuildSoundObject();
1915 m_SaySoundObject.SetPosition(GetPosition());
1916 return GetGame().GetSoundScene().Play3D(m_SaySoundObject, m_SaySoundBuilder);
1917 }
1918
1919 EntityAI FindCargoByBaseType(string searched_item)
1920 {
1921 EntityAI attachment;
1922 string item_name;
1923 int attcount = this.GetInventory().AttachmentCount();
1924
1925 for (int att = 0; att < attcount; att++)
1926 {
1927 attachment = GetInventory().GetAttachmentFromIndex(att);
1928 if ( attachment.IsItemBase() )
1929 {
1930 item_name = attachment.GetType();
1931 if ( GetGame().IsKindOf(item_name, searched_item) )
1932 {
1933 return attachment;
1934 }
1935 }
1936 }
1937 return NULL;
1938 }
1939
1940 void InitEditor()
1941 {
1942 if ( GetGame().IsDebug() )
1943 {
1944 if ( !GetGame().IsMultiplayer() && GetGame().GetPlayer() && GetGame().GetPlayer().GetID() == this.GetID() )
1945 {
1946 PluginSceneManager scene_editor = PluginSceneManager.Cast( GetPlugin(PluginSceneManager) );
1947 scene_editor.InitLoad();
1948 }
1949 }
1950 }
1951
1952 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1953 void OnPlayerLoaded()
1954 {
1955 InitEditor();
1956
1957 if ( GetGame().IsMultiplayer() || GetGame().IsServer() )
1958 {
1959 m_ModuleLifespan.SynchLifespanVisual( this, m_LifeSpanState, m_HasBloodyHandsVisible, m_HasBloodTypeVisible, m_BloodType );
1960 }
1961
1962 if (IsControlledPlayer())//true only on client for the controlled character
1963 {
1964 if (!m_VirtualHud)
1965 m_VirtualHud = new VirtualHud(this);
1966 if ( m_Hud )
1967 {
1968 m_Hud.UpdateBloodName();
1969 PPERequesterBank.GetRequester(PPERequester_DeathDarkening).Stop();
1970 PPERequesterBank.GetRequester(PPERequester_ShockHitReaction).Stop();
1971 PPERequesterBank.GetRequester(PPERequester_UnconEffects).Stop(); //TODO - stop en mass...check if effects do not terminate (spawning inside of contaminated area)?!
1972 GetGame().GetUIManager().CloseAll();
1973 GetGame().GetMission().SetPlayerRespawning(false);
1974 GetGame().GetMission().OnPlayerRespawned(this);
1975
1976 m_Hud.ShowHudUI(true);
1977 m_Hud.ShowQuickbarUI(true);
1978 #ifdef PLATFORM_CONSOLE
1979 m_Hud.ShowQuickBar(GetGame().GetInput().IsEnabledMouseAndKeyboardEvenOnServer()); //temporary solution
1980 #else
1981 m_Hud.ShowQuickBar(g_Game.GetProfileOption(EDayZProfilesOptions.QUICKBAR));
1982 #endif
1983 }
1984 m_EffectWidgets = GetGame().GetMission().GetEffectWidgets();
1985 }
1986 if (!GetGame().IsDedicatedServer())
1987 {
1988 GetGame().GetCallQueue(CALL_CATEGORY_GUI).CallLater(UpdateCorpseStateVisual, 2000, false);//sometimes it takes a while to load in
1989 m_PlayerSoundEventHandler = new PlayerSoundEventHandler(this);
1990 }
1991 int slot_id = InventorySlots.GetSlotIdFromString("Head");
1992 m_CharactersHead = Head_Default.Cast(GetInventory().FindPlaceholderForSlot( slot_id ));
1993 CheckHairClippingOnCharacterLoad();
1994 UpdateHairSelectionVisibility();
1995 PreloadDecayTexture();
1996
1997 Weapon_Base wpn = Weapon_Base.Cast(GetItemInHands());
1998 if (wpn)
1999 wpn.ValidateAndRepair();
2000 /*
2001 PreloadDecayTexture();
2002 UpdateCorpseStateVisual();
2003 */
2004 m_PlayerLoaded = true;
2005
2006 //Print("PlayerBase | OnPlayerLoaded()");
2007
2008 }
2009
2010 void SetPlayerDisconnected(bool state)
2011 {
2012 m_PlayerDisconnectProcessed = state;
2013 }
2014
2015 bool IsPlayerDisconnected()
2016 {
2017 return m_PlayerDisconnectProcessed;
2018 }
2019
2020 // --------------------------------------------------
2021 // Advanced placement
2022 //---------------------------------------------------
2023
2024 //get hologram
2025 Hologram GetHologramServer()
2026 {
2027 return m_HologramServer;
2028 }
2029
2030 Hologram GetHologramLocal()
2031 {
2032 return m_HologramLocal;
2033 }
2034
2035 void PlacingStartServer( ItemBase item )
2036 {
2037 m_HologramServer = new Hologram( this, GetLocalProjectionPosition(), item );
2038 GetHologramServer().SetProjectionPosition( GetLocalProjectionPosition() );
2039 GetHologramServer().SetProjectionOrientation( GetLocalProjectionOrientation() );
2040 GetHologramServer().GetProjectionEntity().OnPlacementStarted( this );
2041 GetHologramServer().CheckPowerSource();
2042 GetHologramServer().RefreshVisual();
2043 }
2044
2045 void PlacingStartLocal(ItemBase item)
2046 {
2047 if (GetGame().IsMultiplayer() && GetGame().IsServer())
2048 return;
2049
2050 m_HologramLocal = new Hologram( this, GetLocalProjectionPosition(), item );
2051 GetHologramLocal().GetProjectionEntity().OnPlacementStarted( this );
2052 }
2053
2054 void PlacingCancelServer()
2055 {
2056 EntityAI entity_in_hands = GetHumanInventory().GetEntityInHands();
2057
2058 if ( IsPlacingServer() )
2059 {
2060 GetHologramServer().GetParentEntity().OnPlacementCancelled( this );
2061
2062 delete m_HologramServer;
2063 return;
2064 }
2065 else if ( entity_in_hands && entity_in_hands.HasEnergyManager() )
2066 {
2067 if ( entity_in_hands.GetCompEM().IsPlugged() )
2068 {
2069 entity_in_hands.OnPlacementCancelled( this );
2070 }
2071 }
2072 }
2073
2074 //Called when item placement is canceled, will prevent quickbar usage until the item the player was placing is back in hands
2075 void LockHandsUntilItemHeld()
2076 {
2077 m_AreHandsLocked = true;
2078 }
2079
2080 void PlacingCancelLocal()
2081 {
2082 EntityAI entity_in_hands = GetHumanInventory().GetEntityInHands();
2083 if ( entity_in_hands && entity_in_hands.HasEnergyManager() )
2084 {
2085 if ( entity_in_hands.GetCompEM().IsPlugged() )
2086 {
2087 entity_in_hands.OnPlacementCancelled( this );
2088 }
2089 }
2090 delete m_HologramLocal;
2091 }
2092
2093 void PlacingCompleteServer()
2094 {
2095 delete m_HologramServer;
2096 }
2097
2098 void PlacingCompleteLocal()
2099 {
2100 delete m_HologramLocal;
2101 }
2102
2103 bool IsPlacingServer()
2104 {
2105 if ( m_HologramServer )
2106 {
2107 return true;
2108 }
2109 else
2110 {
2111 return false;
2112 }
2113 }
2114
2115 bool IsPlacingLocal()
2116 {
2117 if ( m_HologramLocal )
2118 {
2119 return true;
2120 }
2121
2122 return false;
2123 }
2124
2125 void SetDrowning(bool enable)
2126 {
2127 if (enable != m_IsDrowning)
2128 {
2129 if (enable)
2130 {
2131 OnDrowningStart();
2132 }
2133 else
2134 {
2135 OnDrowningEnd();
2136 }
2137 }
2138 m_IsDrowning = enable;
2139
2140 }
2141
2142 void OnDrowningStart()
2143 {
2144 #ifndef SERVER
2145 if (IsControlledPlayer())
2146 {
2147 PPERequester_Drowning req = PPERequester_Drowning.Cast(PPERequesterBank.GetRequester( PPERequesterBank.REQ_DROWNING ));
2148 req.Start();
2149 }
2150 #endif
2151 }
2152
2153 void OnDrowningEnd()
2154 {
2155 #ifndef SERVER
2156 if (IsControlledPlayer())
2157 {
2158 PPERequester_Drowning req = PPERequester_Drowning.Cast(PPERequesterBank.GetRequester( PPERequesterBank.REQ_DROWNING ));
2159 req.Stop();
2160 }
2161 #endif
2162 }
2163
2164 bool TogglePlacingServer( int userDataType, ParamsReadContext ctx )
2165 {
2166 if ( userDataType == INPUT_UDT_ADVANCED_PLACEMENT )
2167 {
2168 PlacingCancelServer();
2169 return true;
2170 }
2171
2172 return false;
2173 }
2174
2175 void RequestResetADSSync()
2176 {
2177 if (GetInstanceType() == DayZPlayerInstanceType.INSTANCETYPE_CLIENT && GetGame().IsMultiplayer())
2178 {
2179 if (ScriptInputUserData.CanStoreInputUserData())
2180 {
2181 ScriptInputUserData ctx = new ScriptInputUserData;
2182 ctx.Write(INPUT_UDT_RESET_ADS);
2183 ctx.Send();
2184 }
2185 }
2186 else if (!GetGame().IsMultiplayer())
2187 {
2188 m_ResetADS = true;
2189 }
2190 }
2191
2193 bool ResetADSPlayerSync( int userDataType, ParamsReadContext ctx )
2194 {
2195 if ( userDataType == INPUT_UDT_RESET_ADS )
2196 {
2197 ScriptJunctureData pCtx = new ScriptJunctureData;
2198 SendSyncJuncture(DayZPlayerSyncJunctures.SJ_ADS_RESET,pCtx);
2199 return true;
2200 }
2201
2202 return false;
2203 }
2204
2205 void SetUnderground(EUndergroundPresence presence)
2206 {
2207 m_UndergroundPresence = presence;
2208 }
2209
2210 void TogglePlacingLocal(ItemBase item = null)
2211 {
2212 if ( IsPlacingLocal() )
2213 {
2214 if ( GetInstanceType() == DayZPlayerInstanceType.INSTANCETYPE_CLIENT && GetGame().IsMultiplayer() )
2215 {
2216 if (ScriptInputUserData.CanStoreInputUserData())
2217 {
2218 ScriptInputUserData ctx = new ScriptInputUserData;
2219 ctx.Write(INPUT_UDT_ADVANCED_PLACEMENT);
2220 ctx.Send();
2221 }
2222 }
2223 PlacingCancelLocal();
2224 }
2225 else if (!item)
2226 {
2227 PlacingStartLocal( GetItemInHands() );
2228 }
2229 else
2230 {
2231 PlacingStartLocal(item);
2232 }
2233 }
2234
2235 void SetLocalProjectionPosition( vector local_position )
2236 {
2237 m_LocalProjectionPosition = local_position;
2238 }
2239
2240 void SetLocalProjectionOrientation( vector local_orientation )
2241 {
2242 m_LocalProjectionOrientation = local_orientation;
2243 }
2244

2246 {

2248 }
2249

2253 }

2272 // -------------------------------------------------------------------------
2273 void ~PlayerBase()
2274 {
2275 if ( GetGame() && ( !GetGame().IsDedicatedServer() ) )
2276 {
2277 ClientData.RemovePlayerBase( this );
2278 SetContaminatedEffectEx(false);
2279 }
2280
2281 SEffectManager.DestroyEffect(m_FliesEff);
2282// ErrorEx("DbgFlies | StopSoundSet | exit 2 ",ErrorExSeverity.INFO );
2283 StopSoundSet(m_SoundFliesEffect);
2284 }
2285
2286 void OnCameraChanged(DayZPlayerCameraBase new_camera)
2287 {
2288 m_CameraSwayModifier = new_camera.GetWeaponSwayModifier();
2289 m_CurrentCamera = new_camera;
2290 }
2291
2292 DayZPlayerCamera GetCurrentPlayerCamera()
2293 {
2294 return m_CurrentCamera;
2295 }
2296
2297 bool IsCurrentCameraAimedAtGround()
2298 {
2299 if (!m_CurrentCamera)
2300 return false;
2301
2302 return m_CurrentCamera.GetCurrentPitch() < PlayerConstants.CAMERA_THRESHOLD_PITCH;
2303 }
