2477
2478 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------
2479 void OnScheduledTick(float deltaTime)
2480 {
2481 if( !IsPlayerSelected() || !IsAlive() ) return;
2482 if( m_ModifiersManager ) m_ModifiersManager.OnScheduledTick(deltaTime);
2483 if( m_NotifiersManager ) m_NotifiersManager.OnScheduledTick();
2484 if( m_TrasferValues ) m_TrasferValues.OnScheduledTick(deltaTime);
2485 if( m_VirtualHud ) m_VirtualHud.OnScheduledTick();
2486 if( GetBleedingManagerServer() ) GetBleedingManagerServer().OnTick(deltaTime);
2487
2488 // Check if electric device needs to be unplugged
2489 ItemBase heldItem = GetItemInHands();
2490 if ( heldItem && heldItem.HasEnergyManager() && heldItem.GetCompEM().IsPlugged() )
2491 {
2492 // Now we know we are working with an electric device which is plugged into a power source.
2493 EntityAI placed_entity = heldItem;
2494
2495 // Unplug the device when the player is too far from the power source.
2496 placed_entity.GetCompEM().UpdatePlugState();
2497 }
2498 }
2499
2500 void OnCommandHandlerTick(float delta_time, int pCurrentCommandID)
2501 {
2502 if( !IsAlive() )
2503 {
2504 if ( !m_DeathSyncSent && m_KillerData )
2505 {
2506 SyncEvents.SendEntityKilled(this, m_KillerData.m_Killer, m_KillerData.m_MurderWeapon, m_KillerData.m_KillerHiTheBrain);
2507 //Print("Sending Death Sync, yay! Headshot by killer = " + m_KillerData.m_KillerHiTheBrain);
2508 //Print("And was he killed by headshot in general? = " + m_KilledByHeadshot);
2509 m_DeathSyncSent = true;
2510 }
2511 return;
2512 }
2513 if( m_DebugMonitorValues )
2514 m_DebugMonitorValues.OnScheduledTick(delta_time);
2515 if( GetSymptomManager() )
2516 GetSymptomManager().OnTick(delta_time, pCurrentCommandID, m_MovementState);//needs to stay in command handler tick as it's playing animations
2517 //if( GetBleedingManagerServer() ) GetBleedingManagerServer().OnTick(delta_time);
2518
2519 DayZPlayerInstanceType instType = GetInstanceType();
2520 if( instType == DayZPlayerInstanceType.INSTANCETYPE_CLIENT )
2521 {
2522 if( m_PlayerSoundEventHandler )
2523 m_PlayerSoundEventHandler.OnTick(delta_time);
2524
2525 if (m_ProcessRemoveEffectWidgets && m_ProcessRemoveEffectWidgets.Count() > 0)
2526 {
2527 m_EffectWidgets.RemoveActiveEffects(m_ProcessRemoveEffectWidgets);
2528 }
2529
2530 if (m_ProcessAddEffectWidgets && m_ProcessAddEffectWidgets.Count() > 0)
2531 {
2532 m_EffectWidgets.AddActiveEffects(m_ProcessAddEffectWidgets);
2533 }
2534
2535 HandleGlassesEffect();
2536
2537 if (m_ContaminatedAreaEffectEnabled)
2538 ContaminatedParticleAdjustment();
2539
2540 #ifdef DEVELOPER
2541 if( m_WeaponDebug )
2542 {
2543 m_WeaponDebug.OnCommandHandlerUpdate();
2544 }
2545 #endif
2546
2547 m_ProcessAddEffectWidgets.Clear(); //clears array for remotes as well
2548 m_ProcessRemoveEffectWidgets.Clear(); //clears array for remotes as well
2549 }
2550
2551 m_AnimCommandStarting = HumanMoveCommandID.None;
2552 }
2553
2554 bool m_ShowDbgUI = true;
2555 int m_DbgListSelection = 0;
2556 float m_DbgSliderValue = 0.0;
2557 ref array<string> m_DbgOptions = {"jedna", "dva", "tri"};
2558
2559 NotifiersManager GetNotifiersManager()
2560 {
2561 return m_NotifiersManager;
2562 }
2563 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------
2564 void OnTick()
2565 {
2566 float deltaT = (GetGame().GetTime() - m_LastTick) / 1000;
2567 if ( m_LastTick < 0 ) deltaT = 0;//first tick protection
2568 m_LastTick = GetGame().GetTime();
2569
2570 //PrintString("deltaT: " + deltaT);
2571 //PrintString("at time: " + m_LastTick);
2572 OnScheduledTick(deltaT);
2573
2574
2575 }
2576 // -------------------------------------------------------------------------
2577 override void EEItemIntoHands(EntityAI item)
2578 {
2579 super.EEItemIntoHands( item );
2580
2581 if ( item )
2582 {
2583 Weapon_Base w;
2584 if ( Class.CastTo(w, item) )
2585 {
2586 w.ResetWeaponAnimState();
2587
2588 HumanCommandMove cm = GetCommand_Move();
2589 if ( cm )
2590 {
2591 cm.SetMeleeBlock( false );
2592 GetMeleeFightLogic().SetBlock( false );
2593 }
2594 }
2595
2597 if ( item.IsHeavyBehaviour() && IsRaised() )
2598 {
2599 HumanCommandMove cm2 = GetCommand_Move();
2600 if ( cm2 )
2601 {
2602 cm2.ForceStance(DayZPlayerConstants.STANCEIDX_ERECT);
2603 }
2604 }
2605 }
2606
2607 //SetOpticsPreload(true,item);
2608 }
2609
2610 override void EEItemOutOfHands(EntityAI item)
2611 {
2612 super.EEItemOutOfHands( item );
2613 if ( IsPlacingLocal() )
2614 {
2615 GetGame().GetCallQueue(CALL_CATEGORY_SYSTEM).Call(TogglePlacingLocal);
2616 }
2617
2618 if ( !IsAlive() )
2619 OnItemInHandsChanged();
2620
2621 //SetOpticsPreload(false,item);
2622 }
2623
2624 PlayerStomach GetStomach()
2625 {
2626 return m_PlayerStomach;
2627 }
2628
2629 override void CommandHandler(float pDt, int pCurrentCommandID, bool pCurrentCommandFinished)
2630 {
2631 // lower implement
2632 super.CommandHandler(pDt,pCurrentCommandID,pCurrentCommandFinished);
2633 //PrintString("pCurrentCommandID="+pCurrentCommandID.ToString());
2634 //PrintString(GetActionManager().GetRunningAction().ToString());
2635 m_dT = pDt;
2636
2637 CheckZeroSoundEvent();
2638 CheckSendSoundEvent();
2639
2640 ProcessADDModifier();
2641
2642 if(m_BrokenLegsJunctureReceived)//was there a change in broken legs state ?
2643 {
2644 m_BrokenLegsJunctureReceived = false;
2645 bool initial = m_BrokenLegState < 0;//negative values indicate initial activation
2646
2647 if ( GetBrokenLegs() == eBrokenLegs.BROKEN_LEGS )
2648 {
2649 DropHeavyItem();
2650 if (initial)
2651 {
2652 BrokenLegForceProne();
2653 }
2654 }
2655 }
2656
2657 GetDayZPlayerInventory().HandleInventory(pDt);
2658
2659 if (m_IsFireWeaponRaised)
2660 {
2661 ProcessHoldBreath(pDt);
2662 }
2663
2664 ActionManagerBase mngr = GetActionManager();
2665 HumanInputController hic = GetInputController();
2666
2667 if (m_AreHandsLocked && GetHumanInventory().GetEntityInHands())
2668 {
2669 m_AreHandsLocked = false;
2670 }
2671
2672 // freelook camera memory for weapon raycast
2673 if (hic.CameraIsFreeLook() && m_DirectionToCursor == vector.Zero)
2674 {
2675 m_DirectionToCursor = GetGame().GetCurrentCameraDirection();
2676 }
2677 else if (!hic.CameraIsFreeLook() && m_DirectionToCursor != vector.Zero)
2678 {
2679 m_DirectionToCursor = vector.Zero;
2680 }
2681
2682 if ( m_WeaponManager )
2683 {
2684 m_WeaponManager.Update(pDt);
2685 }
2686 if ( m_EmoteManager && IsPlayerSelected() )
2687 {
2688 m_EmoteManager.Update(pDt);
2689 //Print("selected! " + IsPlayerSelected());
2690 }
2691 if ( m_RGSManager )
2692 {
2693 m_RGSManager.Update();
2694 }
2695/* if( m_VehicleManager )
2696 {
2697 m_VehicleManager.Update(pDt);
2698 }*/
2699 if ( m_StanceIndicator )
2700 {
2701 m_StanceIndicator.Update();
2702 }
2703 if ( m_StaminaHandler )
2704 {
2705 m_StaminaHandler.Update(pDt, pCurrentCommandID);
2706 }
2707 if ( m_InjuryHandler )
2708 {
2709 m_InjuryHandler.Update(pDt);
2710 }
2711 if ( m_HCAnimHandler )
2712 {
2713 m_HCAnimHandler.Update(pDt, m_MovementState);
2714 }
2715 if ( m_ShockHandler )
2716 {
2717 m_ShockHandler.Update(pDt);
2718 }
2719
2720 if ( GetInstanceType() == DayZPlayerInstanceType.INSTANCETYPE_SERVER || !GetGame().IsMultiplayer() )
2721 {
2722 GetPlayerSoundManagerServer().Update();
2723 ShockRefill(pDt);
2724 FreezeCheck();
2725 if ( m_Environment )
2726 {
2727 m_Environment.Update(pDt);
2728 }
2729 }
2730
2731 GetHumanInventory().Update(pDt);
2732 if (m_IsDrowning)
2733 {
2734 ProcessDrowning(pDt);
2735 }
2736 UpdateDelete();
2737 //PrintString(pCurrentCommandID.ToString());
2738 //PrintString(m_IsUnconscious.ToString());
2739 //PrintString("currentCommand:" +pCurrentCommandID.ToString());
2740
2741 HandleDamageHit(pCurrentCommandID);
2742
2743 if (mngr && hic)
2744 {
2745 mngr.Update(pCurrentCommandID);
2746
2747 //PrintString(m_ShouldBeUnconscious.ToString());
2748 if (pCurrentCommandID == DayZPlayerConstants.COMMANDID_UNCONSCIOUS)
2749 {
2750 if ( !m_UnconsciousDebug )
2751 {
2752 OnUnconsciousUpdate(pDt, m_LastCommandBeforeUnconscious );
2753 if ( !m_IsUnconscious )
2754 {
2755 m_IsUnconscious = true;
2756 OnUnconsciousStart();
2757 }
2758 if ( !m_ShouldBeUnconscious && m_UnconsciousTime > 2 )//m_UnconsciousTime > x -> protection for a player being broken when attempting to wake him up too early into unconsciousness
2759 {
2760
2761 HumanCommandUnconscious hcu = GetCommand_Unconscious();
2762 if (hcu)
2763 {
2764 if (m_LastCommandBeforeUnconscious == DayZPlayerConstants.COMMANDID_VEHICLE)
2765 hcu.WakeUp();
2766 else
2767 hcu.WakeUp(DayZPlayerConstants.STANCEIDX_PRONE);
2768 }
2769 }
2770 }
2771 }
2772 else
2773 {
2774 if (m_ShouldBeUnconscious && pCurrentCommandID != DayZPlayerConstants.COMMANDID_UNCONSCIOUS && pCurrentCommandID != DayZPlayerConstants.COMMANDID_DEATH && pCurrentCommandID != DayZPlayerConstants.COMMANDID_FALL && pCurrentCommandID != DayZPlayerConstants.COMMANDID_MOD_DAMAGE && pCurrentCommandID != DayZPlayerConstants.COMMANDID_DAMAGE)
2775 {
2776 m_LastCommandBeforeUnconscious = pCurrentCommandID;
2777 HumanCommandVehicle vehicleCommand = GetCommand_Vehicle();
2778 if ( vehicleCommand )
2779 {
2780 if (vehicleCommand.ShouldBeKnockedOut())
2781 {
2782 m_TransportCache = null;
2783 vehicleCommand.KnockedOutVehicle();
2784 int damageHitAnim = 1;
2785 float damageHitDir = 0;
2786 StartCommand_Damage(damageHitAnim, m_DamageHitDir);
2787 TryHideItemInHands(false,true);
2788 }
2789 else
2790 {
2791 m_TransportCache = vehicleCommand.GetTransport();
2792 }
2793 }
2794 StartCommand_Unconscious(0);
2795 }
2796 if ( m_IsUnconscious /*&& pCurrentCommandID != DayZPlayerConstants.COMMANDID_DEATH*/)
2797 {
2798 m_IsUnconscious = false;
2799 OnUnconsciousStop(pCurrentCommandID);
2800 }
2801 }
2802
2803 // quickbar use
2804 int quickBarSlot = hic.IsQuickBarSlot();
2805 if ( quickBarSlot && IsAlive())
2806 {
2807 if (hic.IsQuickBarSingleUse())
2808 {
2809 OnQuickBarSingleUse(quickBarSlot);
2810 //Print("PlayerBase.c IsQuickBarSingleUse - slot: " + quickBarSlot.ToString());
2811 }
2812 if (hic.IsQuickBarContinuousUseStart() && ((!GetGame().IsDedicatedServer()) && !GetGame().GetUIManager().GetMenu()))
2813 {
2814 OnQuickBarContinuousUseStart(quickBarSlot);
2815 //Print("PlayerBase.c IsQuickBarContinuousUseStart - slot: " + quickBarSlot.ToString());
2816 }
2817 if (hic.IsQuickBarContinuousUseEnd() && ((!GetGame().IsDedicatedServer())))
2818 {
2819 OnQuickBarContinuousUseEnd(quickBarSlot);
2820 //Print("PlayerBase.c IsQuickBarContinuousUseEnd - slot: " + quickBarSlot.ToString());
2821 }
2822 }
2823
2824 /*if ((pCurrentCommandID == DayZPlayerConstants.COMMANDID_ACTION || pCurrentCommandID == DayZPlayerConstants.COMMANDID_MOVE || pCurrentCommandID == DayZPlayerConstants.COMMANDID_LADDER || pCurrentCommandID == DayZPlayerConstants.COMMANDID_SWIM ) )
2825 {
2826 mngr.Update(); // checks for suitable action and sets it
2827 }*/
2828 }
2829 if (m_StaminaHandler && hic)
2830 {
2832 if ( !CanConsumeStamina(EStaminaConsumers.SPRINT) || !CanSprint() )
2833 {
2834 hic.LimitsDisableSprint(true);
2835 }
2836 else
2837 {
2838 hic.LimitsDisableSprint(false);
2839 }
2840 }
2841
2842 //map closing - feel free to move to different "update" if it does not belong here
2843 if ( IsMapOpen() )
2844 {
2845 if ( !GetGame().IsDedicatedServer() )
2846 {
2847 if ( !CfgGameplayHandler.GetUse3DMap() && !GetGame().GetUIManager().IsMenuOpen(MENU_MAP) )
2848 {
2849 CloseMapEx(false);
2850 }
2851 else if ( CfgGameplayHandler.GetUse3DMap() )
2852 {
2853 if ( IsMapCallbackCancelInput() )
2854 {
2855 CloseMapEx(true);
2856 }
2857 else if ( IsMapCallbackEndInput() )
2858 {
2859 CloseMapEx(false);
2860 }
2861 }
2862 }
2863 }
2864
2865
2866#ifdef BOT
2867 if (m_Bot)
2868 m_Bot.OnUpdate(pDt);
2869#endif
2870
2871 if (m_CheckMeleeItem && (!GetGame().IsDedicatedServer()))
2872 {
2873 bool result = CheckMeleeItemDamage(m_CheckMeleeItem);
2874 //if (result)
2875 SetCheckMeleeItem();
2876 }
2877
2878 OnCommandHandlerTick(pDt, pCurrentCommandID);
2879 }
2880
2881 //MAP handling
2883 void CloseMap()
2884 {
2885 CloseMapEx(false);
2886 }
2887
2888 void CloseMapEx(bool cancelled)
2889 {
2890 if (m_hac && !m_MapClosingSyncSent)
2891 {
2892 ScriptInputUserData ctx = new ScriptInputUserData;
2893 if ( ctx.CanStoreInputUserData() )
2894 {
2895 int command_ID = DayZPlayerConstants.CMD_ACTIONINT_END;
2896 if ( cancelled )
2897 {
2898 command_ID = DayZPlayerConstants.CMD_ACTIONINT_INTERRUPT;
2899 }
2900
2901 if ( GetGame().IsMultiplayer() && GetGame().IsClient() )
2902 {
2903 ActionManagerClient mngr_client;
2904 CastTo(mngr_client, GetActionManager());
2905
2906 if ( cancelled )
2907 {
2908 mngr_client.RequestInterruptAction();
2909 }
2910 else
2911 {
2912 mngr_client.RequestEndAction();
2913 }
2914
2915 GetGame().GetMission().RemoveActiveInputExcludes({"map"});
2916 GetGame().GetMission().RemoveActiveInputRestriction(EInputRestrictors.MAP);
2917 }
2918 else if ( !GetGame().IsMultiplayer() )
2919 {
2920 m_hac.InternalCommand(command_ID);
2921 }
2922 SetMapClosingSyncSet(true);
2923 }
2924 }
2925
2926 if (!GetGame().IsDedicatedServer())
2927 {
2928 if (GetGame().GetUIManager().IsMenuOpen(MENU_MAP))
2929 {
2930 GetGame().GetUIManager().FindMenu(MENU_MAP).Close();
2931 if (m_Hud)
2932 {
2933 m_Hud.ShowHudPlayer(true);
2934 m_Hud.ShowQuickbarPlayer(true);
2935 }
2936
2937 GetGame().GetMission().RemoveActiveInputExcludes({"map"});
2938 GetGame().GetMission().RemoveActiveInputRestriction(EInputRestrictors.MAP);
2939 }
2940 }
2941 }
2942
2943 void SetMapOpen(bool state)
2944 {
2945 m_MapOpen = state;
2946 }
2947
2948 bool IsMapOpen()
2949 {
2950 return m_MapOpen;
2951 }
2952
2953 void SetMapClosingSyncSet(bool state)
2954 {
2955 m_MapClosingSyncSent = state;
2956 }
2957
2958 bool GetMapClosingSyncSent()
2959 {
2960 return m_MapClosingSyncSent;
2961 }
2962
2963 bool IsMapCallbackCancelInput()
2964 {
2965 Input input = GetGame().GetInput();
2966
2967 if ( IsRaised() || (input && (input.LocalPress("UAUIMenu",true) || input.LocalPress("UAGear",true))) )
2968 {
2969 return true;
2970 }
2971
2972 return false;
2973 }
2974
2975 bool IsMapCallbackEndInput()
2976 {
2977 Input input = GetGame().GetInput();
2978
2979 if ( input && input.LocalPress("UADefaultAction",true) )
2980 {
2981 return true;
2982 }
2983
2984 return false;
2985 }
2986
2987 MapNavigationBehaviour GetMapNavigationBehaviour()
2988 {
2989 return m_MapNavigationBehaviour;
2990 }
2991
2992 void MapNavigationItemInPossession(EntityAI item)
2993 {
2994 if (GetMapNavigationBehaviour())
2995 {
2996 GetMapNavigationBehaviour().OnItemInPlayerPossession(item);
2997 }
2998 }
2999
3000 void MapNavigationItemNotInPossession(EntityAI item)
3001 {
3002 if (GetMapNavigationBehaviour())
3003 {
3004 GetMapNavigationBehaviour().OnItemNotInPlayerPossession(item);
3005 }
3006 }
3007
3008 void SetCheckMeleeItem(ItemBase item = null)
3009 {
3010 m_CheckMeleeItem = item;
3011 }
3012
3013 /*
3014 void AirTemperatureCheck()
3015 {
3016 if( !m_Environment.IsTemperatureSet() )
3017 return;
3018 float air_temperature = m_Environment.GetTemperature();
3019 int level = 0;//default
3020 if( MiscGameplayFunctions.IsValueInRange( air_temperature, PlayerConstants.BREATH_VAPOUR_THRESHOLD_HIGH, PlayerConstants.BREATH_VAPOUR_THRESHOLD_LOW) )
3021 {
3022 float value = Math.InverseLerp( PlayerConstants.BREATH_VAPOUR_THRESHOLD_LOW, PlayerConstants.BREATH_VAPOUR_THRESHOLD_HIGH,air_temperature);
3023 value = Math.Clamp(value,0,1);
3024 level = Math.Round(Math.Lerp(1,BREATH_VAPOUR_LEVEL_MAX,value));
3025 }
3026 else if(air_temperature < PlayerConstants.BREATH_VAPOUR_THRESHOLD_HIGH)
3027 {
3028 level = BREATH_VAPOUR_LEVEL_MAX;
3029 }
3030 if( level != m_BreathVapour )
3031 {
3032 m_BreathVapour = level;
3033 SetSynchDirty();
3034 }
3035 }
3036 */
3037
3038 void SetShakesForced(int value)
3039 {
3040 m_ShakesForced = value;
3041 }
3042
3043 void FreezeCheck()
3044 {
3045 int level;
3046 if( m_ShakesForced > 0 )
3047 {
3048 level = m_ShakesForced;
3049 }
3050 else
3051 {
3052 float heat_comfort = GetStatHeatComfort().Get();
3053 if( heat_comfort <= PlayerConstants.THRESHOLD_HEAT_COMFORT_MINUS_WARNING )
3054 {
3055 float value = Math.InverseLerp( PlayerConstants.THRESHOLD_HEAT_COMFORT_MINUS_WARNING, PlayerConstants.THRESHOLD_HEAT_COMFORT_MINUS_CRITICAL,heat_comfort);
3056 level = Math.Lerp(1,7,value);
3057 level = Math.Clamp(value,1,7);
3058 /*
3059 value = Math.Clamp(value,0,1);
3060 level = Math.Round(value * SHAKE_LEVEL_MAX);//translate from normalized value to levels
3061 */
3062 }
3063 }
3064 if( level != m_Shakes )
3065 {
3066 m_Shakes = level;
3067 SetSynchDirty();
3068 }
3069 }
3070
3071 void OnUnconsciousStart()
3072 {
3073 CloseInventoryMenu();
3074 //if( GetInventory() ) GetInventory().LockInventory(LOCK_FROM_SCRIPT);
3075
3076 if ( GetInstanceType() == DayZPlayerInstanceType.INSTANCETYPE_CLIENT )
3077 {
3078 SetInventorySoftLock(true);
3079 if(m_LastCommandBeforeUnconscious != DayZPlayerConstants.COMMANDID_VEHICLE)
3080 {
3081 EntityAI entity_in_hands = GetHumanInventory().GetEntityInHands();
3082 if ( entity_in_hands && CanDropEntity(entity_in_hands) && !IsRestrained() )
3083 {
3084 DropItem(ItemBase.Cast(entity_in_hands));
3085 }
3086 }
3087 GetGame().GetSoundScene().SetSoundVolume(0,2);
3088 m_EffectWidgets.AddSuspendRequest(EffectWidgetSuspends.UNCON);
3089 }
3090
3091 if ( GetInstanceType() == DayZPlayerInstanceType.INSTANCETYPE_SERVER || !GetGame().IsMultiplayer() )
3092 {
3093 SetSynchDirty();
3094
3095 // disable voice communication
3096 GetGame().EnableVoN(this, false);
3097
3098 if ( m_AdminLog )
3099 {
3100 m_AdminLog.UnconStart( this );
3101 }
3102
3103 // When we fall uncon we force out of block
3104 if ( GetMeleeFightLogic() )
3105 {
3106 GetMeleeFightLogic().SetBlock( false );
3107 }
3108 }
3109
3110 SetMasterAttenuation("UnconsciousAttenuation");
3111
3112 //PrintString("OnUnconsciousStart");
3113 }
3114
3115 void OnUnconsciousStop(int pCurrentCommandID)
3116 {
3117 m_UnconRefillModifier =1;
3118 SetSynchDirty();
3119 //if( GetInventory() ) GetInventory().UnlockInventory(LOCK_FROM_SCRIPT);
3120 m_UnconsciousTime = 0;
3121 m_UnconsciousVignetteTarget = 2;
3122 if( GetInstanceType() == DayZPlayerInstanceType.INSTANCETYPE_CLIENT )
3123 {
3124 if ( pCurrentCommandID != DayZPlayerConstants.COMMANDID_DEATH )
3125 {
3126 GetGame().GetSoundScene().SetSoundVolume(g_Game.m_volume_sound,1);
3127 PPERequesterBank.GetRequester(PPERequester_UnconEffects).Stop();
3128 GetGame().GetMission().GetHud().ShowHudUI( true );
3129 GetGame().GetMission().GetHud().ShowQuickbarUI(true);
3130 if ( GetGame().GetUIManager().IsDialogVisible() )
3131 {
3132 GetGame().GetUIManager().CloseDialog();
3133 }
3134 if ( GetGame().GetUIManager().IsMenuOpen(MENU_RESPAWN_DIALOGUE) )
3135 {
3136 GetGame().GetUIManager().FindMenu(MENU_RESPAWN_DIALOGUE).Close();
3137 }
3138 }
3139 SetInventorySoftLock(false);
3140 m_EffectWidgets.RemoveSuspendRequest(EffectWidgetSuspends.UNCON);
3141 }
3142 if ( GetInstanceType() == DayZPlayerInstanceType.INSTANCETYPE_SERVER)
3143 {
3144 // enable voice communication
3145 if(IsAlive())
3146 GetGame().EnableVoN(this, true);
3147
3148 if ( m_AdminLog )
3149 {
3150 m_AdminLog.UnconStop( this );
3151 }
3152 }
3153
3154 SetMasterAttenuation("");
3155
3156 //PrintString("OnUnconsciousStop");
3157 }
3158
3159 void OnUnconsciousUpdate(float pDt, int last_command)
3160 {
3161 m_UnconsciousTime += pDt;
3162 if( GetGame().IsServer() )
3163 {
3164 int shock_simplified = SimplifyShock();
3165
3166 if( m_ShockSimplified != shock_simplified )
3167 {
3168 m_ShockSimplified = shock_simplified;
3169 SetSynchDirty();
3170 }
3171
3172 //PrintString(last_command.ToString());
3173 //PrintString(DayZPlayerConstants.COMMANDID_SWIM.ToString());
3174
3175 if( m_UnconsciousTime > PlayerConstants.UNCONSCIOUS_IN_WATER_TIME_LIMIT_TO_DEATH && last_command == DayZPlayerConstants.COMMANDID_SWIM )
3176 {
3177 SetHealth("","",-100);
3178 }
3179 }
3180 if( !GetGame().IsDedicatedServer() )
3181 {
3182 GetGame().GetMission().GetHud().ShowHudUI( false );
3183 GetGame().GetMission().GetHud().ShowQuickbarUI(false);
3184 if(GetPulseType() == EPulseType.REGULAR)
3185 {
3186 float shock_simple_normalized = GetSimplifiedShockNormalized();
3187
3188 float sin = Math.Sin(m_UnconsciousTime * 0.3);
3189 float sin_normalized = (sin + 1) / 2;
3190 if(sin_normalized < 0.05)
3191 {
3192 m_UnconsciousVignetteTarget = (1 - shock_simple_normalized / 3) * 2/*vignette max*/;
3193 }
3194 float vignette = Math.Lerp(2,m_UnconsciousVignetteTarget, sin_normalized);
3195 //PrintString(m_UnconsciousVignetteTarget.ToString());
3196 m_UnconParam.param1 = vignette;
3197 PPERequesterBank.GetRequester(PPERequester_UnconEffects).Start(m_UnconParam);
3198 }
3199 }
3200 }
3201
3202 int SimplifyShock()
3203 {
3204 int shock = Math.Lerp( 0, SIMPLIFIED_SHOCK_CAP, GetHealth("","Shock") / GetMaxHealth("","Shock") );
3205 shock = Math.Clamp(shock, 0, SIMPLIFIED_SHOCK_CAP);
3206 return shock;
3207 }
3208
3209 float GetSimplifiedShockNormalized()
3210 {
3211 return (m_ShockSimplified / SIMPLIFIED_SHOCK_CAP);
3212 }
3213
3214 override bool IsUnconscious()
3215 {
3216 return m_IsUnconscious;
3217 }
3218
3219 override bool CanBeTargetedByAI(EntityAI ai)
3220 {
3221 #ifdef DEVELOPER
3222 if (!m_CanBeTargetedDebug)
3223 {
3224 return false;
3225 }
3226 #endif
3227
3228 return super.CanBeTargetedByAI( ai ) && !IsUnconscious() && !IsInVehicle();
3229 }
3230
3231 void GiveShock(float shock)
3232 {
3233 AddHealth("","Shock",shock);
3234 }
3235
3236
3237 void OnRestrainStart()
3238 {
3239 CloseInventoryMenu();
3240 GetGame().GetMission().RemoveActiveInputExcludes({"inventory"},true);
3241 GetGame().GetMission().RemoveActiveInputRestriction(EInputRestrictors.INVENTORY);
3242 }
3243
3244 void ShockRefill(float pDt)
3245 {
3246 //functionality moved to ShockMdfr::OnTick
3247 }
3248
3249 //BrokenLegs
3250 // -----------------------
3251
3252 eBrokenLegs GetBrokenLegs()
3253 {
3254 return Math.AbsInt(m_BrokenLegState);//negative value denotes first time activation
3255 }
3256
3257 //Server side
3258 void SetBrokenLegs(int stateId)
3259 {
3260 m_BrokenLegState = stateId;
3261
3262 DayZPlayerSyncJunctures.SendBrokenLegsEx(this, stateId);
3263 eBrokenLegs state = GetBrokenLegs();//m_BrokenLegState can go bellow 0, cannot be used directly
3264
3265 if ( state == eBrokenLegs.NO_BROKEN_LEGS )
3266 {
3267 m_InjuryHandler.m_ForceInjuryAnimMask = m_InjuryHandler.m_ForceInjuryAnimMask & ~eInjuryOverrides.BROKEN_LEGS;
3268 m_InjuryHandler.m_ForceInjuryAnimMask = m_InjuryHandler.m_ForceInjuryAnimMask & ~eInjuryOverrides.BROKEN_LEGS_SPLINT;
3269 }
3270 else if ( state == eBrokenLegs.BROKEN_LEGS )
3271 {
3272 SetLegHealth();
3273 }
3274 else if (state == eBrokenLegs.BROKEN_LEGS_SPLINT)
3275 {
3276 // handle splint here
3277 }
3278 SetSynchDirty();
3279 }
3280
3281 //Update of state
3282 void UpdateBrokenLegs(int stateId)
3283 {
3284 eBrokenLegs state = GetBrokenLegs();
3285 //Raise broken legs flag and force to prone
3286 if (state != eBrokenLegs.NO_BROKEN_LEGS)
3287 {
3288 if ( state == eBrokenLegs.BROKEN_LEGS_SPLINT )
3289 {
3290 if ( m_MovementState.m_iStanceIdx != DayZPlayerConstants.STANCEIDX_PRONE )
3291 {
3292 m_InjuryHandler.m_ForceInjuryAnimMask = m_InjuryHandler.m_ForceInjuryAnimMask & ~eInjuryOverrides.PRONE_ANIM_OVERRIDE;
3293 m_InjuryHandler.m_ForceInjuryAnimMask = m_InjuryHandler.m_ForceInjuryAnimMask & ~eInjuryOverrides.BROKEN_LEGS;
3294 m_InjuryHandler.m_ForceInjuryAnimMask = m_InjuryHandler.m_ForceInjuryAnimMask | eInjuryOverrides.BROKEN_LEGS_SPLINT;
3295 }
3296 m_InjuryHandler.CheckValue(false);
3297
3298 }
3299 else if ( state == eBrokenLegs.BROKEN_LEGS )
3300 {
3301
3302 if ( m_MovementState.m_iStanceIdx != DayZPlayerConstants.STANCEIDX_PRONE )
3303 {
3304 m_InjuryHandler.m_ForceInjuryAnimMask = m_InjuryHandler.m_ForceInjuryAnimMask & ~eInjuryOverrides.PRONE_ANIM_OVERRIDE;
3305 m_InjuryHandler.m_ForceInjuryAnimMask = m_InjuryHandler.m_ForceInjuryAnimMask & ~eInjuryOverrides.BROKEN_LEGS_SPLINT;
3306 m_InjuryHandler.m_ForceInjuryAnimMask = m_InjuryHandler.m_ForceInjuryAnimMask | eInjuryOverrides.BROKEN_LEGS;
3307 }
3308
3309 BrokenLegWalkShock();
3310 m_InjuryHandler.CheckValue(false);
3311
3312 }
3313 }
3314 else if (state == eBrokenLegs.NO_BROKEN_LEGS)
3315 {
3316 m_InjuryHandler.m_ForceInjuryAnimMask = m_InjuryHandler.m_ForceInjuryAnimMask & ~eInjuryOverrides.BROKEN_LEGS;
3317 m_InjuryHandler.m_ForceInjuryAnimMask = m_InjuryHandler.m_ForceInjuryAnimMask & ~eInjuryOverrides.BROKEN_LEGS_SPLINT;
3318 }
3319
3320 }
3321
3322 void BreakLegSound()
3323 {
3324 PlaySoundSet(m_BrokenLegSound, SOUND_BREAK_LEG, 0.1, 0.1);
3325 }
3326 void BrokenLegForceProne(bool forceOverride = false)
3327 {
3328 if (!IsInWater() && !IsSwimming() && !IsClimbingLadder() && !IsInVehicle() && !IsClimbing() && DayZPlayerUtils.PlayerCanChangeStance(this, DayZPlayerConstants.STANCEIDX_PRONE))
3329 {
3330 if (m_MovementState.m_iStanceIdx != DayZPlayerConstants.STANCEIDX_PRONE && m_MovementState.m_iStanceIdx != DayZPlayerConstants.STANCEIDX_RAISEDPRONE)
3331 {
3332 EntityAI attachment;
3333 Class.CastTo(attachment, GetItemOnSlot("Splint_Right"));
3334 if ( attachment && attachment.GetType() == "Splint_Applied" )
3335 {
3336 attachment.Delete();
3337 }
3338
3339 m_ShockHandler.SetShock(PlayerConstants.BROKEN_LEGS_INITIAL_SHOCK);
3340 m_ShockHandler.CheckValue(true);
3341
3342
3343 if ( m_ShockHandler.GetCurrentShock() >= 25 ) //Prevent conflict with unconsciousness by not forcing prone when going uncon (25 shock or less left)
3344 {
3345
3346 //calcels user action
3347 HumanCommandActionCallback cmd = GetCommand_Action();
3348 if(cmd)
3349 {
3350 cmd.Cancel();
3351 }
3352
3353 StopHandEvent();
3354 //Get command move and verify not null
3355 HumanCommandMove hcm = StartCommand_Move();//not sure why this is here
3356 hcm = GetCommand_Move();
3357 if (hcm)
3358 {
3359 hcm.ForceStance(DayZPlayerConstants.STANCEIDX_PRONE);
3360 }
3361 }
3362 }
3363 }
3364 }
3365
3366 //Used to inflict shock when player is walking (only inflicted on Update timer)
3367 void BrokenLegWalkShock()
3368 {
3369 //No need to pursue here if player is prone as the following logic is not applied
3370 if ( m_MovementState.m_iStanceIdx != DayZPlayerConstants.STANCEIDX_PRONE && m_MovementState.m_iStanceIdx != DayZPlayerConstants.STANCEIDX_RAISEDPRONE )
3371 {
3372 float avgLegHealth = GetHealth("RightLeg","") + GetHealth("LeftLeg","") + GetHealth("RightFoot","") + GetHealth("LeftFoot","");
3373 avgLegHealth *= 0.25; //divide by 4 to make the average leg health;
3374
3375 if (IsSwimming())
3376 {
3377 //swimming other than forward is not detectable in script other than through velocity check
3378 vector v;
3379 PhysicsGetVelocity(v);
3380
3381 if(v.LengthSq() > 0)
3382 {
3383 m_ShockHandler.SetShock(PlayerConstants.BROKEN_LEGS_SHOCK_SWIM);
3384 }
3385 }
3386 else if (m_MovementState.m_iMovement != 0)
3387 {
3388 if ( IsClimbingLadder() )
3389 {
3390 MovingShock(avgLegHealth, PlayerConstants.BROKEN_LEGS_HIGH_SHOCK_WALK, PlayerConstants.BROKEN_LEGS_MID_SHOCK_WALK, PlayerConstants.BROKEN_LEGS_LOW_SHOCK_WALK);
3391 }
3392 else if( m_MovementState.m_iStanceIdx == DayZPlayerConstants.STANCEIDX_ERECT || m_MovementState.m_iStanceIdx == DayZPlayerConstants.STANCEIDX_RAISEDERECT)
3393 {
3394 if ( m_MovementState.m_iMovement > 1)//only jog and faster
3395 {
3396 MovingShock(avgLegHealth, PlayerConstants.BROKEN_LEGS_HIGH_SHOCK_WALK, PlayerConstants.BROKEN_LEGS_MID_SHOCK_WALK, PlayerConstants.BROKEN_LEGS_LOW_SHOCK_WALK);
3397 }
3398 }
3399 else if( m_MovementState.m_iStanceIdx == DayZPlayerConstants.STANCEIDX_CROUCH || m_MovementState.m_iStanceIdx == DayZPlayerConstants.STANCEIDX_RAISEDCROUCH)
3400 {
3401 //any speed other than idle
3402 MovingShock(avgLegHealth, PlayerConstants.BROKEN_LEGS_HIGH_SHOCK_WALK * PlayerConstants.BROKEN_CROUCH_MODIFIER, PlayerConstants.BROKEN_LEGS_MID_SHOCK_WALK * PlayerConstants.BROKEN_CROUCH_MODIFIER, PlayerConstants.BROKEN_LEGS_LOW_SHOCK_WALK * PlayerConstants.BROKEN_CROUCH_MODIFIER);
3403 }
3404 }
3405 else
3406 {
3407 //Here apply shock if player is standing or crouched and STANDING STILL
3408 m_ShockHandler.SetShock(PlayerConstants.BROKEN_LEGS_STAND_SHOCK);
3409 }
3410
3411 m_ShockHandler.CheckValue(true);
3412 }
3413 }
3414
3415 //Always use the same thresholds but allow passing of different shock values
3416 void MovingShock(float legHealth, float highShock, float midShock, float lowShock)
3417 {
3418 if (legHealth <= PlayerConstants.BROKEN_LEGS_LOW_HEALTH_THRESHOLD)
3419 {
3420 //Inflict "high shock"
3421 m_ShockHandler.SetShock(highShock);
3422 }
3423 else if (legHealth >= PlayerConstants.BROKEN_LEGS_HIGH_HEALTH_THRESHOLD)
3424 {
3425 //Inflict "low shock"
3426 m_ShockHandler.SetShock(lowShock);
3427 }
3428 else
3429 {
3430 //If neither high nore low, inflict "mid shock"
3431 m_ShockHandler.SetShock(midShock);
3432 }
3433 }
3434
3435 void DealShock(float dmg)
3436 {
3437 Param1<float> damage = new Param1<float>(0);
3438 damage.param1 = dmg;
3439 GetGame().RPCSingleParam(this, ERPCs.RPC_SHOCK, damage, true, GetIdentity());
3440 }
3441
3442 //Prevent player from picking up heavy items when legs are broken
3443 override bool CanPickupHeavyItem(notnull EntityAI item)
3444 {
3445 if (item.IsHeavyBehaviour() && (GetBrokenLegs() == eBrokenLegs.BROKEN_LEGS || GetBrokenLegs() == eBrokenLegs.BROKEN_LEGS_SPLINT))
3446 return false;
3447
3448 return super.CanPickupHeavyItem(item);
3449 }
3450
3451 //Set all leg zones' health to 0 in order to limit emergent behaviour and prevent confusion as to how broken legs really work
3452 void SetLegHealth()
3453 {
3454 SetHealth("RightLeg", "", 0);
3455 SetHealth("RightFoot", "", 0);
3456 SetHealth("LeftLeg", "", 0);
3457 SetHealth("LeftFoot", "", 0);
3458 }
3459
3460 void DropHeavyItem()
3461 {
3462 ItemBase itemInHands = GetItemInHands();
3463 if ( itemInHands && itemInHands.IsHeavyBehaviour() )
3464 DropItem(itemInHands);
3465 }
3466
3467 bool IsWearingSplint()
3468 {
3469 EntityAI attachment;
3470 Class.CastTo(attachment, GetItemOnSlot("Splint_Right"));
3471 if ( attachment && attachment.GetType() == "Splint_Applied" )
3472 {
3473 return true;
3474 }
3475 return false;
3476 }
3477
3478 // -----------------------
3479
3480
3481 override void OnCommandSwimStart()
3482 {
3483 ItemBase itemInHands = GetItemInHands();
3484 if (itemInHands)
3485 {
3486 if (itemInHands.IsHeavyBehaviour())
3487 {
3488 TryHideItemInHands(false);
3489 DropHeavyItem();
3490 }
3491 else
3492 {
3493 TryHideItemInHands(true);
3494 }
3495 itemInHands.OnItemInHandsPlayerSwimStart(this);
3496 }
3497 m_AnimCommandStarting = HumanMoveCommandID.CommandSwim;
3498
3499 if ( GetInventory() )
3500 GetInventory().LockInventory(LOCK_FROM_SCRIPT);
3501
3502 CloseInventoryMenu();
3503 GetDayZGame().GetBacklit().OnSwimmingStart();
3504
3505 AbortWeaponEvent();
3506 GetWeaponManager().DelayedRefreshAnimationState(10);
3507 RequestHandAnimationStateRefresh();
3508 }
3509
3510 override void OnCommandSwimFinish()
3511 {
3512 TryHideItemInHands(false, true);
3513
3514 if ( GetInventory() )
3515 GetInventory().UnlockInventory(LOCK_FROM_SCRIPT);
3516
3517 GetDayZGame().GetBacklit().OnSwimmingStop();
3518
3519 GetWeaponManager().RefreshAnimationState();
3520 }
3521
3522 override void OnCommandLadderStart()
3523 {
3524 m_AnimCommandStarting = HumanMoveCommandID.CommandLadder;
3525 TryHideItemInHands(true);
3526
3527 if ( GetInventory() )
3528 GetInventory().LockInventory(LOCK_FROM_SCRIPT);
3529
3530 CloseInventoryMenu();
3531 }
3532
3533 override void OnCommandLadderFinish()
3534 {
3535 TryHideItemInHands(false, true);
3536
3537 if ( GetInventory() )
3538 GetInventory().UnlockInventory(LOCK_FROM_SCRIPT);
3539 }
3540
3541 override void OnCommandFallStart()
3542 {
3543 m_AnimCommandStarting = HumanMoveCommandID.CommandFall;
3544
3545 if ( GetInventory() )
3546 GetInventory().LockInventory(LOCK_FROM_SCRIPT);
3547
3548 CloseInventoryMenu();
3549
3550 AbortWeaponEvent();
3551 GetWeaponManager().DelayedRefreshAnimationState(10);
3552 RequestHandAnimationStateRefresh();
3553 }
3554

3556 {

3558 GetInventory().UnlockInventory(LOCK_FROM_SCRIPT);
3559
3560 GetWeaponManager().RefreshAnimationState();
3561 }
3562

3564 {
3565 m_AnimCommandStarting = HumanMoveCommandID.CommandClimb;
3566

3575 }
3576
3577 override void OnCommandClimbFinish()
3578 {

3580 GetInventory().UnlockInventory(LOCK_FROM_SCRIPT);
3581

3583 }
3584
3585 override void OnCommandVehicleStart()
3586 {
3587 m_AnimCommandStarting = HumanMoveCommandID.CommandVehicle;
3588
3589 if ( GetInventory() )
3590 GetInventory().LockInventory(LOCK_FROM_SCRIPT);
3591
3592 ItemBase itemInHand = GetItemInHands();
3593 EntityAI itemOnHead = FindAttachmentBySlotName("Headgear");
3594
3595 if ( itemInHand && itemInHand.GetCompEM() )
3596 itemInHand.GetCompEM().SwitchOff();
3597
3598 TryHideItemInHands(true);
3599
3600 if ( itemOnHead && itemOnHead.GetCompEM() )
3601 itemOnHead.GetCompEM().SwitchOff();
3602
3603 HumanCommandVehicle hcv = GetCommand_Vehicle();
3604 if ( hcv && hcv.GetVehicleSeat() == DayZPlayerConstants.VEHICLESEAT_DRIVER )
3605 OnVehicleSeatDriverEnter();
3606 }
3607
3608 override void OnCommandVehicleFinish()
3609 {
3610 if ( GetInventory() )
3611 GetInventory().UnlockInventory(LOCK_FROM_SCRIPT);
3612
3613 TryHideItemInHands(false, true);
3614
3615 if ( m_IsVehicleSeatDriver )
3616 OnVehicleSeatDriverLeft();
3617 }
3618
3619 override void OnCommandMelee2Start()
3620 {
3621 m_AnimCommandStarting = HumanMoveCommandID.CommandMelee2;
3622 m_IsFighting = true;
3623
3624 AbortWeaponEvent();
3625 GetWeaponManager().DelayedRefreshAnimationState(10);
3626 RequestHandAnimationStateRefresh();
3627 }
3628
3629 override void OnCommandMelee2Finish()
3630 {
3631 RunFightBlendTimer();
3632
3633 GetWeaponManager().RefreshAnimationState();
3634
3635 }
3636
3637 override void OnCommandDeathStart()
3638 {
3639 m_AnimCommandStarting = HumanMoveCommandID.CommandDeath;
3640 AbortWeaponEvent();
3641 GetWeaponManager().DelayedRefreshAnimationState(10);
3642 RequestHandAnimationStateRefresh();
3643 }
3644
3645 override void OnJumpStart()
3646 {
3647 m_ActionManager.OnJumpStart();
3648
3649 AbortWeaponEvent();
3650 GetWeaponManager().DelayedRefreshAnimationState(10);
3651 RequestHandAnimationStateRefresh();
3652 CloseMapEx(true);
3653 }
3654
3655 override void OnJumpEnd(int pLandType = 0)
3656 {
3657 if(m_PresenceNotifier)
3658 {
3659 switch(pLandType)
3660 {
3661 case HumanCommandFall.LANDTYPE_NONE:
3662 case HumanCommandFall.LANDTYPE_LIGHT:
3663 m_PresenceNotifier.ProcessEvent(EPresenceNotifierNoiseEventType.LAND_LIGHT);
3664 break;
3665 case HumanCommandFall.LANDTYPE_MEDIUM:
3666 case HumanCommandFall.LANDTYPE_HEAVY:
3667 m_PresenceNotifier.ProcessEvent(EPresenceNotifierNoiseEventType.LAND_HEAVY);
3668 break;
3669 }
3670 }
3671
3672 GetWeaponManager().RefreshAnimationState();
3673 }
3674
3675 bool IsStance(int stance, int stanceMask)
3676 {
3677 return ((1 << stance) & stanceMask) != 0;
3678 }
3679
3680 override void OnStanceChange(int previousStance, int newStance)
3681 {
3682
3683 int prone = DayZPlayerConstants.STANCEMASK_PRONE | DayZPlayerConstants.STANCEMASK_RAISEDPRONE;
3684 int notProne = DayZPlayerConstants.STANCEMASK_ERECT | DayZPlayerConstants.STANCEMASK_CROUCH | DayZPlayerConstants.STANCEMASK_RAISEDERECT | DayZPlayerConstants.STANCEMASK_RAISEDCROUCH;
3685
3686 if ( ( IsStance(previousStance, prone) && IsStance(newStance, notProne) ) || ( IsStance(previousStance, notProne) && IsStance(newStance, prone) ) )
3687 {
3688 AbortWeaponEvent();
3689 GetWeaponManager().RefreshAnimationState();
3690 }
3691
3692 if ( GetGame().IsServer() )
3693 {
3694 /*
3695 if (newStance == DayZPlayerConstants.STANCEIDX_PRONE)
3696 {
3697 //Print("Update anim");
3698
3699 if (m_BrokenLegState == eBrokenLegs.BROKEN_LEGS)
3700 m_InjuryHandler.m_ForceInjuryAnimMask = m_InjuryHandler.m_ForceInjuryAnimMask & ~eInjuryOverrides.BROKEN_LEGS;
3701 else if (m_BrokenLegState == eBrokenLegs.BROKEN_LEGS_SPLINT)
3702 m_InjuryHandler.m_ForceInjuryAnimMask = m_InjuryHandler.m_ForceInjuryAnimMask & ~eInjuryOverrides.BROKEN_LEGS_SPLINT;
3703
3704 m_InjuryHandler.m_ForceInjuryAnimMask = m_InjuryHandler.m_ForceInjuryAnimMask | eInjuryOverrides.PRONE_ANIM_OVERRIDE;
3705 ForceUpdateInjuredState();
3706 }
3707 else if (previousStance == DayZPlayerConstants.STANCEIDX_PRONE || previousStance == DayZPlayerConstants.STANCEIDX_RAISEDPRONE)
3708 {
3709 m_InjuryHandler.m_ForceInjuryAnimMask = m_InjuryHandler.m_ForceInjuryAnimMask & ~eInjuryOverrides.PRONE_ANIM_OVERRIDE;
3710 //Print("Update anim 2");
3711 if (m_BrokenLegState == eBrokenLegs.BROKEN_LEGS)
3712 m_InjuryHandler.m_ForceInjuryAnimMask = m_InjuryHandler.m_ForceInjuryAnimMask | eInjuryOverrides.BROKEN_LEGS;
3713 else if (m_BrokenLegState == eBrokenLegs.BROKEN_LEGS_SPLINT)
3714 m_InjuryHandler.m_ForceInjuryAnimMask = m_InjuryHandler.m_ForceInjuryAnimMask | eInjuryOverrides.BROKEN_LEGS_SPLINT;
3715
3716 ForceUpdateInjuredState();
3717 }
3718 */
3719 }
3720 }
3721
3722 override bool CanChangeStance(int previousStance, int newStance)
3723 {
3724 return !IsRolling() && !GetThrowing().IsThrowingAnimationPlaying();
3725 }
3726
3727 override void OnCommandMoveStart()
3728 {
3729 if ( GetGame().IsServer() )
3730 {
3731 //In case player changes stance through a different command, we refresh the anim overrides
3732 int prone = DayZPlayerConstants.STANCEMASK_PRONE | DayZPlayerConstants.STANCEMASK_RAISEDPRONE;
3733 if ( !IsPlayerInStance( prone ) )
3734 {
3735 m_InjuryHandler.m_ForceInjuryAnimMask = m_InjuryHandler.m_ForceInjuryAnimMask & ~eInjuryOverrides.PRONE_ANIM_OVERRIDE;
3736 ForceUpdateInjuredState();
3737 }
3738 }
3739 }
3740
3741 override bool CanRoll()
3742 {
3743 if (!CanConsumeStamina(EStaminaConsumers.ROLL))
3744 return false;
3745
3746 if (IsInFBEmoteState() || m_EmoteManager.m_MenuEmote)
3747 {
3748 return false;
3749 }
3750
3751 return IsPlayerInStance(DayZPlayerConstants.STANCEMASK_PRONE | DayZPlayerConstants.STANCEMASK_RAISEDPRONE) && GetCommand_Move() && !GetCommand_Move().IsOnBack();
3752 }
3753
3754 override void OnRollStart(bool isToTheRight)
3755 {
3756 DepleteStamina(EStaminaModifiers.ROLL);
3757
3758 if (GetBrokenLegs() == eBrokenLegs.BROKEN_LEGS)
3759 m_ShockHandler.SetShock(PlayerConstants.BROKEN_LEGS_ROLL_SHOCK);
3760 }
3761
3762 override void OnRollFinish()
3763 {
3764 }
3765
3766 void OnJumpOutVehicleFinish(float carSpeed)
3767 {
3768 string surfaceType;
3769 int liquidType;
3770 GetGame().SurfaceUnderObject(this, surfaceType, liquidType);
3771 }
3772
3773 void OnVehicleSwitchSeat( int seatIndex )
3774 {
3775 if ( seatIndex == DayZPlayerConstants.VEHICLESEAT_DRIVER )
3776 {
3777 OnVehicleSeatDriverEnter();
3778 }
3779 else
3780 {
3781 OnVehicleSeatDriverLeft();
3782 }
3783 }
3784
3785 void OnVehicleSeatDriverEnter()
3786 {
3787 //Print("OnVehicleSeatDriverEnter");
3788
3789 m_IsVehicleSeatDriver = true;
3790 if( m_Hud )
3791 m_Hud.ShowVehicleInfo();
3792 }
3793
3794 void OnVehicleSeatDriverLeft()
3795 {
3796 //Print("OnVehicleSeatDriverLeft");
3797
3798 m_IsVehicleSeatDriver = false;
3799 if( m_Hud )
3800 m_Hud.HideVehicleInfo();
3801 }
3802
3803 override void OnThrowingModeChange(bool change_to_enabled)
3804 {
3805 if (change_to_enabled)
3806 {
3807 PlacingCancelLocal();
3808 PlacingCancelServer();
3809 }
3810 }
3811
3812 override void EOnFrame(IEntity other, float timeSlice)
3813 {
3814 //super.EOnFrame(other, timeSlice);
3815
3816 if ( GetInstanceType() == DayZPlayerInstanceType.INSTANCETYPE_CLIENT )
3817 {
3818#ifndef NO_GUI
3819 m_Hud.Update( timeSlice );
3820 m_Hud.ToggleHeatBufferPlusSign( m_HasHeatBuffer );
3821
3822 if (IsControlledPlayer() && m_EffectWidgets && m_EffectWidgets.IsAnyEffectRunning())
3823 {
3824 m_EffectWidgets.Update(timeSlice);
3825 }
3826#endif
3827 if (m_UndergroundHandler)
3828 m_UndergroundHandler.Tick(timeSlice);
3829 }
3830 }
3831
3832 override void EOnPostFrame(IEntity other, int extra)
3833 {
3834 //super.EOnPostFrame(other, extra);
3835
3836 float delta_time = (GetGame().GetTime() - m_LastPostFrameTickTime) / 1000;
3837 m_LastPostFrameTickTime = GetGame().GetTime();
3838 if ( GetInstanceType() == DayZPlayerInstanceType.INSTANCETYPE_CLIENT )
3839 {
3840 if( GetDamageDealtEffect() )
3841 {
3842 if (IsAlive())
3843 GetDamageDealtEffect().Update(delta_time);
3844 else
3845 delete GetDamageDealtEffect();
3846 }
3847
3848 if (m_EffectRadial)
3849 {
3850 if(IsAlive())
3851 {
3852 m_EffectRadial.Update(delta_time);
3853 }
3854 else
3855 m_EffectRadial = null;
3856 }
3857
3858
3859 if (GetFlashbangEffect())
3860 {
3861 if (IsAlive())
3862 {
3863 GetFlashbangEffect().Update(delta_time);
3864 }
3865 else
3866 {
3867 delete GetFlashbangEffect();
3868 }
3869 }
3870
3871 if( GetShockEffect() )
3872 {
3873 if (IsAlive())
3874 GetShockEffect().Update(delta_time);
3875 else
3876 delete GetShockEffect();
3877 }
3878
3879 m_InventoryActionHandler.OnUpdate();
3880#ifdef DEVELOPER
3881 if (m_WeaponDebug)
3882 {
3883 m_WeaponDebug.OnPostFrameUpdate();
3884 }
3885
3886 if ( GetBleedingManagerRemote() )
3887 {
3888 GetBleedingManagerRemote().OnUpdate();
3889 }
3890
3891 if (m_MeleeCombat)
3892 {
3893 if (DiagMenu.GetBool(DiagMenuIDs.DM_MELEE_DEBUG_ENABLE))
3894 {
3895 m_MeleeDebug = true;
3896 m_MeleeCombat.Debug(GetItemInHands(), m_MeleeCombat.GetHitType());
3897 }
3898 else if (!DiagMenu.GetBool(DiagMenuIDs.DM_MELEE_DEBUG_ENABLE) && m_MeleeDebug)
3899 {
3900 m_MeleeDebug = false;
3901 m_MeleeCombat.Debug(GetItemInHands(), m_MeleeCombat.GetHitType());
3902 }
3903 }
3904
3905 if (m_Environment)
3906 {
3907 if (DiagMenu.GetBool(DiagMenuIDs.DM_ENVIRONMENT_DEBUG_ENABLE))
3908 {
3909 m_Environment.ShowEnvDebugPlayerInfo(DiagMenu.GetBool(DiagMenuIDs.DM_ENVIRONMENT_DEBUG_ENABLE));
3910 }
3911 }
3912
3913 if (DiagMenu.GetBool(DiagMenuIDs.DM_SOUNDS_ITEM_IMPACT_SOUNDS))
3914 InventoryItem.DrawImpacts();
3915
3916 if (GetPluginManager())
3917 {
3918 PluginDrawCheckerboard drawCheckerboard = PluginDrawCheckerboard.Cast(GetPluginManager().GetPluginByType(PluginDrawCheckerboard));
3919 if (drawCheckerboard && !drawCheckerboard.IsActive())
3920 {
3921 drawCheckerboard.ShowWidgets(DiagMenu.GetBool(DiagMenuIDs.DM_DRAW_CHECKERBOARD));
3922 }
3923 }
3924
3925 if (m_PresenceNotifier)
3926 {
3927 m_PresenceNotifier.EnableDebug(DiagMenu.GetBool(DiagMenuIDs.DM_PRESENCE_NOTIFIER_DBG));
3928 }
3929
3930 if (DiagMenu.GetBool(DiagMenuIDs.DM_SHOW_PLAYER_TOUCHTRIGGER))
3931 {
3932 vector minmax[2];
3933 GetCollisionBox(minmax);
3934
3935 int color = COLOR_RED_A;
3936 if (m_IsInsideTrigger)
3937 color = COLOR_GREEN_A;
3938
3939 Shape dbgShape = Debug.DrawBoxEx(minmax[0], minmax[1], color, ShapeFlags.TRANSP|ShapeFlags.NOZWRITE|ShapeFlags.ONCE);
3940
3941 vector mat[4];
3942 GetTransform( mat );
3943 dbgShape.CreateMatrix( mat );
3944 dbgShape.SetMatrix( mat );
3945 }
3946#endif
3947 }
3948 }
3949
3950#ifdef DEVELOPER
3951 override void OnEnterTrigger(ScriptedEntity trigger)
3952 {
3953 super.OnEnterTrigger(trigger);
3954 ++m_IsInsideTrigger;
3955 }
3956
3957 override void OnLeaveTrigger(ScriptedEntity trigger)
3958 {
3959 super.OnLeaveTrigger(trigger);
3960 --m_IsInsideTrigger;
3961 }
3962#endif
3963
3964 void StaminaHUDNotifier( bool show )
3965 {
3966 if (m_Hud)
3967 m_Hud.SetStaminaBarVisibility( show );
3968 }
3969
3970 override void DepleteStamina(EStaminaModifiers modifier, float dT = -1)
3971 {
3972 if( GetStaminaHandler() )
3973 GetStaminaHandler().DepleteStamina(modifier,dT);
3974 }
3975
3976 override bool CanConsumeStamina(EStaminaConsumers consumer)
3977 {
3978 if(!GetStaminaHandler()) return false;
3979
3980 bool val = (GetStaminaHandler().HasEnoughStaminaFor(consumer) /*&& !IsOverloaded()*/ && !IsRestrained() && !IsInFBEmoteState());
3981
3982 if (!val)
3983 StaminaHUDNotifier( false );
3984
3985 return val;
3986 }
3987
3988 override bool CanStartConsumingStamina(EStaminaConsumers consumer)
3989 {
3990 if(!GetStaminaHandler()) return false;
3991
3992 bool val = (GetStaminaHandler().HasEnoughStaminaToStart(consumer) && !IsRestrained() && !IsInFBEmoteState());
3993
3994 if (!val)
3995 StaminaHUDNotifier( false );
3996
3997 return val;
3998 }
3999
4001 bool HasStaminaRemaining()
4002 {
4003 if (!GetStaminaHandler())
4004 return false;
4005
4006 return GetStaminaHandler().GetStamina() > 0;
4007 }
4008
4009 override bool CanClimb( int climbType, SHumanCommandClimbResult climbRes )
4010 {
4011 if (GetBrokenLegs() == eBrokenLegs.BROKEN_LEGS)
4012 {
4013 return false;
4014 }
4015
4016 if ( climbType == 1 && !CanConsumeStamina(EStaminaConsumers.VAULT) )
4017 return false;
4018
4019 if ( climbType == 2 && ( !CanConsumeStamina(EStaminaConsumers.CLIMB) || GetBrokenLegs() != eBrokenLegs.NO_BROKEN_LEGS ) )
4020 return false;
4021
4022 if ( climbType > 0 && m_InjuryHandler && m_InjuryHandler.GetInjuryAnimValue() >= InjuryAnimValues.LVL3)
4023 return false;
4024
4025 return super.CanClimb( climbType,climbRes );
4026 }
4027
4028 override bool CanJump()
4029 {
4030 if (GetBrokenLegs() != eBrokenLegs.NO_BROKEN_LEGS)
4031 {
4032 return false;
4033 }
4034
4035 if (!CanConsumeStamina(EStaminaConsumers.JUMP))
4036 return false;
4037
4039 if ( m_InjuryHandler && m_InjuryHandler.GetInjuryAnimValue() >= InjuryAnimValues.LVL3 )
4040 return false;
4041
4042 if (IsInFBEmoteState() || m_EmoteManager.m_MenuEmote)
4043 {
4044 return false;
4045 }
4046
4048 /*if (IsUnderRoofJumpCheck())
4049 {
4050 return false;
4051 }*/
4052
4053
4054 return super.CanJump();
4055 }
4056
4057 bool IsJumpInProgress()
4058 {
4059 return m_JumpClimb.m_bIsJumpInProgress;
4060 }
4061
4062 /*bool IsUnderRoofJumpCheck()
4063 {
4064 vector start = GetPosition();
4065 float size;
4066 vector to;
4067 vector contact_pos;
4068 vector contact_dir;
4069 int contact_component;
4070 if (IsPlayerInStance(DayZPlayerConstants.STANCEMASK_ERECT | DayZPlayerConstants.STANCEMASK_RAISEDERECT))
4071 {
4072 start[1] = start[1] + 1.7;
4073 }
4074 else
4075 {
4076 start[1] = start[1] + 1.7;
4077 }
4078
4079 size = 0.5;
4080 to = start;
4081 to[1] = to[1] + size;
4082
4083 return DayZPhysics.RaycastRV( start, to, contact_pos, contact_dir, contact_component, NULL, NULL, this );
4084 }*/
4085
4086 bool IsTargetInActiveRefresherRange(EntityAI target)
4087 {
4088 array<vector> temp = new array<vector>;
4089 temp = GetGame().GetMission().GetActiveRefresherLocations();
4090 int count = temp.Count();
4091 if (count > 0)
4092 {
4093 vector pos = target.GetPosition();
4094 for (int i = 0; i < count; i++)
4095 {
4096 if ( vector.Distance(pos,temp.Get(i)) < GameConstants.REFRESHER_RADIUS )
4097 return true;
4098 }
4099
4100 return false;
4101 }
4102 else
4103 {
4104 return false;
4105 }
4106 }
4107
4108 void RequestHandAnimationStateRefresh()
4109 {
4110 if ( (GetGame().IsMultiplayer() && GetGame().IsServer()) )
4111 {
4112 m_RefreshAnimStateIdx++;
4113 if (m_RefreshAnimStateIdx > 3)
4114 m_RefreshAnimStateIdx = 0;
4115 SetSynchDirty();
4116 }
4117 }
4118
4119 void RefreshHandAnimationState(int delay = 0)
4120 {
4121 if (delay == 0)
4122 {
4123 //Print("---Refreshing Hand Anim State---");
4124 GetItemAccessor().OnItemInHandsChanged(true);
4125 GetItemAccessor().ResetWeaponInHands();
4126 }
4127 else
4128 {
4129 GetGame().GetCallQueue(CALL_CATEGORY_GUI).CallLater(RefreshHandAnimationState,delay,false,0);
4130 }
4131 }
4132
4133 // -------------------------------------------------------------------------
4134 // USER ACTIONS
4135 // -------------------------------------------------------------------------
4136
4137 bool IsFacingTarget( Object target )
4138 {
4139 vector pdir = GetDirection();
4140 vector ptv = target.GetPosition() - GetPosition();
4141 pdir.Normalize();
4142 ptv.Normalize();
4143 //MessageAction(ToString(pdir)+" "+ToString(ptv)+" ");
4144 if (Math.AbsFloat(pdir[0]-ptv[0]) < 0.5 && Math.AbsFloat(pdir[2]-ptv[2]) < 0.5 )
4145 {
4146 return true;
4147 }
4148 return false;
4149 }
4150
4151 //---------------------------------------------------------
4152 void OnQuickBarSingleUse(int slotClicked)
4153 {
4154 if ( GetInstanceType() == DayZPlayerInstanceType.INSTANCETYPE_SERVER )
4155 return;
4156
4157 if ( m_AreHandsLocked )
4158 return; //Player is in the short window of time after interrupting placement of an item and before getting it back in hands
4159
4160 if ( GetInventory().IsInventoryLocked() || IsEmotePlaying() )
4161 return;
4162
4163 if ( GetThrowing().IsThrowingModeEnabled() || GetThrowing().IsThrowingAnimationPlaying() )
4164 return;
4165
4166 if ( IsRaised() || GetCommand_Melee() || IsSwimming() || IsClimbingLadder() || IsClimbing() || IsRestrained() || IsRestrainPrelocked() )
4167 return;
4168
4169 if ( GetDayZPlayerInventory().IsProcessing() || IsItemsToDelete() )
4170 return;
4171
4172 if ( GetActionManager().GetRunningAction() != null )
4173 return;
4174
4175 if ( GetWeaponManager() && GetWeaponManager().IsRunning() )
4176 return;
4177
4178 if ( !ScriptInputUserData.CanStoreInputUserData() )
4179 return;
4180
4181 //TODO MW change locking method
4182 //if( GetDayZPlayerInventory().HasLockedHands() )
4183 // return;
4184
4185 EntityAI quickBarEntity = GetQuickBarEntity(slotClicked - 1);//GetEntityInQuickBar(slotClicked - 1);
4186
4187 if ( !quickBarEntity )
4188 return;
4189
4190 Magazine mag;
4191 Weapon_Base wpn;
4192
4193 if ( Class.CastTo(mag, quickBarEntity) && Class.CastTo(wpn, mag.GetHierarchyParent()) )
4194 return;
4195
4196 EntityAI inHandEntity = GetHumanInventory().GetEntityInHands();
4197
4198 if ( !GetDayZPlayerInventory().IsIdle() )
4199 return; // player is already performing some animation
4200
4201 InventoryLocation handInventoryLocation = new InventoryLocation;
4202 handInventoryLocation.SetHands(this,quickBarEntity);
4203 if ( this.GetInventory().HasInventoryReservation(quickBarEntity, handInventoryLocation ) )
4204 return;
4205
4206 if ( inHandEntity == quickBarEntity )
4207 {
4208 if ( GetHumanInventory().CanRemoveEntityInHands() )
4209 {
4210 syncDebugPrint("[QB] Stash - PredictiveMoveItemFromHandsToInventory HND=" + Object.GetDebugName(inHandEntity));
4211 PredictiveMoveItemFromHandsToInventory();
4212 }
4213 }
4214 else
4215 {
4216 InventoryLocation invLocQBItem = new InventoryLocation;
4217 quickBarEntity.GetInventory().GetCurrentInventoryLocation(invLocQBItem);
4218 if ( GetInventory().HasInventoryReservation(quickBarEntity,invLocQBItem) )
4219 return;
4220
4221 if ( inHandEntity )
4222 {
4223 InventoryLocation Reserved_Item_il = new InventoryLocation;
4224
4225 InventoryLocation inHandEntityFSwapDst = new InventoryLocation;
4226 inHandEntity.GetInventory().GetCurrentInventoryLocation(inHandEntityFSwapDst);
4227
4228 int index = GetHumanInventory().FindUserReservedLocationIndex(inHandEntity);
4229 if ( index >= 0 )
4230 GetHumanInventory().GetUserReservedLocation( index, Reserved_Item_il);
4231
4232 if ( Reserved_Item_il )
4233 inHandEntityFSwapDst.CopyLocationFrom(Reserved_Item_il, true);
4234
4235 if ( index < 0 && GameInventory.CanSwapEntitiesEx( quickBarEntity, inHandEntity ) )
4236 {
4237 syncDebugPrint("[QB] PredictiveSwapEntities QB=" + Object.GetDebugName(quickBarEntity) + " HND=" + Object.GetDebugName(inHandEntity));
4238 PredictiveSwapEntities( quickBarEntity, inHandEntity );
4239 }
4240 else if ( GameInventory.CanForceSwapEntitiesEx( quickBarEntity, null, inHandEntity, inHandEntityFSwapDst ) )
4241 {
4242 syncDebugPrint("[QB] Swap - PredictiveForceSwapEntities HND=" + Object.GetDebugName(inHandEntity) + " QB=" + Object.GetDebugName(quickBarEntity) + " fswap_dst=" + InventoryLocation.DumpToStringNullSafe(inHandEntityFSwapDst));
4243 PredictiveForceSwapEntities( quickBarEntity, inHandEntity, inHandEntityFSwapDst );
4244 }
4245 }
4246 else
4247 {
4248 if ( GetInventory().HasInventoryReservation(quickBarEntity,handInventoryLocation) )
4249 return;
4250
4251 if ( GetInventory().CanAddEntityIntoHands(quickBarEntity) )
4252 {
4253 syncDebugPrint("[QB] Stash - PredictiveTakeEntityToHands QB=" + Object.GetDebugName(quickBarEntity));
4254 PredictiveTakeEntityToHands( quickBarEntity );
4255 }
4256 }
4257 }
4258 }
4259 //---------------------------------------------------------
4260 void OnQuickBarContinuousUseStart(int slotClicked)
4261 {
4262 if ( GetInventory().IsInventoryLocked() )
4263 return;
4264
4265 if ( IsSwimming() || IsClimbingLadder() || GetCommand_Melee() || IsClimbing() || IsRestrained() || IsRestrainPrelocked() )
4266 return;
4267
4268 ItemBase quickBarItem = ItemBase.Cast(GetQuickBarEntity(slotClicked - 1));
4269
4270 if ( GetInstanceType() == DayZPlayerInstanceType.INSTANCETYPE_CLIENT)
4271 {
4272 ItemBase itemInHands = ItemBase.Cast(GetHumanInventory().GetEntityInHands());
4273
4274 if ( itemInHands != quickBarItem )
4275 {
4276 ActionManagerClient amc = ActionManagerClient.Cast(GetActionManager());
4277
4278 if ( amc.CanPerformActionFromQuickbar(itemInHands, quickBarItem) )
4279 {
4280 amc.PerformActionFromQuickbar(itemInHands, quickBarItem);
4281 }
4282 else
4283 {
4284 if ( IsRaised() || GetCommand_Melee() )
4285 return;
4286
4287 amc.ForceTarget(quickBarItem);
4288 m_QuickBarFT = true;
4289 }
4290 }
4291 }
4292 m_QuickBarHold = true;
4293 }
4294 //---------------------------------------------------------
4295 void OnQuickBarContinuousUseEnd(int slotClicked)
4296 {
4297 if ( m_QuickBarHold )
4298 {
4299 if ( GetInstanceType() == DayZPlayerInstanceType.INSTANCETYPE_CLIENT )
4300 {
4301 ActionManagerClient am = ActionManagerClient.Cast(GetActionManager());
4302
4303 if (m_ActionQBControl)
4304 {
4305 ActionBase action = am.GetRunningAction();
4306 if (action)
4307 {
4308 if (!action.GetInput().IsActive())
4309 {
4310 am.EndActionInput();
4311 }
4312
4313 }
4314 }
4315
4316 if (m_QuickBarFT)
4317 {
4318 am.ClearForceTarget();
4319 m_QuickBarFT = false;
4320 }
4321 }
4322 }
4323 m_QuickBarHold = false;
4324 }
4325 void SetActionEndInput(ActionBase action)
4326 {
4327 m_ActionQBControl = !action.GetInput().IsActive();
4328 }
4329
4330 bool IsQBControl()
4331 {
4332 return m_ActionQBControl;
4333 }
4334 void ResetActionEndInput()
4335 {
4336 m_ActionQBControl = false;
4337 }
4338
4339 //---------------------------------------------------------
4340 // RADIAL QUICKBAR AND RELOAD ACTIONS
4341 //---------------------------------------------------------
4342 //the same functionality as normal quick bar slot key press
4343 void RadialQuickBarSingleUse( int slotClicked )
4344 {
4345 OnQuickBarSingleUse( slotClicked );
4346 }
4347
4348 //removed the need for holding down quick bar slot key
4349 void RadialQuickBarCombine( int slotClicked )
4350 {
4351 EntityAI quickBarEntity = GetQuickBarEntity( slotClicked - 1 );
4352 EntityAI entity_in_hands = GetHumanInventory().GetEntityInHands();
4353
4354 ReloadWeapon( entity_in_hands, quickBarEntity );
4355 }
4356
4357 //removed the need for holding down quick bar slot key
4358 void QuickReloadWeapon( EntityAI weapon )
4359 {
4360 EntityAI magazine = GetMagazineToReload( weapon );
4361 ReloadWeapon( weapon, magazine );
4362 }
4363
4364 //Reload weapon with given magazine
4365 void ReloadWeapon( EntityAI weapon, EntityAI magazine )
4366 {
4367 if ( GetInstanceType() == DayZPlayerInstanceType.INSTANCETYPE_CLIENT )
4368 {
4369 ActionManagerClient mngr_client;
4370 CastTo(mngr_client, GetActionManager());
4371
4372 if (mngr_client && FirearmActionLoadMultiBulletRadial.Cast(mngr_client.GetRunningAction()))
4373 {
4374 mngr_client.Interrupt();
4375 }
4376 else if ( GetHumanInventory().GetEntityInHands()!= magazine )
4377 {
4378 Weapon_Base wpn;
4379 Magazine mag;
4380 Class.CastTo( wpn, weapon );
4381 Class.CastTo( mag, magazine );
4382 if ( GetWeaponManager().CanUnjam(wpn) )
4383 {
4384 GetWeaponManager().Unjam();
4385 }
4386 else if ( GetWeaponManager().CanAttachMagazine( wpn, mag ) )
4387 {
4388 GetWeaponManager().AttachMagazine( mag );
4389 }
4390 else if ( GetWeaponManager().CanSwapMagazine( wpn, mag ) )
4391 {
4392 GetWeaponManager().SwapMagazine( mag );
4393 }
4394 else if ( GetWeaponManager().CanLoadBullet( wpn, mag ) )
4395 {
4396 //GetWeaponManager().LoadMultiBullet( mag );
4397
4398 ActionTarget atrg = new ActionTarget(mag, this, -1, vector.Zero, -1.0);
4399 if ( mngr_client && !mngr_client.GetRunningAction() && mngr_client.GetAction(FirearmActionLoadMultiBulletRadial).Can(this, atrg, wpn) )
4400 mngr_client.PerformActionStart(mngr_client.GetAction(FirearmActionLoadMultiBulletRadial), atrg, wpn);
4401 }
4402 }
4403 }
4404 }
4405
4406 //returns compatible magazine from player inventory with highest ammo count
4407 EntityAI GetMagazineToReload( EntityAI weapon )
4408 {
4409 Weapon_Base weapon_base = Weapon_Base.Cast( weapon );
4410 WeaponManager weapon_manager = GetWeaponManager();
4411 EntityAI magazine_to_reload;
4412
4413 EntityAI ammo_magazine; //magazine
4414 int last_ammo_magazine_count;
4415 int ammo_magazine_count;
4416
4417 EntityAI ammo_pile; //ammo pile
4418 int last_ammo_pile_count;
4419 int ammo_pile_count;
4420
4421 //Get all magazines in (player) inventory
4422 for ( int att_i = 0; att_i < GetInventory().AttachmentCount(); ++att_i )
4423 {
4424 EntityAI attachment = GetInventory().GetAttachmentFromIndex( att_i );
4425 ref CargoBase attachment_cargo = attachment.GetInventory().GetCargo();
4426
4427 if ( attachment_cargo )
4428 {
4429 for ( int cgo_i = 0; cgo_i < attachment_cargo.GetItemCount(); ++cgo_i )
4430 {
4431 EntityAI cargo_item = attachment_cargo.GetItem( cgo_i );
4432
4433 //check for proper magazine
4434 if ( cargo_item.IsMagazine() )
4435 {
4436 Magazine magazine = Magazine.Cast( cargo_item );
4437 ammo_pile_count = magazine.GetAmmoCount();
4438
4439 //magazines (get magazine with max ammo count)
4440 if ( weapon_manager.CanAttachMagazine( weapon_base, magazine ) || weapon_manager.CanSwapMagazine( weapon_base, magazine ) )
4441 {
4442 if ( ammo_pile_count > 0 )
4443 {
4444 if ( last_ammo_magazine_count == 0 )
4445 {
4446 ammo_magazine = magazine;
4447 last_ammo_magazine_count = ammo_pile_count;
4448 }
4449 else
4450 {
4451 if ( last_ammo_magazine_count < ammo_pile_count )
4452 {
4453 ammo_magazine = magazine;
4454 last_ammo_magazine_count = ammo_pile_count;
4455 }
4456 }
4457 }
4458 }
4459 //bullets (get ammo pile with min ammo count)
4460 else if ( weapon_manager.CanLoadBullet( weapon_base, magazine ) )
4461 {
4462 if ( ammo_pile_count > 0 )
4463 {
4464 if ( last_ammo_pile_count == 0 )
4465 {
4466 ammo_pile = magazine;
4467 last_ammo_pile_count = ammo_pile_count;
4468 }
4469 else
4470 {
4471 if ( last_ammo_pile_count > ammo_pile_count )
4472 {
4473 ammo_pile = magazine;
4474 last_ammo_pile_count = ammo_pile_count;
4475 }
4476 }
4477 }
4478 }
4479 }
4480 }
4481 }
4482 }
4483
4484 //prioritize magazine
4485 if ( ammo_magazine )
4486 {
4487 return ammo_magazine;
4488 }
4489
4490 return ammo_pile;
4491 }
4492 //---------------------------------------------------------
4493
4494
4495 //---------------------------------------------------------
4496 void OnSpawnedFromConsole()
4497 {
4498 if( GetInstanceType() == DayZPlayerInstanceType.INSTANCETYPE_SERVER || !GetGame().IsMultiplayer() )
4499 {
4500 GetGame().GetMission().AddDummyPlayerToScheduler( this );
4501 }
4502 }

4543 return false;
4544 }

4555 {

4557 SetPlayerLoad(newload);
4558

4562
4563 bool IsItemInInventory(EntityAI entity)
4564 {

4566 }
4567
4568 override bool NeedInventoryJunctureFromServer(notnull EntityAI item, EntityAI currParent, EntityAI newParent)
4569 {
4570 if (GetGame().IsMultiplayer())
4571 {
4572 DayZPlayerInstanceType t = GetInstanceType();
4573 switch (t)
4574 {
4575 case DayZPlayerInstanceType.INSTANCETYPE_AI_SINGLEPLAYER:
4576 return false;
4577 case DayZPlayerInstanceType.INSTANCETYPE_CLIENT:
4578 case DayZPlayerInstanceType.INSTANCETYPE_SERVER:
4579 case DayZPlayerInstanceType.INSTANCETYPE_AI_SERVER:
4580 case DayZPlayerInstanceType.INSTANCETYPE_AI_REMOTE:
4581 case DayZPlayerInstanceType.INSTANCETYPE_REMOTE:
4582 return true; // Might help mitigate "megabugged" (desync)
4583
4584 syncDebugPrint("[syncinv] " + GetDebugName(this) + " STS=" + GetSimulationTimeStamp() + " NeedInventoryJunctureFromServer item=" + Object.GetDebugName(item) + " currPar=" + currParent + " newPar=" + newParent);
4585
4586 bool i_owned = GetHumanInventory().HasEntityInInventory(item);
4587
4588 bool cp_owned = false;
4589 if (currParent)
4590 cp_owned = GetHumanInventory().HasEntityInInventory(currParent);
4591
4592 bool np_owned = false;
4593 if (newParent)
4594 np_owned = GetHumanInventory().HasEntityInInventory(newParent);
4595
4596 bool all_owned = i_owned && cp_owned && (np_owned || (newParent == null));
4597 syncDebugPrint("[syncinv] " + GetDebugName(this) + " STS=" + GetSimulationTimeStamp() + " NeedInventoryJunctureFromServer=" + !all_owned + " i_pwn=" + i_owned + " cp_pwn=" + cp_owned + " np_pwn=" + np_owned);
4598
4599 return !all_owned;
4600 default:
4601 Error("[syncinv] unsupported instance type t=" + t);
4602 break;
4603 }
4604 }
4605 return false;
4606 }
4607
4608 override void UpdateWeight(WeightUpdateType updateType = WeightUpdateType.FULL, float weightAdjustment = 0)
4609 {
4610 if (!GetInventory())
4611 {
4612 return;
4613 }
4614
4615 EntityAI attachment;
4616 int attCount = this.GetInventory().AttachmentCount();
4617 int loadTotal = 0;
4618
4619 for (int att = 0; att < attCount; att++)
4620 {
4621 attachment = GetInventory().GetAttachmentFromIndex(att);
4622 if (attachment)
4623 {
4624 loadTotal += attachment.GetWeight();
4625 }
4626 }
4627
4628 ItemBase itemHands = GetItemInHands();
4629 if (itemHands) // adds weight of item carried in hands
4630 {
4631 loadTotal += itemHands.GetWeight();
4632 }
4633
4634 m_Weight = loadTotal;
4635 }
4636
4637 void CalculateVisibilityForAI()
4638 {
4639 const int VISIBILITY_SLOTS_COUNT = 10;
4640
4641 int attcount = GetInventory().AttachmentCount();
4642 float sumVisibility = 0;
4643 float countVisibility = 0;
4644 float visibilityMean = 0;
4645
4646 if (attcount > 0)
4647 {
4648 for (int att = 0; att < attcount; att++)
4649 {
4650 EntityAI attachment = GetInventory().GetAttachmentFromIndex(att);
4651 if ( attachment.IsClothing() )
4652 {
4653 ClothingBase clothing;
4654 Class.CastTo(clothing, attachment);
4655 sumVisibility += clothing.GetItemVisibility();
4656 countVisibility++;
4657 }
4658 }
4659
4660 visibilityMean = (sumVisibility + (VISIBILITY_SLOTS_COUNT - countVisibility)) / VISIBILITY_SLOTS_COUNT;
4661 SetVisibilityCoef(visibilityMean);
4662 }
4663 else
4664 {
4665 visibilityMean = 1;
4666 SetVisibilityCoef(visibilityMean);
4667 }
4668 }
4669
4670 void SetVisibilityCoef(float pVisibility)
4671 {
4672 m_VisibilityCoef = pVisibility;
4673 }
4674
4675 float GetVisibilityCoef()
4676 {
4677 return m_VisibilityCoef;
4678 }
4679
4680
4681 int GetShakeLevel()
4682 {
4683 return m_Shakes;
4684 }

4688 {

4690 return GetStatLevel(health, PlayerConstants.SL_HEALTH_CRITICAL, PlayerConstants.SL_HEALTH_LOW, PlayerConstants.SL_HEALTH_NORMAL, PlayerConstants.SL_HEALTH_HIGH);
4691 }

4694 {
4695 float toxicity = GetStatToxicity().Get();
4696 return GetStatLevel(toxicity, PlayerConstants.SL_HEALTH_CRITICAL, PlayerConstants.SL_HEALTH_LOW, PlayerConstants.SL_HEALTH_NORMAL, PlayerConstants.SL_HEALTH_HIGH);
4697 }

4699 EStatLevels GetStatLevelBlood()
4700 {

4702 return GetStatLevel(blood, PlayerConstants.SL_BLOOD_CRITICAL, PlayerConstants.SL_BLOOD_LOW, PlayerConstants.SL_BLOOD_NORMAL, PlayerConstants.SL_BLOOD_HIGH);
4703 }

4708 return GetStatLevel(energy, PlayerConstants.SL_ENERGY_CRITICAL, PlayerConstants.SL_ENERGY_LOW, PlayerConstants.SL_ENERGY_NORMAL, PlayerConstants.SL_ENERGY_HIGH);
4709 }

4714 return GetStatLevel(water, PlayerConstants.SL_WATER_CRITICAL, PlayerConstants.SL_WATER_LOW, PlayerConstants.SL_WATER_NORMAL, PlayerConstants.SL_WATER_HIGH);
4715 }
4716
4718 /*
4719 EStatLevels GetImmunityLevel()
4720 {
4721 float immunity = GetImmunity();
4722
4723 EStatLevels level;
4724 if( immunity > PlayerConstants.IMMUNITY_THRESHOLD_LEVEL_HIGH )
4725 {
4726 level = EStatLevels.GREAT;
4727 }
4728 else if( immunity > PlayerConstants.IMMUNITY_THRESHOLD_LEVEL_NORMAL )
4729 {
4730 level = EStatLevels.HIGH;
4731 }
4732 else if( immunity > PlayerConstants.IMMUNITY_THRESHOLD_LEVEL_LOW )
4733 {
4734 level = EStatLevels.MEDIUM;
4735 }
4736 else if( immunity > PlayerConstants.IMMUNITY_THRESHOLD_LEVEL_CRITICAL )
4737 {
4738 level = EStatLevels.LOW;
4739 }
4740 else
4741 {
4742 level = EStatLevels.CRITICAL;
4743 }
4744
4745 if( m_ImmunityBoosted && level != EStatLevels.GREAT )
4746 {
4747 level--;
4748 }
4749 return level;
4750 }
4751 */
4752
4753 EStatLevels GetImmunityLevel()
4754 {
4755 float immunity = GetImmunity();
4756 if(m_ImmunityBoosted)
4757 return EStatLevels.GREAT;
4758 return GetStatLevel(immunity, PlayerConstants.IMMUNITY_THRESHOLD_LEVEL_CRITICAL, PlayerConstants.IMMUNITY_THRESHOLD_LEVEL_LOW, PlayerConstants.IMMUNITY_THRESHOLD_LEVEL_NORMAL, PlayerConstants.IMMUNITY_THRESHOLD_LEVEL_HIGH);
4759 }
4760
4761 //-------------------------------------
4762 float GetBordersImmunity()
4763 {
4764 float immunity = GetImmunity();
4765 float immmunity_max = 1;
4766 return GetStatLevelBorders(immunity, PlayerConstants.IMMUNITY_THRESHOLD_LEVEL_CRITICAL, PlayerConstants.IMMUNITY_THRESHOLD_LEVEL_LOW, PlayerConstants.IMMUNITY_THRESHOLD_LEVEL_NORMAL, PlayerConstants.IMMUNITY_THRESHOLD_LEVEL_HIGH, immmunity_max);
4767 }
4768
4769
4770 float GetStatBordersHealth()
4771 {
4772 float health = GetHealth("","");
4773 float health_max = GetMaxHealth("","");
4774 return GetStatLevelBorders(health, PlayerConstants.SL_HEALTH_CRITICAL, PlayerConstants.SL_HEALTH_LOW, PlayerConstants.SL_HEALTH_NORMAL, PlayerConstants.SL_HEALTH_HIGH, health_max);
4775 }
4776
4777 float GetStatBordersToxicity()
4778 {
4779 float toxicity = GetStatToxicity().Get();
4780 float toxicity_max = GetStatToxicity().GetMax();
4781 return GetStatLevelBorders(toxicity, PlayerConstants.SL_HEALTH_CRITICAL, PlayerConstants.SL_HEALTH_LOW, PlayerConstants.SL_HEALTH_NORMAL, PlayerConstants.SL_HEALTH_HIGH, toxicity_max);
4782 }
4783
4784 float GetStatBordersBlood()
4785 {
4786 float blood = GetHealth("","Blood");
4787 float blood_max = GetMaxHealth("","Blood");
4788 return GetStatLevelBorders(blood, PlayerConstants.SL_BLOOD_CRITICAL, PlayerConstants.SL_BLOOD_LOW, PlayerConstants.SL_BLOOD_NORMAL, PlayerConstants.SL_BLOOD_HIGH, blood_max);
4789 }
4790
4791 float GetStatBordersEnergy()
4792 {
4793 float energy = GetStatEnergy().Get();
4794 float energy_max = GetStatEnergy().GetMax();
4795 return GetStatLevelBorders(energy, PlayerConstants.SL_ENERGY_CRITICAL, PlayerConstants.SL_ENERGY_LOW, PlayerConstants.SL_ENERGY_NORMAL, PlayerConstants.SL_ENERGY_HIGH, energy_max);
4796 }
4797
4798 float GetStatBordersWater()
4799 {
4800 float water = GetStatWater().Get();
4801 float water_max = GetStatWater().GetMax();
4802 return GetStatLevelBorders(water, PlayerConstants.SL_WATER_CRITICAL, PlayerConstants.SL_WATER_LOW, PlayerConstants.SL_WATER_NORMAL, PlayerConstants.SL_WATER_HIGH, water_max);
4803 }
4804
4805 //------------------------------------
4806
4807 float GetStatLevelBorders(float stat_value, float critical, float low, float normal, float high, float max)
4808 {
4809 if(stat_value <= critical)
4810 {
4811 return Math.InverseLerp(0, critical, stat_value);
4812 }
4813 if(stat_value <= low)
4814 {
4815 return Math.InverseLerp(critical, low, stat_value);
4816 }
4817 if(stat_value <= normal)
4818 {
4819 return Math.InverseLerp(low, normal, stat_value);
4820 }
4821 if(stat_value <= high)
4822 {
4823 return Math.InverseLerp(normal, high, stat_value);
4824 }
4825 return Math.InverseLerp(high, max, stat_value);
4826 }
4827
4828 EStatLevels GetStatLevel(float stat_value, float critical, float low, float normal, float high)
4829 {
4830 if(stat_value <= critical)
4831 {
4832 return EStatLevels.CRITICAL;
4833 }
4834 if(stat_value <= low)
4835 {
4836 return EStatLevels.LOW;
4837 }
4838 if(stat_value <= normal)
4839 {
4840 return EStatLevels.MEDIUM;
4841 }
4842 if(stat_value <= high)
4843 {
4844 return EStatLevels.HIGH;
4845 }
4846 return EStatLevels.GREAT;
4847 }
4848
4849 void SetImmunityBoosted(bool boosted)
4850 {
4851 m_ImmunityBoosted = boosted;
4852 }
4853
4854
4855
4857 float GetImmunity()
4858 {
4859 float immunity;
4860 if( GetPlayerStats() )
4861 {
4862 float max_health = GetMaxHealth("GlobalHealth", "Health") + 0.01;//addition to prevent divisioin by zero in case of some messup
4863 float max_blood = GetMaxHealth("GlobalHealth", "Blood") + 0.01;//addition to prevent divisioin by zero in case of some messup
4864 float energy_normalized = GetStatEnergy().Get() / PlayerConstants.SL_ENERGY_MAX;
4865 float water_normalized = GetStatWater().Get() / PlayerConstants.SL_WATER_MAX;
4866 float health_normalized = GetHealth("GlobalHealth", "Health") / max_health;
4867 float blood_normalized = GetHealth("GlobalHealth", "Blood") / max_blood;
4868 immunity = energy_normalized + water_normalized + health_normalized + blood_normalized;
4869 immunity = immunity / 4;//avg
4870 immunity = Math.Clamp(immunity,0,1);
4871 }
4872 return immunity;
4873 }
4874
4875 bool IsSprinting()
4876 {
4877 return m_MovementState.m_iMovement == DayZPlayerConstants.MOVEMENT_SPRINT);
4878 }
4879
4880 bool CanSprint()
4881 {
4882 ItemBase item = GetItemInHands();
4883 if ( IsRaised() || (item && item.IsHeavyBehaviour()) )
4884 {
4885 return false;
4886 }
4887
4888 if (GetBrokenLegs() != eBrokenLegs.NO_BROKEN_LEGS)
4889 {
4890 return false;
4891 }
4892
4893 return true;
4894 }
4895
4896 bool IsInProne()
4897 {
4898 return m_MovementState.IsInProne();
4899 }
4900
4901 bool IsInRasedProne()
4902 {
4903 return m_MovementState.IsInRaisedProne();
4904 }
4905
4906 bool IsLeaning()
4907 {
4908 return m_MovementState.IsLeaning();
4909 }
4910
4911 bool IsRolling()
4912 {
4913 return GetCommand_Move() && GetCommand_Move().IsInRoll());
4914 }
4915
4916 /*
4917 override bool IsRaised()
4918 {
4919 //GetMovementState(m_MovementState);
4920 return m_MovementState.IsRaised();
4921 }
4922 */
4923
4924 bool IsSwimming()
4925 {
4926 return m_MovementState.m_CommandTypeId == DayZPlayerConstants.COMMANDID_SWIM;
4927 }
4928
4929 bool IsClimbingLadder()
4930 {
4931 return m_MovementState.m_CommandTypeId == DayZPlayerConstants.COMMANDID_LADDER;
4932 }
4933
4934 bool IsClimbing()
4935 {
4936 return m_MovementState.m_CommandTypeId == DayZPlayerConstants.COMMANDID_CLIMB;
4937 }
4938
4939 bool IsFalling()
4940 {
4941 return m_MovementState.m_CommandTypeId == DayZPlayerConstants.COMMANDID_FALL;
4942 }
4943
4944 bool IsInVehicle()
4945 {
4946 return m_MovementState.m_CommandTypeId == DayZPlayerConstants.COMMANDID_VEHICLE || (GetParent() != null && GetParent().IsInherited(Transport));
4947 }

4955 {
4956 if (m_EmoteManager)
4957 {
4958 return m_EmoteManager.IsEmotePlaying();
4959 }
4960 else

4963 }
4964 }
