4978 }
4979
4980 void RunFightBlendTimer()
4981 {
4982 if (!m_FightEndBlendTimer)
4983 m_FightEndBlendTimer = new Timer();
4984 if (!m_FightEndBlendTimer.IsRunning())
4985 {
4986 m_FightEndBlendTimer.Run(PlayerConstants.MELEE2_MOVEMENT_BLEND_DELAY,this,"EndFighting");
4987 }
4988 }
4989
4990 void EndFighting()
4991 {
4992 m_IsFighting = false;
4993 }
4994
4995 bool CheckMeleeItemDamage(ItemBase item)
4996 {
4997 //on-hit drop of melee weapons
4998 //bayonets & buttstocks
4999 if (item && item.GetHierarchyParent() && item.GetHierarchyParent().IsWeapon() && item.IsRuined()/*&& item.FindAttachmentBySlotName()*/)
5000 {
5001 PlayAttachmentDropSound();
5002 return DropItem(item);
5003 }
5004 //handheld items themselves
5005 if (item && item == GetItemInHands() && item.IsRuined())
5006 {
5007 return PredictiveDropEntity(item);
5008 }
5009 return false;
5010 }
5011
5012 void PlayAttachmentDropSound()
5013 {
5014 //TODO
5015 }
5016
5017 // -------------------------------------------------------------------------
5018 override void RPC(int rpc_type, array<ref Param> params, bool guaranteed, PlayerIdentity recipient = NULL)
5019 {
5020 super.RPC(rpc_type, params, guaranteed, recipient);
5021 }
5022
5023 // -------------------------------------------------------------------------
5024 override void OnRPC(PlayerIdentity sender, int rpc_type, ParamsReadContext ctx)
5025 {
5026 super.OnRPC(sender, rpc_type, ctx);
5027
5028 switch (rpc_type)
5029 {
5030 #ifndef SERVER
5031
5032 case ERPCs.RPC_SYNC_DISPLAY_STATUS:
5033 if ( GetVirtualHud() )
5034 {
5035 GetVirtualHud().OnRPC(ctx);
5036 }
5037 break;
5038
5039 case ERPCs.RPC_PLAYER_SYMPTOM_ON:
5040 if ( GetSymptomManager() )
5041 {
5042 GetSymptomManager().OnRPC(ERPCs.RPC_PLAYER_SYMPTOM_ON, ctx);
5043 }
5044 break;
5045
5046 case ERPCs.RPC_PLAYER_SYMPTOM_OFF:
5047 if ( GetSymptomManager() )
5048 {
5049 GetSymptomManager().OnRPC(ERPCs.RPC_PLAYER_SYMPTOM_OFF, ctx);
5050 }
5051 break;
5052
5053 case ERPCs.RPC_DAMAGE_VALUE_SYNC:
5054 if ( m_TrasferValues )
5055 m_TrasferValues.OnRPC(ctx);
5056 break;
5057
5058 case ERPCs.RPC_USER_ACTION_MESSAGE:
5059 if ( !GetInstanceType() == DayZPlayerInstanceType.INSTANCETYPE_CLIENT )
5060 {
5061 break;
5062 }
5063 if ( ctx.Read(m_UAParamMessage) )
5064 {
5065 string actiontext = m_UAParamMessage.param1;
5066 MessageAction(actiontext);
5067 }
5068 break;
5069
5070 case ERPCs.RPC_SOFT_SKILLS_SPECIALTY_SYNC:
5071 ref Param1<float> p_synch = new Param1<float>(0);
5072 ctx.Read( p_synch );
5073 float specialty_level = p_synch.param1;
5074 GetSoftSkillsManager().SetSpecialtyLevel( specialty_level );
5075 break;
5076
5077 case ERPCs.RPC_SOFT_SKILLS_STATS_SYNC:
5078 ref Param5<float, float, float, float, bool> p_debug_synch = new Param5<float, float ,float, float, bool>(0, 0, 0, 0, false);
5079 ctx.Read( p_debug_synch );
5080 float general_bonus_before = p_debug_synch.param1;
5081 float general_bonus_after = p_debug_synch.param2;
5082 float last_UA_value = p_debug_synch.param3;
5083 float cooldown_value = p_debug_synch.param4;
5084 float cooldown_active = p_debug_synch.param5;
5085 GetSoftSkillsManager().SetGeneralBonusBefore( general_bonus_before );
5086 GetSoftSkillsManager().SetGeneralBonusAfter( general_bonus_after );
5087 GetSoftSkillsManager().SetLastUAValue( last_UA_value );
5088 GetSoftSkillsManager().SetCoolDownValue( cooldown_value );
5089 GetSoftSkillsManager().SetCoolDown( cooldown_active );
5090 break;
5091
5092 case ERPCs.RPC_WARNING_ITEMDROP:
5093 {
5094 if ( GetGame().IsClient() && GetGame().GetUIManager() && !GetGame().GetUIManager().FindMenu(MENU_WARNING_ITEMDROP) )
5095 {
5096 GetGame().GetCallQueue(CALL_CATEGORY_GAMEPLAY).Call(GetGame().GetUIManager().EnterScriptedMenu,MENU_WARNING_ITEMDROP,null);
5097 GetGame().GetMission().AddActiveInputExcludes({"menu"});
5098 }
5099 break;
5100 }
5101
5102 case ERPCs.RPC_WARNING_TELEPORT:
5103 {
5104 if ( GetGame().IsClient() && GetGame().GetUIManager() && !GetGame().GetUIManager().FindMenu(MENU_WARNING_TELEPORT) )
5105 {
5106 GetGame().GetCallQueue(CALL_CATEGORY_GAMEPLAY).Call(GetGame().GetUIManager().EnterScriptedMenu,MENU_WARNING_TELEPORT,null);
5107 GetGame().GetMission().AddActiveInputExcludes({"menu"});
5108 }
5109 break;
5110 }
5111 case ERPCs.RPC_INIT_SET_QUICKBAR:
5112 ref Param1<int> count = new Param1<int>(0);
5113 if ( ctx.Read( count ) );
5114 {
5115 for ( int i = 0; i < count.param1 ; i++ )
5116 {
5117 m_QuickBarBase.OnSetEntityRPC(ctx);
5118 }
5119 }
5120 break;
5121
5122 case ERPCs.RPC_SYNC_THERMOMETER:
5123 {
5124 float value;
5125 if ( ctx.Read( value ) )
5126 m_Hud.SetTemperature( value.ToString() + "#degrees_celsius" );
5127 break;
5128 }
5129
5130
5131 case ERPCs.RPC_CHECK_PULSE:
5132 ctx.Read(CachedObjectsParams.PARAM1_INT);
5133 EPulseType pulse;
5134 if ( (CachedObjectsParams.PARAM1_INT.param1 & ActionCheckPulse.TARGET_IRREGULAR_PULSE_BIT) == 0 )
5135 {
5136 pulse = EPulseType.REGULAR;
5137 }
5138 else
5139 {
5140 pulse = EPulseType.IRREGULAR;
5141 }
5142
5143 int blood_level = ~ActionCheckPulse.TARGET_IRREGULAR_PULSE_BIT & CachedObjectsParams.PARAM1_INT.param1;
5144 if (m_CheckPulseLastTarget)
5145 {
5146 m_CheckPulseLastTarget.SetLastUAMessage(ActionCheckPulse.GetPulseMessage(pulse, blood_level));
5147 }
5148 break;
5149
5151 //woodcutting
5152 case PlantType.TREE_HARD:
5153 SoundHardTreeFallingPlay();
5154 break;
5155
5156 case PlantType.TREE_SOFT:
5157 SoundSoftTreeFallingPlay();
5158 break;
5159
5160 case PlantType.BUSH_HARD:
5161 SoundHardBushFallingPlay();
5162 break;
5163
5164 case PlantType.BUSH_SOFT:
5165 SoundSoftBushFallingPlay();
5166 break;
5167
5168 case ERPCs.RPC_DEBUG_MONITOR_FLT:
5169 if ( m_DebugMonitorValues )
5170 {
5171 m_DebugMonitorValues.OnRPCFloat(ctx);
5172 }
5173 break;
5174
5175 case ERPCs.RPC_DEBUG_MONITOR_STR:
5176 if ( m_DebugMonitorValues )
5177 {
5178 m_DebugMonitorValues.OnRPCString(ctx);
5179 }
5180 break;
5181 #endif
5182
5183
5184 /*
5185 case ERPCs.RPC_CRAFTING_INVENTORY_INSTANT:
5186 ref Param3<int, ItemBase, ItemBase> craftParam = new Param3<int, ItemBase, ItemBase>(-1, NULL, NULL);
5187 if (ctx.Read( craftParam ) )
5188 {
5189 m_ModuleRecipesManager.PerformRecipeServer(craftParam.param1, craftParam.param2, craftParam.param3, this);
5190 }
5191 break;
5192 */
5193
5194
5195
5196 #ifdef DEVELOPER
5197 case ERPCs.DEV_CAMERA_TOOLS_CAM_DATA:
5198 {
5199 if (!m_CameraToolsMenuClient)
5200 {
5201 m_CameraToolsMenuClient = new CameraToolsMenuClient();
5202 }
5203
5204 m_CameraToolsMenuClient.OnRPC(ctx);
5205 break;
5206 }
5207
5208 case ERPCs.DEV_RPC_AGENT_RESET:
5209 {
5210 bool val;
5211 if ( ctx.Read( val ) )
5212 m_AgentPool.RemoveAllAgents();
5213 break;
5214 }
5215
5216
5217 case ERPCs.DEV_REQUEST_PLAYER_DEBUG:
5218 PluginRemotePlayerDebugServer plugin_remote_server = PluginRemotePlayerDebugServer.Cast( GetPlugin(PluginRemotePlayerDebugServer) );
5219 plugin_remote_server.OnRPC(ctx, this);
5220 break;
5221
5222 case ERPCs.DEV_PLAYER_DEBUG_DATA:
5223 PluginRemotePlayerDebugClient plugin_remote_client = PluginRemotePlayerDebugClient.Cast( GetPlugin(PluginRemotePlayerDebugClient) );
5224 PluginDeveloper plugin_dev = PluginDeveloper.Cast( GetPlugin(PluginDeveloper) );
5225 if( plugin_dev.m_ScriptConsole )
5226 plugin_dev.m_ScriptConsole.OnRPCEx(rpc_type, ctx);
5227 else
5228 plugin_remote_client.OnRPC(ctx);
5229
5230 break;
5231
5232 case ERPCs.DEV_AGENT_GROW:
5233 {
5234 m_AgentPool.RemoteGrowRequestDebug(ctx);
5235 break;
5236 }
5237
5238 case ERPCs.RPC_PLAYER_SYMPTOMS_DEBUG_ON:
5239 if ( GetSymptomManager() )
5240 {
5241 GetSymptomManager().OnRPCDebug(ERPCs.RPC_PLAYER_SYMPTOMS_DEBUG_ON, ctx);
5242 }
5243 break;
5244
5245 case ERPCs.RPC_PLAYER_SYMPTOMS_DEBUG:
5246 if ( GetSymptomManager() )
5247 {
5248 GetSymptomManager().OnRPCDebug(ERPCs.RPC_PLAYER_SYMPTOMS_DEBUG, ctx);
5249 }
5250 break;
5251
5252 case ERPCs.RPC_PLAYER_SYMPTOMS_EXIT:
5253 if ( GetSymptomManager() )
5254 {
5255 GetSymptomManager().OnRPCDebug(ERPCs.RPC_PLAYER_SYMPTOMS_EXIT, ctx);
5256 }
5257 break;
5258
5259 case ERPCs.RPC_ITEM_DIAG_CLOSE:
5260 {
5261 PluginItemDiagnostic mid = PluginItemDiagnostic.Cast( GetPlugin(PluginItemDiagnostic) );
5262 mid.StopWatchRequest(this);
5263 break;
5264 }
5265
5266 case ERPCs.DEV_DIAGMENU_SUBSCRIBE:
5267 {
5268 PluginItemDiagnostic.Cast( GetPlugin(PluginItemDiagnostic)).OnRPC(this, rpc_type, ctx);
5269 break;
5270 }
5271
5272 case ERPCs.DEV_RPC_PLAYER_RESET:
5273 {
5274 if ( ctx.Read( CachedObjectsParams.PARAM1_BOOL ) )
5275 {
5276 ResetPlayer(CachedObjectsParams.PARAM1_BOOL.param1);
5277 }
5278 break;
5279 }
5280
5281 case ERPCs.DEV_RPC_INVENTORY_ACCESS:
5282 {
5283 if ( ctx.Read( CachedObjectsParams.PARAM1_BOOL ) )
5284 {
5285 DEBUG_INVENTORY_ACCESS = CachedObjectsParams.PARAM1_BOOL.param1;
5286 }
5287 break;
5288 }
5289
5290 case ERPCs.DEV_RPC_SERVER_SCRIPT:
5291 {
5292 //PluginItemDiagnostic plugin = PluginItemDiagnostic.Cast( GetPlugin(PluginItemDiagnostic) );
5293 //SetDebugDeveloper_item(plugin.GetWatchedItem(this));//!! needs to be inside DEVELOPER ifdef
5294
5295 if ( ctx.Read(CachedObjectsParams.PARAM1_STRING))
5296 {
5297 _player = this;
5298 string code = CachedObjectsParams.PARAM1_STRING.param1;
5299 bool success = GetGame().ExecuteEnforceScript("void scConsMain() \n{\n" + code + "\n}\n", "scConsMain");
5300 CachedObjectsParams.PARAM1_BOOL.param1 = success;
5301 RPCSingleParam(ERPCs.DEV_RPC_SERVER_SCRIPT_RESULT, CachedObjectsParams.PARAM1_BOOL,true, GetIdentity());
5302 }
5303 break;
5304 }
5305
5306 case ERPCs.DEV_RPC_SERVER_SCRIPT_RESULT:
5307 {
5308 PluginDeveloper dev = PluginDeveloper.Cast( GetPlugin(PluginDeveloper) );
5309 if( dev.m_ScriptConsole )
5310 dev.m_ScriptConsole.OnRPCEx(rpc_type, ctx);
5311 break;
5312 }
5313
5314 case ERPCs.DEV_SET_DEV_ITEM:
5315 {
5316 Param1<EntityAI> ent = new Param1<EntityAI>(null);
5317 if (ctx.Read(ent) && ent.param1)
5318 {
5319 PluginItemDiagnostic mid2 = PluginItemDiagnostic.Cast( GetPlugin(PluginItemDiagnostic) );
5320 mid2.RegisterDebugItem( ent.param1, this);
5321 }
5322 //SetDebugDeveloper_item(this);
5323 break;
5324 }
5325
5326 case ERPCs.RPC_ITEM_DIAG:
5327 {
5328 Param1<EntityAI> p1 = new Param1<EntityAI>(null);
5329 if (ctx.Read(p1))
5330 {
5331 PluginItemDiagnostic plgn = PluginItemDiagnostic.Cast( GetPlugin( PluginItemDiagnostic ) );
5332 plgn.OnRPC( p1.param1, ctx );
5333 }
5334 break;
5335 }
5336
5338 case ERPCs.DEV_REQUEST_UTS_DEBUG:
5339 PluginUniversalTemperatureSourceServer plugin_uts_server = PluginUniversalTemperatureSourceServer.Cast(GetPlugin(PluginUniversalTemperatureSourceServer));
5340 plugin_uts_server.OnRPC(ctx, this);
5341 break;
5342
5343 case ERPCs.DEV_UTS_DEBUG_DATA:
5344 PluginUniversalTemperatureSourceClient plugin_uts_client = PluginUniversalTemperatureSourceClient.Cast(GetPlugin(PluginUniversalTemperatureSourceClient));
5345 plugin_uts_client.OnRPC(ctx);
5346 break;
5348 #endif
5349 }
5350

5355

5365 }
5366
5367 override void OnGameplayDataHandlerSync()
5368 {
5369 super.OnGameplayDataHandlerSync();
5370
5371 UpdateLighting();
5372 //Print("setting respawn to " + CfgGameplayHandler.GetDisableRespawnDialog());
5373 GetGame().GetMission().SetRespawnModeClient(CfgGameplayHandler.GetDisableRespawnDialog());//TODO: maybe move to mission/game ?
5374 SetHitPPEEnabled(CfgGameplayHandler.GetHitIndicationPPEEnabled());
5375 }
5376
5377 void UpdateLighting()
5378 {
5379 Mission mission = GetGame().GetMission();
5380 if ( mission )
5381 {
5382 WorldLighting wLighting = mission.GetWorldLighting();
5383 if ( wLighting )
5384 wLighting.SetGlobalLighting( CfgGameplayHandler.GetLightingConfig());
5385 }
5386 }
5387
5388 void SetContaminatedEffectEx(bool enable, int ppeIdx = -1, int aroundId = ParticleList.CONTAMINATED_AREA_GAS_AROUND, int tinyId = ParticleList.CONTAMINATED_AREA_GAS_TINY, string soundset = "", bool partDynaUpdate = false, int newBirthRate = 0 )
5389 {
5390 if ( enable ) // enable
5391 {
5392 // We assume that if this is set to true the PPE is already active
5393 if ( m_ContaminatedAreaEffectEnabled == enable )
5394 return;
5395
5396 if ( aroundId !=0 )
5397 {
5398 if (!m_ContaminatedAroundPlayer)
5399 {
5400 m_ContaminatedAroundPlayer = ParticleManager.GetInstance().PlayInWorld( aroundId, GetPosition());
5401 }
5402 // First entry in an area with dynamic tweaks to particles
5403 if ( partDynaUpdate )
5404 {
5405 m_ContaminatedAroundPlayer.SetParameter( 0, EmitorParam.BIRTH_RATE, newBirthRate );
5406 }
5407 }
5408
5409 if ( !m_ContaminatedAroundPlayerTiny && tinyId !=0 )
5410 {
5411 m_ContaminatedAroundPlayerTiny = ParticleManager.GetInstance().PlayInWorld( tinyId, GetPosition() );
5412 }
5413
5414 if ( ppeIdx != -1 )
5415 {
5416 PPERequesterBase ppeRequester;
5417 if ( Class.CastTo( ppeRequester, PPERequesterBank.GetRequester( ppeIdx ) ) )
5418 ppeRequester.Start();
5419 }
5420
5421 // We start playing the ambient sound
5422 if (!m_AmbientContamination && soundset != "")
5423 PlaySoundSetLoop( m_AmbientContamination, soundset, 0.1, 0.1 );
5424
5425 m_ContaminatedAreaEffectEnabled = enable;
5426 }
5427 else // disable
5428 {
5429 if ( m_ContaminatedAroundPlayer )
5430 {
5431 m_ContaminatedAroundPlayer.Stop();
5432 m_ContaminatedAroundPlayer = null;
5433 }
5434
5435 if (m_ContaminatedAroundPlayerTiny)
5436 {
5437 m_ContaminatedAroundPlayerTiny.Stop();
5438 m_ContaminatedAroundPlayerTiny = null;
5439 }
5440 if (ppeIdx != -1)
5441 PPERequesterBank.GetRequester( ppeIdx ).Stop(new Param1<bool>(true)); //fade out
5442
5443 // We stop the ambient sound
5444 if ( m_AmbientContamination )
5445 StopSoundSet( m_AmbientContamination );
5446
5447 // We make sure to reset the state
5448 m_ContaminatedAreaEffectEnabled = enable;
5449 }
5450 }
5451
5452 void SetContaminatedEffect(bool enable, int ppeIdx = -1, int aroundId = ParticleList.CONTAMINATED_AREA_GAS_AROUND, int tinyId = ParticleList.CONTAMINATED_AREA_GAS_TINY, bool partDynaUpdate = false, int newBirthRate = 0 )
5453 {
5454 SetContaminatedEffectEx(enable, ppeIdx, aroundId, tinyId, "", partDynaUpdate, newBirthRate);
5455 }
5456
5457 // -------------------------------------------------------------------------
5458 void UpdateCorpseState()
5459 {
5460 UpdateCorpseStateVisual();
5461 if(m_CorpseState > 0)
5462 SetDecayEffects(Math.AbsInt(m_CorpseState));
5463 else if(m_CorpseState < 0)
5464 SetDecayEffects();//no params means remove the effects
5465 m_CorpseStateLocal = m_CorpseState;
5466 }
5467
5468 // -------------------------------------------------------------------------
5469 override void EEHealthLevelChanged(int oldLevel, int newLevel, string zone)
5470 {
5471 super.EEHealthLevelChanged(oldLevel, newLevel, zone);
5472 if ( !GetGame().IsDedicatedServer() )
5473 {
5474 if (newLevel == GameConstants.STATE_RUINED)
5475 {
5476 ClearLastUAMessage();
5477 }
5478 if (m_CorpseState != 0)
5479 {
5480 GetGame().GetCallQueue( CALL_CATEGORY_GUI ).CallLater( UpdateCorpseState, 0, false);
5481 }
5482 }
5483 }
5484
5485
5486 // -------------------------------------------------------------------------
5487 override void OnVariablesSynchronized()
5488 {
5489 super.OnVariablesSynchronized();
5490 if ( m_ModuleLifespan )
5491 {
5492 m_ModuleLifespan.SynchLifespanVisual( this, m_LifeSpanState, m_HasBloodyHandsVisible, m_HasBloodTypeVisible, m_BloodType );
5493
5494 if (m_LifespanLevelLocal != m_LifeSpanState) //client solution, lifespan level changed
5495 {
5496 m_LifespanLevelLocal = m_LifeSpanState;
5497 UpdateHairSelectionVisibility();
5498 }
5499 }
5500
5501 CheckSoundEvent();
5502 if ( GetBleedingManagerRemote() && IsPlayerLoaded() )
5503 {
5504 GetBleedingManagerRemote().OnVariablesSynchronized(GetBleedingBits());
5505 }
5506
5507 if( m_CorpseStateLocal != m_CorpseState && (IsPlayerLoaded() || IsControlledPlayer()) )
5508 {
5509 UpdateCorpseState();
5510 }
5511
5512 if(m_RefreshAnimStateIdx != m_LocalRefreshAnimStateIdx)
5513 {
5514 RefreshHandAnimationState(396); //mean animation blend time
5515 m_LocalRefreshAnimStateIdx = m_RefreshAnimStateIdx;
5516 }
5517 //-------MODIFIERS START--------
5518 if (m_SyncedModifiers != m_SyncedModifiersPrev)
5519 {
5520 int diff = (m_SyncedModifiers & ~m_SyncedModifiersPrev) | (~m_SyncedModifiers & m_SyncedModifiersPrev);//XOR gets us a mask for modifiers that changed by either deactivating, or activating
5521
5522 if (eModifierSyncIDs.MODIFIER_SYNC_DROWNING & diff)//has this modifier's status as active/inactive changed ?
5523 {
5524 if (eModifierSyncIDs.MODIFIER_SYNC_DROWNING & m_SyncedModifiers)//is this modifier currently active ? if so, it means it's been just activated
5525 {
5526 SetDrowning(true);
5527 }
5528 else
5529 {
5530 SetDrowning(false);
5531 }
5532
5533 }
5534
5535 m_SyncedModifiersPrev = m_SyncedModifiers;
5536 }
5537 //-------MODIFIERS END--------
5538
5539 HandleBrokenLegsSync();
5540
5542 ItemBase itemHands = GetItemInHands();
5543 if (itemHands)
5544 {
5545 RemotelyActivatedItemBehaviour raib = itemHands.GetRemotelyActivatedItemBehaviour();
5546 if (raib)
5547 {
5548 raib.OnVariableSynchronized();
5549 }
5550 }
5551 }
5552
5553 void HandleBrokenLegsSync()
5554 {
5555 if (m_BrokenLegState != m_LocalBrokenState)
5556 {
5557 m_LocalBrokenState = m_BrokenLegState;
5558 bool initial = (m_BrokenLegState < 0);
5559 int state = GetBrokenLegs();
5560 if ( state == eBrokenLegs.BROKEN_LEGS )
5561 {
5562 //Print(m_BrokenLegState);
5563 if (initial)// <0 values indicate initial activation
5564 {
5565 //Print("synced variables - inital activation of broken legs");
5566 BreakLegSound();
5567 }
5568 else
5569 {
5570 //Print("synced variables - secondary activation of broken legs");
5571 }
5572 }
5573 }
5574 }
5575
5576
5577
5578 void FixAllInventoryItems()
5579 {
5580 GameInventory inv = PlayerBase.Cast(this).GetInventory();
5581 ref array<EntityAI> items = new array<EntityAI>;
5582 inv.EnumerateInventory(InventoryTraversalType.INORDER, items);
5583 for(int i = 0; i < items.Count(); i++)
5584 {
5585 EntityAI item = items.Get(i);
5586 item.SetHealthMax("","");
5587 //Print("Fixing item: "+item);
5588 }
5589 }
5590
5591
5592 void OnInventoryMenuOpen()
5593 {
5594
5595 }
5596
5597 void OnInventoryMenuClose()
5598 {
5599
5600 }
5601
5602 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------
5603 void OnSelectPlayer()
5604 {
5605 //Print("PlayerBase | OnSelectPlayer()");
5606 m_QuickBarBase.updateSlotsCount();
5607
5608 m_PlayerSelected = true;
5609
5610 m_WeaponManager.SortMagazineAfterLoad();
5611
5612 if ( GetInstanceType() == DayZPlayerInstanceType.INSTANCETYPE_SERVER || !GetGame().IsMultiplayer() )
5613 {
5615 SetAITargetCallbacks(new AITargetCallbacksPlayer(this));
5616
5617 array<ref Param> params = new array<ref Param>;
5618 if ( m_aQuickBarLoad )
5619 {
5620 int count = m_aQuickBarLoad.Count();
5621 Param1<int> paramCount = new Param1<int>(count);
5622 params.Insert(paramCount);
5623 for (int i = 0; i < count; i++)
5624 {
5625 m_QuickBarBase.OnSetEntityNoSync(m_aQuickBarLoad.Get(i).param1,m_aQuickBarLoad.Get(i).param2);
5626 params.Insert(m_aQuickBarLoad.Get(i));
5627 }
5628
5629 if (count > 0 && GetGame().IsMultiplayer() )
5630 {
5631 GetGame().RPC(this, ERPCs.RPC_INIT_SET_QUICKBAR, params, true, GetIdentity());
5632 }
5633 m_aQuickBarLoad = NULL;
5634 }
5635
5636 GetSoftSkillsManager().InitSpecialty( GetStatSpecialty().Get() );
5637 GetModifiersManager().SetModifiers(true);
5638
5639 SetSynchDirty();
5640
5641 if ( GetGame().IsMultiplayer() )
5642 {
5643 //Drop item warning
5644 if ( m_ProcessUIWarning )
5645 {
5646 GetGame().RPCSingleParam(this, ERPCs.RPC_WARNING_ITEMDROP, null, true, GetIdentity());
5647 m_ProcessUIWarning = false;
5648 }
5649
5650 GetGame().GetMission().SyncRespawnModeInfo(GetIdentity());
5651 }
5652 }
5653
5654 CheckForGag();
5655
5656 if (GetInstanceType() == DayZPlayerInstanceType.INSTANCETYPE_SERVER)
5657 {
5658 m_ActionManager = new ActionManagerServer(this);
5659 m_ConstructionActionData = new ConstructionActionData();
5660
5661 }
5662 else if (GetInstanceType() == DayZPlayerInstanceType.INSTANCETYPE_CLIENT)
5663 {
5664 m_ActionManager = new ActionManagerClient(this);
5665 m_CraftingManager = new CraftingManager(this,m_ModuleRecipesManager);
5666 m_ConstructionActionData = new ConstructionActionData();
5667
5668 }
5669
5670 if ( GetInstanceType() == DayZPlayerInstanceType.INSTANCETYPE_CLIENT )
5671 {
5672 //m_PlayerLightManager = new PlayerLightManager(this);
5673 if (GetGame().GetMission())
5674 {
5675 GetGame().GetMission().ResetGUI();
5676 // force update player
5677 GetDayZGame().GetBacklit().UpdatePlayer(true);
5678 }
5679
5680 m_DeathCheckTimer = new Timer();
5681 m_DeathCheckTimer.Run(0.1, this, "CheckDeath", null, true);
5682 PPEManagerStatic.GetPPEManager().StopAllEffects(PPERequesterCategory.ALL);
5683 CheckForBurlap();
5684
5685 int characterCount = GetGame().GetMenuData().GetCharactersCount() - 1;
5686 int idx = GetGame().GetMenuData().GetLastPlayedCharacter();
5687 if ( idx == GameConstants.DEFAULT_CHARACTER_MENU_ID || idx > characterCount )
5688 {
5689 GetGame().GetCallQueue(CALL_CATEGORY_GUI).Call(SetNewCharName);
5690 }
5691
5692 GetGame().GetMission().EnableAllInputs(true);
5693
5694 m_PresenceNotifier = PluginPresenceNotifier.Cast( GetPlugin( PluginPresenceNotifier ) );
5695 m_PresenceNotifier.Init(this);
5696 OnGameplayDataHandlerSync();//only here for legacy reasons
5697 }
5698
5699#ifdef BOT
5700 m_Bot = new Bot(this);
5701 m_Bot.Start(true, new MyBotTrigger(this));
5702#endif
5703 }
5704
5705 override void SimulateDeath(bool state)
5706 {
5707 super.SimulateDeath(state);
5708
5709 m_UndergroundHandler = null;
5710 if (m_EffectWidgets)
5711 {
5712 m_EffectWidgets.StopAllEffects();
5713 m_EffectWidgets.ClearSuspendRequests();
5714 }
5715 }
5716
5717 void SetNewCharName()
5718 {
5719 //Print("SetNewCharName");
5720 g_Game.GetMenuData().SaveCharacter(false,true);
5721 g_Game.GetMenuData().SetCharacterName(g_Game.GetMenuData().GetLastPlayedCharacter(), g_Game.GetMenuDefaultCharacterData(false).GetCharacterName() );
5722 //g_Game.GetMenuData().SaveCharacter(false,true);
5723 g_Game.GetMenuData().SaveCharactersLocal();
5724 }
5725
5726 void CheckForBurlap()
5727 {
5728 if ( GetInstanceType() == DayZPlayerInstanceType.INSTANCETYPE_CLIENT )
5729 {
5730 BurlapSackCover attachment;
5731 Class.CastTo(attachment, GetInventory().FindAttachment(InventorySlots.HEADGEAR));
5732
5733 PPERequester_BurlapSackEffects req;
5734 if (Class.CastTo(req,PPERequesterBank.GetRequester(PPERequesterBank.REQ_BURLAPSACK)))
5735 {
5736 if ( attachment )
5737 {
5738 req.Start();
5739 }
5740 else if (req.IsRequesterRunning())
5741 {
5742 PPERequesterBank.GetRequester(PPERequester_BurlapSackEffects).Stop();
5743 }
5744 }
5745 }
5746 }
5747
5748 void CheckForGag()
5749 {
5750 Clothing item;
5751 Class.CastTo(item, GetInventory().FindAttachment(InventorySlots.MASK));
5752 if ( !item )
5753 {
5754 Class.CastTo(item, GetInventory().FindAttachment(InventorySlots.HEADGEAR));
5755 }
5756
5757 if ( item && item.IsObstructingVoice() )
5758 {
5759 item.MutePlayer(this,true);
5760 }
5761 else
5762 {
5763 if (( GetGame().IsServer() && GetGame().IsMultiplayer() ) || ( GetGame().GetPlayer() == this ))
5764 {
5765 GetGame().SetVoiceEffect(this, VoiceEffectMumbling, false);
5766 GetGame().SetVoiceEffect(this, VoiceEffectObstruction, false);
5767 }
5768 }
5769 }
5770
5771 void UpdateMaskBreathWidget(notnull MaskBase mask, bool is_start = false)
5772 {
5773 if(is_start)
5774 m_EffectWidgets.ResetMaskUpdateCount();
5775 float resistance = 0;
5776 if ( mask.HasIntegratedFilter() || mask.IsExternalFilterAttached() )
5777 resistance = 1 - mask.GetFilterQuantity01();
5778
5779
5780 m_EffectWidgets.OnVoiceEvent(resistance);
5781 m_EffectWidgets.IncreaseMaskUpdateCount();
5782
5783 }
5784
5785
5786 // -------------------------------------------------------------------------
5787 void OnVoiceEvent(PlayerSoundEventBase voice_event)
5788 {
5789 if (m_EffectWidgets)
5790 {
5791 MaskBase mask = MaskBase.Cast(GetInventory().FindAttachment(InventorySlots.MASK));
5792 if (mask)
5793 {
5794 UpdateMaskBreathWidget(mask, true);
5795 //m_EffectWidgets.SetBreathIntensityStamina(GetStaminaHandler().GetStaminaCap(),GetStaminaHandler().GetStamina());
5796 }
5797 }
5798 }
5799
5800 // -------------------------------------------------------------------------
5802 void OnVoiceEventPlayback(PlayerSoundEventBase voice_event, AbstractWave callback, float playback_time)
5803 {
5804 if (m_EffectWidgets)
5805 {
5806 MaskBase mask = MaskBase.Cast(GetInventory().FindAttachment(InventorySlots.MASK));
5807 if (mask)
5808 {
5809 if ( m_EffectWidgets.m_MaskWidgetUpdateCount < 2 && callback.GetLength() > 2 && playback_time > 0.5 )
5810 UpdateMaskBreathWidget(mask);
5811 }
5812 }
5813 }
5814
5815
5816 // -------------------------------------------------------------------------
5817 override bool OnInputUserDataProcess(int userDataType, ParamsReadContext ctx)
5818 {
5819 if( super.OnInputUserDataProcess(userDataType, ctx) )
5820 return true;
5821
5822 if( m_QuickBarBase.OnInputUserDataProcess(userDataType, ctx) )
5823 return true;
5824
5825 if( m_WeaponManager.OnInputUserDataProcess(userDataType, ctx) )
5826 return true;
5827
5828 if( HandleRemoteItemManipulation(userDataType, ctx) )
5829 return true;
5830
5831 if ( userDataType == INPUT_UDT_INVENTORY && GetHumanInventory().OnInputUserDataProcess(ctx) )
5832 return true;
5833
5834 if ( TogglePlacingServer( userDataType, ctx ) )
5835 return true;
5836
5837 if ( ResetADSPlayerSync( userDataType, ctx ) )
5838 return true;
5839
5840 string uid;
5841 bool mute;
5842 if( userDataType == INPUT_UDT_USER_MUTE_XBOX )
5843 {
5844 if( ctx.Read( uid ) && ctx.Read( mute ) )
5845 {
5846 GetGame().MutePlayer( uid, GetIdentity().GetPlainId(), mute );
5847 // commented because plainID should not be present in logs
5848 //Print( "Player: " + GetIdentity().GetId() + " set mute for " + uid + " to " + mute );
5849 }
5850 }
5851
5852 if( m_EmoteManager && userDataType == INPUT_UDT_GESTURE )
5853 return m_EmoteManager.OnInputUserDataProcess(userDataType, ctx);
5854
5855 if( userDataType == INPUT_UDT_WEAPON_LIFT_EVENT )
5856 return ReadLiftWeaponRequest(userDataType, ctx);
5857
5858 if( m_ActionManager )
5859 return m_ActionManager.OnInputUserDataProcess(userDataType, ctx);
5860 return false;
5861 }
5862
5863 float GetHealthRegenSpeed()
5864 {
5865 float blood = GetHealth("GlobalHealth", "Blood");
5866 float blood_scale_normalized = Math.InverseLerp(PlayerConstants.BLOOD_THRESHOLD_FATAL, GetMaxHealth("", "Blood"), blood);
5867 blood_scale_normalized = Math.Clamp(blood_scale_normalized,0,1);
5868 return Math.Lerp(PlayerConstants.HEALTH_REGEN_MIN, PlayerConstants.HEALTH_REGEN_MAX, blood_scale_normalized);
5869 }
5870
5871 bool HandleRemoteItemManipulation(int userDataType, ParamsReadContext ctx)
5872 {
5873 if( userDataType == INPUT_UDT_ITEM_MANIPULATION )
5874 {
5875 int type = -1;
5876 ItemBase item1 = null;
5877 ItemBase item2 = null;
5878 bool use_stack_max = false;
5879 int slot_id = -1;
5880
5881 if (!ctx.Read(type))
5882 return false;
5883
5884 if (type == 4)
5885 {
5886 if (!ctx.Read(item1))
5887 return false;
5888 InventoryLocation dst = new InventoryLocation;
5889 if (dst.ReadFromContext(ctx))
5890 {
5891 //Print(InventoryLocation.DumpToStringNullSafe(dst));
5892 bool dummy;
5893 if (ctx.Read(dummy))
5894 item1.SplitItemToInventoryLocation(dst);
5895 else
5896 item1.SplitIntoStackMaxToInventoryLocation(dst);
5897 return true;
5898 }
5899 return false;
5900 }
5901
5902 if (!ctx.Read(item1))
5903 return false;
5904 if (!ctx.Read(item2))
5905 return false;
5906 if (!ctx.Read(use_stack_max))
5907 return false;
5908 if (!ctx.Read(slot_id))
5909 return false;
5910
5911 if ( type == -1 && item1 && item2 )//combine
5912 {
5913 item1.CombineItems( item2, use_stack_max );
5914 }
5915 else if ( type == 1 && item1 )
5916 {
5917 if ( use_stack_max )
5918 item1.SplitIntoStackMax(item2, slot_id, this);
5919 else
5920 item1.SplitItem(this);
5921 }
5922 else if ( type == 2 && item1 )
5923 {
5924 int row, col;
5925 if ( !ctx.Read( row ) )
5926 return false;
5927 if ( !ctx.Read( col ) )
5928 return false;
5929 item1.SplitIntoStackMaxCargo( item2, slot_id, row, col );
5930 }
5931 else if ( type == 3 && item1 )
5932 {
5933 item1.SplitIntoStackMaxHands( this );
5934 }
5935 return true;
5936 }
5937 return false;
5938 }
5939
5940 // -------------------------------------------------------------------------
5941 ItemBase GetItemInHands()
5942 {
5943 if (GetHumanInventory())
5944 {
5945 return ItemBase.Cast( GetHumanInventory().GetEntityInHands() );
5946 }
5947 return null;
5948
5949 }
5950
5951 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------
5952
5953
5954 override EntityAI SpawnEntityOnGroundPos(string object_name, vector pos)
5955 {
5956 if ( GetInstanceType() == DayZPlayerInstanceType.INSTANCETYPE_SERVER || !GetGame().IsMultiplayer() )
5957 {
5958 bool is_AI = GetGame().IsKindOf( object_name, "DZ_LightAI");
5959 if (is_AI)
5960 {
5961 return SpawnAI(object_name, pos);
5962 }
5963 else
5964 {
5965 InventoryLocation inv_loc = new InventoryLocation;
5966 vector mtx[4];
5967 Math3D.MatrixIdentity4(mtx);
5968 mtx[3] = pos;
5969 inv_loc.SetGround(NULL, mtx);
5970 //return GetGame().SpawnEntity(object_name, inv_loc, ECE_PLACE_ON_SURFACE, RF_DEFAULT);
5971 return EntityAI.Cast(GetGame().CreateObjectEx(object_name, inv_loc.GetPos(), ECE_PLACE_ON_SURFACE));
5972 }
5973 }
5974 return null;
5975 }
5976
5977 EntityAI SpawnEntityOnGroundOnCursorDir(string object_name, float distance)
5978 {
5979 vector position = GetPosition() + ( GetDirection() * distance );
5980 return SpawnEntityOnGroundPos(object_name, position);
5981 }
5982
5983 EntityAI SpawnAI(string object_name, vector pos)
5984 {
5985 bool is_ai = GetGame().IsKindOf( object_name, "DZ_LightAI");
5986 if (is_ai)
5987 {
5988 return EntityAI.Cast( GetGame().CreateObjectEx(object_name, pos, ECE_PLACE_ON_SURFACE|ECE_INITAI|ECE_EQUIP_ATTACHMENTS) );
5989 }
5990 return NULL;
5991 }
5992
5993
5994 /*EntityAI SpawnAttachmentOnPointerPos (string object_name, bool full_quantity, EntityAI attachmentObject = NULL)
5995 {
5996 Object cursor_obj = GetCursorObject();
5997 if ( cursor_obj != NULL && cursor_obj.IsInherited(EntityAI) )
5998 {
5999 EntityAI eai = (EntityAI)cursor_obj;

6001 }
6002 else if ( attachmentObject != NULL)
6003 {

6005 }

6007
6021 /*EntityAI SpawnItem (string object_name, bool full_quantity, float distance = 0, bool usePosition = false, vector pos = "0 0 0", EntityAI attachmentObject = NULL)
6022 {
6023 EntityAI entity = NULL;
6024
6025 // Creat Object
6026 bool is_ai = GetGame().IsKindOf( object_name, "DZ_LightAI");
6027 vector item_position;
6028 if( usePosition )
6029 {
6030 item_position = pos;
6031 }
6032 else
6033 {
6034 item_position = GetPosition() + ( GetDirection() * distance );
6035 }
6036 entity = GetGame().CreateObject(object_name, item_position, false, is_ai);
6037
6038 if ( !entity )
6039 {
6040 string s = "Cannot spawn entity: "+object_name;
6041 Print(s);
6042 //g_Game.GetUIManager().ShowDialog("Spawn error", "Cannot spawn item: "+object_name, 0, DBT_OK, DBB_YES, DMT_EXCLAMATION, this);
6043 return NULL;
6044 }
6045
6046 if ( entity.IsInherited( ItemBase ) )
6047 {
6048 ItemBase item = entity;
6049
6050 // Set full quantity
6051 if ( full_quantity )
6052 {
6053 item.SetQuantity(item.GetQuantityMax());
6054 }
6055
6056 // Spawn In Inventory
6057 if ( spawn_type == SPAWNTYPE_INVENTORY )
6058 {
6059 TakeItemToInventory(item);
6060 }
6061 // Spawn In Hands
6062 if ( spawn_type == SPAWNTYPE_HANDS )
6063 {
6064 TakeItemToHands(item);
6065 }
6066 // Spawn As Attachment
6067 if ( spawn_type == SPAWNTYPE_ATTACHMENT )
6068 {
6069 Object cursor_obj = GetCursorObject();
6070 if ( cursor_obj != NULL && cursor_obj.IsInherited(EntityAI) )
6071 {
6072 EntityAI eai = (EntityAI)cursor_obj;
6073 eai.TakeEntityAsAttachment(item);
6074 }
6075 else if ( attachmentObject != NULL)
6076 {
6077 attachmentObject.TakeEntityAsAttachment(item);
6078 }
6079 }
6080 }
6081
6082 return entity;
6083 }*/
6084
6085 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------
6086 bool DropItem(ItemBase item)
6087 {
6088 bool can_be_dropped = CanDropEntity( item );
6089 if( can_be_dropped )
6090 {
6091 can_be_dropped = PredictiveDropEntity( item );
6092 }
6093
6094 vector pos_spawn = GetPosition() + GetDirection();
6095 pos_spawn[0] = pos_spawn[0] + Math.RandomFloat(-0.2, 0.2);
6096 pos_spawn[2] = pos_spawn[2] + Math.RandomFloat(-0.2, 0.2);
6097
6098 item.SetPosition(pos_spawn);
6099 item.PlaceOnSurface();
6100 return can_be_dropped;
6101 }
6102
6103 /*bool TakeItemToInventory (bool synchronize, ItemBase item)
6104 {
6105 ItemBase itemInHands;
6106 itemInHands = GetItemInHands();
6107
6108 if ( itemInHands == item )
6109 {
6110 SynchronizedMoveItemFromHandsToInventory(synchronize);
6111 return true;
6112 }
6113
6114 // in case the player have a cargo item in hands we put item from vicinity into it
6115 if ( itemInHands && itemInHands.GetInventory().GetCargo() )
6116 {
6117 if( itemInHands.GetInventory().CanAddEntityIntoInventory(item) )
6118 {
6119 EntityAI entity;
6120 Class.CastTo(entity, item);
6121 itemInHands.SynchronizedTakeEntityToCargo(do_synchronize, entity);
6122 return true;
6123 }
6124 }
6125
6126 if ( GetInventory().CanAddEntityToInventory(item) )
6127 {
6128 SynchronizedTakeEntityToInventory(synchronize, item);
6129 return true;
6130 }
6131
6132 //g_Game.GetUIManager().ShowDialog("Spawn error", "Cannot take item into inventory! ("+object_name+")", 0, DBT_OK, DBB_YES, DMT_EXCLAMATION, this);
6133 return false;
6134 }
6135
6136 void TakeItemToHands(ItemBase item)
6137 {
6138 TakeEntityToHands(item);
6139 }*/
6140
6141 // -------------------------------------------------------------------------
6152 EntityAI CreateInInventory( string item_name, string cargo_type = "", bool full_quantity = false ) // TODO: Create item in cargo
6153 {
6154 InventoryLocation inv_loc = new InventoryLocation;
6155 if (GetInventory().FindFirstFreeLocationForNewEntity(item_name, FindInventoryLocationType.ANY, inv_loc))
6156 {
6157 return SpawnItemOnLocation(item_name, inv_loc, full_quantity);
6158 }
6159 return NULL;
6160 }
6161
6162
6163 // -------------------------------------------------------------------------
6172 /*ItemBase CopyInventoryItem( ItemBase orig_item )
6173 {
6174 ItemBase item = ItemBase.Cast( GetInventory().CreateInInventory( orig_item.GetType() ) );
6175 if ( item == NULL )
6176 {
6177 return NULL;
6178 }
6179
6180 // Copy of quantity
6181 item.SetQuantity( orig_item.GetQuantity() );
6182
6183 // Copy of damage
6184 item.SetHealth( "", "", orig_item.GetHealth("", "") );
6185
6186 return item;
6187 }*/
6188
6189 ItemBase CreateCopyOfItemInInventory ( ItemBase src )
6190 {
6191 InventoryLocation loc = new InventoryLocation;
6192 string t = src.GetType();
6193 if (GetInventory().FindFirstFreeLocationForNewEntity(t, FindInventoryLocationType.CARGO, loc))
6194 {
6195 bool locked = GetGame().HasInventoryJunctureDestination(this, loc);
6196 if (locked)
6197 {
6198 Print("Warning: Split: CreateCopyOfItemInInventory - Cannot create entity at locked inventory at loc=" + InventoryLocation.DumpToStringNullSafe(loc));
6199 return null;
6200 }
6201 ItemBase dst = ItemBase.Cast( GetInventory().LocationCreateLocalEntity(loc, t, ECE_IN_INVENTORY, RF_DEFAULT) );
6202 if (dst)
6203 {
6204 MiscGameplayFunctions.TransferItemProperties(src, dst);
6205
6206 GetGame().RemoteObjectTreeCreate(dst);
6207
6208 Print("CreateCopyOfItemInInventory - created " + dst.GetName() + " at loc=" + InventoryLocation.DumpToStringNullSafe(loc));
6209 }
6210 return dst;
6211 }
6212 return NULL;
6213 }
6214
6215 ItemBase CreateCopyOfItemInInventoryOrGround(ItemBase src)
6216 {
6217 return CreateCopyOfItemInInventoryOrGroundEx(src, false);
6218 }
6219
6220 ItemBase CreateCopyOfItemInInventoryOrGroundEx(ItemBase src, bool markItemAsSplitResult = false)
6221 {
6222 ItemBase dst = CreateCopyOfItemInInventory(src);
6223 if (!dst)
6224 {
6225 dst = ItemBase.Cast(SpawnEntityOnGroundPos(src.GetType(), this.GetPosition()));
6226 dst.PlaceOnSurface();
6227 dst.SetResultOfSplit(markItemAsSplitResult);
6228 MiscGameplayFunctions.TransferItemProperties(src, dst);
6229 }
6230
6231 return dst;
6232 }
6233

6243 void Message( string text, string style )
6244 {
6245 if (GetInstanceType() == DayZPlayerInstanceType.INSTANCETYPE_SERVER)
6246 {
6247 GetGame().ChatMP(this, text, style );
6248 }
6249 else
6250 {
6251 GetGame().Chat( text, style );
6252 }
6253 }

6257 {

6259 }

6263 {
6264 Message( text, "colorAction" );
6265 }

6269 {
6270 Message( text, "colorFriendly" );
6271 }

6275 {
6276 Message( text, "colorImportant" );
6277 }
6278
6279 void CloseInventoryMenu()
6280 {
6281 if( !GetGame().IsDedicatedServer() )
6282 {
6283#ifndef NO_GUI
6284 UIScriptedMenu menu = GetGame().GetUIManager().GetMenu();
6285 if( menu && ( menu.GetID() == MENU_INVENTORY || menu.GetID() == MENU_INSPECT ) )
6286 {
6287 GetGame().GetUIManager().CloseAll();
6288 GetGame().GetMission().RemoveActiveInputExcludes({"inventory"},false);
6289 GetGame().GetMission().RemoveActiveInputRestriction(EInputRestrictors.INVENTORY);
6290 }
6291#endif
6292 }
6293 }
6294
6295 // -------------------------------------------------------------------------
6304 void ClearInventory( )
6305 {
6306 if ( (GetInstanceType() == DayZPlayerInstanceType.INSTANCETYPE_SERVER || !GetGame().IsMultiplayer()) && GetInventory() )
6307 {
6308 GameInventory inv = PlayerBase.Cast(this).GetInventory();
6309 ref array<EntityAI> items = new array<EntityAI>;
6310 inv.EnumerateInventory(InventoryTraversalType.INORDER, items);
6311 for(int i = 0; i < items.Count(); i++)
6312 {
6313 ItemBase item = ItemBase.Cast(items.Get(i));
6314 if(item && !item.IsPlayer())
6315 {
6316 GetGame().ObjectDelete(item);
6317 }
6318 }
6319
6320 ItemBase item_in_hands = ItemBase.Cast( GetHumanInventory().GetEntityInHands() );
6321
6322 if ( item_in_hands )
6323 {
6324 LocalDestroyEntityInHands();
6325 }
6326 }
6327 }
6328
6330 void DropAllItems()
6331 {
6332 array<EntityAI> itemsArray = new array<EntityAI>;
6333 ItemBase item;
6334 GetInventory().EnumerateInventory(InventoryTraversalType.LEVELORDER, itemsArray);
6335 int count = itemsArray.Count();
6336
6337 for (int i = 0; i < itemsArray.Count(); i++)
6338 {
6339 Class.CastTo(item, itemsArray.Get(i));
6340
6341 if (item && !item.IsInherited(SurvivorBase))
6342 {
6343 ServerDropEntity(item);
6344 }
6345 }
6346 }
6347
6348 string GetPlayerClass()
6349 {
6350 string type;
6351 GetGame().ObjectGetType( this, type );
6352 return type;
6353 }

6357 //---------------------------------------------------

6359 void ShavePlayer()
6360 {
6361 SetLastShavedSeconds( StatGet("playtime") );
6362
6363 m_ModuleLifespan.UpdateLifespan( this, true );
6364 }
6365
6366 bool CanShave()
6367 {
6368 if ( GetLifeSpanState() )
6369 {
6370 return true;
6371 }
6372 else
6373 {
6374 return false;
6375 }
6376 }
6377
6378
6379 override void OnParticleEvent(string pEventType, string pUserString, int pUserInt)
6380 {
6381 super.OnParticleEvent(pEventType ,pUserString, pUserInt);
6382
6383 if ( !GetGame().IsDedicatedServer() )
6384 {
6385 if ( pUserInt == 123456 ) // 123456 is ID for vomiting effect. The current implementation is WIP.
6386 {
6387 PlayerBase player = PlayerBase.Cast(this);
6388 int boneIdx = player.GetBoneIndexByName("Head");
6389
6390 if ( boneIdx != -1 )
6391 {
6392 EffectParticle eff;
6393
6394 if (m_SyncedModifiers & eModifierSyncIDs.MODIFIER_SYNC_CONTAMINATION2)
6395 {
6396 eff = new EffVomitBlood();
6397 }
6398 else
6399 {
6400 eff = new EffVomit();
6401 }
6402
6403 eff.SetDecalOwner( player );
6404 eff.SetAutodestroy( true );
6405 SEffectManager.PlayInWorld( eff, vector.Zero );
6406 Particle p = eff.GetParticle();
6407 player.AddChild(p, boneIdx);
6408 }
6409 }
6410 }
6411 }
6412
6413
6414 bool CanSpawnBreathVaporEffect()
6415 {
6416 if( !ToDelete() && IsAlive() && !IsSwimming() && !m_IsDrowning )
6417 {
6418 return true;
6419 }
6420 return false;
6421 }
6422
6423
6424 void ProcessADDModifier()
6425 {
6426 if( m_AddModifier != -1 )
6427 {
6428 HumanCommandAdditives ad = GetCommandModifier_Additives();
6429 if(ad)
6430 ad.StartModifier(m_AddModifier);
6431
6432 m_AddModifier = -1;
6433 }
6434 }
6435
6436 void SpawnBreathVaporEffect()
6437 {
6438 //Print("SpawnBreathVaporEffect:"+GetGame().GetTime());
6439 int boneIdx = GetBoneIndexByName("Head");
6440 if ( boneIdx != -1 )
6441 {
6442 Particle p;
6443 switch (m_BreathVapour)
6444 {
6445 case 1:
6446 p = ParticleManager.GetInstance().PlayInWorld(ParticleList.BREATH_VAPOUR_LIGHT, "-0.03 0.15 0");
6447 break;
6448 case 2:
6449 p = ParticleManager.GetInstance().PlayInWorld(ParticleList.BREATH_VAPOUR_MEDIUM, "-0.03 0.15 0");
6450 break;
6451 case 3:
6452 p = ParticleManager.GetInstance().PlayInWorld(ParticleList.BREATH_VAPOUR_HEAVY, "-0.03 0.15 0");
6453 break;
6454 default:
6455 break;
6456 }
6457
6458 if ( p )
6459 AddChild(p, boneIdx);
6460 }
6461 }
6462
6463 void SetLifeSpanStateVisible( int show_state )
6464 {
6465 bool state_changed;
6466 if (show_state != m_LifeSpanState)
6467 state_changed = true;
6468 m_LifeSpanState = show_state;
6469 SetSynchDirty();
6470
6471 if (state_changed) //server only, client solution in OnVariablesSynchronized()
6472 {
6473 //SendLifespanSyncEvent(m_LifeSpanState);
6474
6475 UpdateHairSelectionVisibility();
6476 }
6477 }
6478
6479 int GetLifeSpanState()
6480 {
6481 return m_LifeSpanState;
6482 }

6485 {
6486 return m_LastShavedSeconds;
6487 }

6492 }

6518 InsertAgent( eAgents.SALMONELLA, 1 );
6519 }

6551
6552 void CheckDeath()
6553 {
6554 if (IsPlayerSelected() && !IsAlive())
6555 {
6556 SimulateDeath(true);
6557 m_DeathCheckTimer.Stop();
6558 }
6559 }

6563 // --------------------------------------------------
6564 // AI Presence
6565 //---------------------------------------------------
6566
6568 int GetNoisePresenceInAI()
6569 {
6570 if (m_PresenceNotifier)
6571 {
6572 return m_PresenceNotifier.GetNoisePresence();
6573 }
6574
6575 return 0;
6576 }
6577
6578 // is a bit on in the persistent flags
6579 bool IsPersistentFlag(PersistentFlag bit)
6580 {
6581 return (m_PersistentFlags & bit);
6582 }
6583 // turn on/off a bit in the persistent flag
6584 void SetPersistentFlag(PersistentFlag bit, bool enable)
6585 {
6586 if(enable)//turn on bit
6587 m_PersistentFlags = (m_PersistentFlags | bit);
6588 else//turn off bit
6589 m_PersistentFlags = ((~bit) & m_PersistentFlags);
6590
6591 }
6592
6593
6594 // -------------------------------------------------------------------------
6595
6596 int GetStoreLoadVersion()
6597 {
6598 return m_StoreLoadVersion;
6599 }
6600
6601 override void OnStoreSave( ParamsWriteContext ctx )
6602 {
6603 //Print("OnStoreSave");
6604 if( GetGame().SaveVersion() < 102 )
6605 {
6606 ctx.Write( ACT_STORE_SAVE_VERSION );//to be removed after we push 102+
6607 }
6608
6609 super.OnStoreSave( ctx );
6610
6611 GetHumanInventory().OnStoreSave(ctx); // FSM of hands
6612 OnStoreSaveLifespan( ctx );
6613
6614 if ( GetDayZGame().IsServer() && GetDayZGame().IsMultiplayer() )
6615 {
6616 GetPlayerStats().SaveStats(ctx);// save stats
6617 m_ModifiersManager.OnStoreSave(ctx);// save modifiers
6618 m_AgentPool.OnStoreSave(ctx);//save agents
6619 GetSymptomManager().OnStoreSave(ctx);//save states
6620 if (GetBleedingManagerServer())
6621 {
6622 GetBleedingManagerServer().OnStoreSave(ctx);//save bleeding sources
6623 }
6624 m_PlayerStomach.OnStoreSave(ctx);
6625 ctx.Write( GetBrokenLegs() );
6626 //ctx.Write( m_LocalBrokenState );
6627 SaveAreaPersistenceFlag(ctx);
6628
6629 }
6630 }
6631
6632
6633 void SaveAreaPersistenceFlag( ParamsWriteContext ctx )
6634 {
6635 if(GetModifiersManager())
6636 SetPersistentFlag(PersistentFlag.AREA_PRESENCE, GetModifiersManager().IsModifierActive(eModifiers.MDF_AREAEXPOSURE));//set the flag for player's presence in contaminated area
6637 ctx.Write( m_PersistentFlags );
6638 }
6639
6640
6641 override bool OnStoreLoad( ParamsReadContext ctx, int version )
6642 {
6643 //Print("---- PlayerBase OnStoreLoad START ----, version: "+version);
6644 m_aQuickBarLoad = new array<ref Param2<EntityAI,int>>;
6645
6646 // todo :: this should be after base call !!!!
6647 if( version < 102 )//write removed in v. 102
6648 {
6649 if(!ctx.Read( m_StoreLoadVersion ))
6650 return false;
6651 }
6652
6653 if ( !super.OnStoreLoad( ctx, version ) )
6654 return false;
6655
6656 // FSM of hands
6657 if ( !GetHumanInventory().OnStoreLoad(ctx, version) )
6658 return false;
6659
6660 if ( !OnStoreLoadLifespan( ctx, version ) )
6661 return false;
6662
6663 if ( GetDayZGame().IsServer() && GetDayZGame().IsMultiplayer() )
6664 {
6665 if(!GetPlayerStats().LoadStats(ctx, version)) // load stats
6666 {
6667 Print("---- failed to load PlayerStats ----");
6668 return false;
6669 }
6670
6671 if( version < m_ModifiersManager.GetStorageVersion() )//load modifiers !! WILL CANCEL REST OF STREAM IF UNSUPPORTED VERSION !!
6672 {
6673 Print("---- failed to load ModifiersManager, unsupported version ----");
6674 return false;
6675 }
6676 else
6677 {
6678 if(!m_ModifiersManager.OnStoreLoad(ctx, version))
6679 {
6680 Print("---- failed to load ModifiersManager, read fail ----");
6681 return false;
6682 }
6683 }
6684
6685 if( version < m_AgentPool.GetStorageVersion() )//load agents !! WILL CANCEL REST OF STREAM IF UNSUPPORTED VERSION !!
6686 {
6687 Print("---- failed to load AgentPool, unsupported version ----");
6688 return false;
6689 }
6690 else
6691 {
6692 if(!m_AgentPool.OnStoreLoad(ctx, version))
6693 {
6694 Print("---- failed to load AgentPool, read fail ----");
6695 return false;
6696 }
6697 }
6698
6699
6700 if( version < GetSymptomManager().GetStorageVersion() )//load symptoms !! WILL CANCEL REST OF STREAM IF UNSUPPORTED VERSION !!
6701 {
6702 Print("---- failed to load SymptomManager, unsupported version ----");
6703 return false;
6704 }
6705 else
6706 {
6707 if(!GetSymptomManager().OnStoreLoad(ctx, version))
6708 {
6709 Print("---- failed to load SymptomManager, read fail ----");
6710 return false;
6711 }
6712 }
6713
6714 if( version < GetBleedingManagerServer().GetStorageVersion() )//load bleeding manager !! WILL CANCEL REST OF STREAM IF UNSUPPORTED VERSION !!
6715 {
6716 Print("---- failed to load BleedingManagerServer, unsupported version ----");
6717 return false;
6718 }
6719 else
6720 {
6721 if(!GetBleedingManagerServer().OnStoreLoad(ctx, version))
6722 {
6723 Print("---- failed to load BleedingManagerServer, read fail ----");
6724 return false;
6725 }
6726 }
6727
6728 if( version < m_PlayerStomach.GetStorageVersion() )//load PlayerStomach !! WILL CANCEL REST OF STREAM IF UNSUPPORTED VERSION !!
6729 {
6730 Print("---- failed to load PlayerStomach, unsupported version ----");
6731 return false;
6732 }
6733 else
6734 {
6735 if(!m_PlayerStomach.OnStoreLoad(ctx, version))
6736 {
6737 Print("---- failed to load PlayerStomach, read fail ----");
6738 return false;
6739 }
6740 }
6741
6742 //Check for broken leg value
6743 if ( version >= 116 )
6744 {
6745 if (!ctx.Read( m_BrokenLegState ))
6746 {
6747 return false;
6748 }
6749 if ( version <= 126 )// WHILE >= 116
6750 {
6751 if (!ctx.Read( m_LocalBrokenState ))
6752 {
6753 return false;
6754 }
6755 }
6756 }
6757 //Check for broken leg value
6758 if ( version >= 125 && (!ctx.Read( m_PersistentFlags )))
6759 {
6760 Print("---- failed to load Persistent Flags, read fail ----");
6761 return false;
6762 }
6763 }
6764
6765 Print("---- PlayerBase OnStoreLoad SUCCESS ----");
6766 return true;
6767 }
6768
6769 override void AfterStoreLoad()
6770 {
6771 GetHumanInventory().OnAfterStoreLoad();
6772 if (m_EmoteManager)
6773 {
6774 m_EmoteManager.AfterStoreLoad();
6775 }
6776
6777 UpdateWeight();
6778 SetPlayerLoad(GetWeight());
6779 }
6780
6781 void OnStoreSaveLifespan( ParamsWriteContext ctx )
6782 {
6783 ctx.Write( m_LifeSpanState );
6784 ctx.Write( m_LastShavedSeconds );
6785 ctx.Write( m_HasBloodyHandsVisible );
6786 ctx.Write( m_HasBloodTypeVisible );
6787 ctx.Write( m_BloodType );
6788 }
6789
6790 bool OnStoreLoadLifespan( ParamsReadContext ctx, int version )
6791 {
6792 int lifespan_state = 0;
6793 if(!ctx.Read( lifespan_state ))
6794 return false;
6795 m_LifeSpanState = lifespan_state;
6796
6797 int last_shaved = 0;
6798 if(!ctx.Read( last_shaved ))
6799 return false;
6800 m_LastShavedSeconds = last_shaved;
6801
6802 if (version < 122)
6803 {
6804 bool bloody_hands_old;
6805 if(!ctx.Read(bloody_hands_old))
6806 return false;
6807 m_HasBloodyHandsVisible = bloody_hands_old;
6808 }
6809 else
6810 {
6811 int bloody_hands = 0;
6812 if(!ctx.Read( bloody_hands ))
6813 return false;
6814 m_HasBloodyHandsVisible = bloody_hands;
6815 }
6816
6817
6818 bool blood_visible = false;
6819 if(!ctx.Read( blood_visible ))
6820 return false;
6821 m_HasBloodTypeVisible = blood_visible;
6822
6823 int blood_type = 0;
6824 if(!ctx.Read( blood_type ))
6825 return false;
6826 m_BloodType = blood_type;
6827
6828 return true;
6829 }
6830
6831 vector m_PlayerOldPos;
6832 void UpdatePlayerMeasures()
6833 {
6834 int hour, minute, second;
6835 GetHourMinuteSecond( hour, minute, second );
6836 float distance;
6837 distance = StatGet("playtime");
6838 if ( m_AnalyticsTimer )
6839 {
6840 StatsEventMeasuresData data = new StatsEventMeasuresData();
6841 data.m_CharacterId = g_Game.GetDatabaseID();
6842 data.m_TimeInterval = m_AnalyticsTimer.GetRemaining();
6843 data.m_DaytimeHour = hour;
6844 data.m_PositionStart = m_PlayerOldPos;
6845 data.m_PositionEnd = GetPosition();
6846 data.m_DistanceOnFoot = distance;
6847 Analytics.PlayerMeasures(data);
6848 }
6849
6850 m_PlayerOldPos = GetPosition();
6851 }
6852
6853 void OnConnect()
6854 {
6855 Debug.Log("Player connected:"+this.ToString(),"Connect");
6856
6857 // analytics
6858 GetGame().GetAnalyticsServer().OnPlayerConnect( this );
6859
6860 m_PlayerOldPos = GetPosition();
6861 if ( m_AnalyticsTimer )
6862 m_AnalyticsTimer.Run( 60, this, "UpdatePlayerMeasures", null, true );
6863
6864 //construction action data
6865 ResetConstructionActionData();
6866 }
6867
6868 void OnReconnect()
6869 {
6870 Debug.Log("Player reconnected:"+this.ToString(),"Reconnect");
6871
6872 //construction action data
6873
6874 ResetConstructionActionData();
6875 }
6876
6877 void OnDisconnect()
6878 {
6879 Debug.Log("Player disconnected:"+this.ToString(),"Connect");
6880
6881 // analytics
6882 // force update of the stats
6883 // if player disconnect too soon, UpdatePlayersStats() is not called
6884 GetGame().GetAnalyticsServer().OnPlayerDisconnect( this );
6885
6886 StatsEventDisconnectedData data = new StatsEventDisconnectedData();
6887 data.m_CharacterId = g_Game.GetDatabaseID();
6888 data.m_Reason = "Disconnected";
6889 Analytics.PlayerDisconnected(data);
6890
6891 if( m_AnalyticsTimer )
6892 m_AnalyticsTimer.Stop();
6893 UpdatePlayerMeasures();
6894
6895 SetPlayerDisconnected(true);
6896 }
6897
6898 void SetModifiers(bool enable)
6899 {
6900 GetModifiersManager().SetModifiers(enable);
6901 }
6902
6903 bool Consume(ItemBase source, float amount, EConsumeType consume_type )
6904 {
6905 PluginTransmissionAgents plugin = PluginTransmissionAgents.Cast( GetPlugin(PluginTransmissionAgents) );
6906 int agents;
6907 if( consume_type == EConsumeType.ENVIRO_POND || consume_type == EConsumeType.ENVIRO_WELL )
6908 {
6909 if ( consume_type == EConsumeType.ENVIRO_POND )
6910 {
6911 agents = agents | eAgents.CHOLERA;
6912 //plugin.TransmitAgents(NULL, this, AGT_WATER_POND, amount);
6913 }
6914 m_PlayerStomach.AddToStomach(Liquid.GetLiquidClassname(LIQUID_WATER), amount, 0 , agents );
6915
6916
6917 return true;
6918 }
6919
6920 Edible_Base edible_item = Edible_Base.Cast(source);
6921 if(!edible_item)
6922 {
6923 return false;
6924 }
6925 agents = edible_item.GetAgents();
6926 if( consume_type == EConsumeType.ITEM_SINGLE_TIME || consume_type == EConsumeType.ITEM_CONTINUOUS )
6927 {
6928 if(consume_type == EConsumeType.ITEM_SINGLE_TIME)
6929 {
6930 plugin.TransmitAgents(edible_item, this, AGT_UACTION_CONSUME, amount);
6931 }
6932 /*
6933 else
6934 {
6935 plugin.TransmitAgents(edible_item, this, AGT_UACTION_TO_PLAYER, amount);
6936 }
6937 */
6938 if(edible_item.IsLiquidContainer())
6939 {
6940 int liquid_type = edible_item.GetLiquidType();
6941 string liquidClassName = Liquid.GetLiquidClassname(liquid_type);
6942 if (liquidClassName.Length() == 0)
6943 Error("Error! Trying to add unknown liquid to stomach with item=" + Object.GetDebugName(edible_item) + " consume_type=" + consume_type + " liquid_type=" + liquid_type);
6944 m_PlayerStomach.AddToStomach(liquidClassName, amount, 0, agents);
6945 }
6946 else
6947 {
6948 int food_stage_type;
6949 if( edible_item.GetFoodStage() )
6950 {
6951 food_stage_type = edible_item.GetFoodStage().GetFoodStageType();
6952 }
6953 m_PlayerStomach.AddToStomach(source.GetType(), amount, food_stage_type, agents);
6954 }
6955 edible_item.Consume(amount, this);
6956 return true;
6957
6958 }
6959 /*
6960 if( consume_type == EConsumeType.ITEM_CONTINUOUS )
6961 {
6962 if(edible_item)
6963 {
6964 plugin.TransmitAgents(edible_item, this, AGT_UACTION_TO_PLAYER, amount);
6965 edible_item.Consume(amount, this);
6966 //ProcessNutritions(edible_item.GetNutritionalProfile(),amount);
6967 m_PlayerStomach.AddToStomach(source.GetType(), amount, edible_item.GetNutritionalProfile());
6968 return true;
6969 }
6970 }
6971 */
6972 return false;
6973 }
6974
6975 /*
6976 void ProcessNutritions( NutritionalProfile profile, float consumedquantity )
6977 {
6978 float energy_per_unit = profile.GetEnergy() / 100;
6979 float water_per_unit = profile.GetWaterContent() / 100;
6980 float nutritions = profile.GetNutritionalIndex();
6981 float fullness_index = profile.GetFullnessIndex();
6982 float toxicity = profile.GetToxicity();
6983 bool is_liquid = profile.IsLiquid();
6984
6985 if ( consumedquantity > 0 )
6986 {
6987 float water_consumed = consumedquantity * water_per_unit;
6988 GetStatStomachVolume().Add(consumedquantity * fullness_index );
6989 GetStatStomachEnergy().Add( consumedquantity * energy_per_unit );
6990 GetStatStomachWater().Add( water_consumed );
6991 GetStatToxicity().Add( consumedquantity * toxicity );
6992 }
6993 else
6994 {
6995 Print("ProcessNutritions - ZERO VOLUME! Fix config");
6996 }
6997 }
6998 */
6999
7000 void ShowUnconsciousScreen(bool show)
7001 {
7002 #ifndef NO_GUI
7003 if (show)
7004 {
7005 GetGame().GetUIManager().ScreenFadeIn(0, "You are Unconscious", FadeColors.BLACK, FadeColors.WHITE);
7006 PrintString("Fade in");
7007 }
7008 else
7009 {
7010 GetGame().GetUIManager().ScreenFadeOut(0);
7011 PrintString("Fade out");
7012 }
7013 #endif
7014 }
7015
7016 override void RequestSoundEventEx(EPlayerSoundEventID id, bool from_server_and_client = false, int param = 0)
7017 {
7018 if(from_server_and_client && GetInstanceType() == DayZPlayerInstanceType.INSTANCETYPE_CLIENT)
7019 {
7020 PlaySoundEventEx(id, false, false, param );
7021 return;
7022 }
7023 SendSoundEventEx(id, param);
7024 }
7025
7026 override void RequestSoundEvent(EPlayerSoundEventID id, bool from_server_and_client = false)
7027 {
7028 RequestSoundEventEx(id, from_server_and_client);
7029 }
7030
7031 override protected void SendSoundEvent(EPlayerSoundEventID id)
7032 {
7033 SendSoundEventEx(id);
7034 }
7035
7036 override protected void SendSoundEventEx(EPlayerSoundEventID id, int param = 0)
7037 {
7038 if( !GetGame().IsServer() )
7039 {
7040 return;
7041 }
7042 m_SoundEvent = id;
7043 m_SoundEventParam = param;
7044 SetSynchDirty();
7045
7046 if( !GetGame().IsMultiplayer() )
7047 {
7048 CheckSoundEvent();
7049 }
7050
7051 //PrintString(GetGame().GetTime().ToString() + " Set SoundEvent, id:" + id.ToString());
7052 }
7053
7054 void CheckZeroSoundEvent()
7055 {
7056 if( m_SoundEvent != 0 && m_SoundEventSent )
7057 {
7058 m_SoundEvent = 0;
7059 m_SoundEventParam = 0;
7060 m_SoundEventSent = false;
7061 SetSynchDirty();
7062 }
7063 }
7064
7065 void CheckSendSoundEvent()
7066 {
7067 if( m_SoundEvent!= 0 && !m_SoundEventSent )
7068 {
7069 m_SoundEventSent = true;
7070 }
7071 }
7072
7073 override bool PlaySoundEvent(EPlayerSoundEventID id, bool from_anim_system = false, bool is_from_server = false)
7074 {
7075 return PlaySoundEventEx(id, from_anim_system, is_from_server);
7076 }
7077
7078 override bool PlaySoundEventEx(EPlayerSoundEventID id, bool from_anim_system = false, bool is_from_server = false, int param = 0)
7079 {
7080 if (!m_PlayerSoundEventHandler)
7081 {
7082 return false;
7083 }
7084 return m_PlayerSoundEventHandler.PlayRequestEx(id, is_from_server, param);
7085 }
7086
7087 PlayerSoundEventHandler GetPlayerSoundEventHandler()
7088 {
7089 return m_PlayerSoundEventHandler;
7090 }

7094 {
7095
7096 }
7097
7098 void OnBleedingEnd()
7099 {
7100
7101 }
7102
7103 void OnBleedingSourceAdded()
7104 {
7105 m_BleedingSourceCount++;
7106 if (IsControlledPlayer())
7107 {
7108 if ( !GetGame().IsDedicatedServer() )
7109 {
7110 DisplayElementBadge dis_elm = DisplayElementBadge.Cast(GetVirtualHud().GetElement(eDisplayElements.DELM_BADGE_BLEEDING));
7111 if ( dis_elm )
7112 {
7113 dis_elm.SetValue(GetBleedingSourceCount());
7114 }
7115
7116
7117 //Print("----------bleeding_SoundSet----------");
7118 //SEffectManager.PlaySoundOnObject("bleeding_SoundSet", this); Removed due as it caused a freeze on the Console Submission builds.
7119 }
7120 }
7121 }
7122
7123 void OnBleedingSourceRemoved()
7124 {
7125 m_BleedingSourceCount--;
7126 if(IsControlledPlayer())
7127 {
7128 if( !GetGame().IsDedicatedServer() )
7129 {
7130 //Print("GetBleedingSourceCount() "+GetBleedingSourceCount());
7131 DisplayElementBadge dis_elm = DisplayElementBadge.Cast(GetVirtualHud().GetElement(eDisplayElements.DELM_BADGE_BLEEDING));
7132 if( dis_elm )
7133 {
7134 dis_elm.SetValue(GetBleedingSourceCount());
7135 }
7136 }
7137 }
7138 }
7139
7140
7141 void OnBleedingSourceRemovedEx(ItemBase item)
7142 {
7143 OnBleedingSourceRemoved();
7144
7145 }
7146
7147 int GetBleedingSourceCount()
7148 {
7149 if( !GetGame().IsMultiplayer() )
7150 return m_BleedingSourceCount / 2;
7151 return m_BleedingSourceCount;
7152 }

7155 bool IsSayingSound()
7156 {
7157 if(m_SaySoundWave) return true;
7158 else return false;
7159 }
7160 */
7161
7162 // for debug purposes, should reset some systems like Modifiers, Stats, Damage etc.....
7163 void ResetPlayer(bool set_max)
7164 {
7165 //clear stomach content
7166 GetStomach().ClearContents();
7167
7168 // bleeding sources
7169 if( m_BleedingManagerServer )
7170 m_BleedingManagerServer.RemoveAllSources();
7171
7172 // Modifiers
7173 bool is_area_exposure, is_mask;
7174
7175 if( GetModifiersManager() )
7176 {
7177 is_mask = GetModifiersManager().IsModifierActive(eModifiers.MDF_MASK);
7178 is_area_exposure = GetModifiersManager().IsModifierActive(eModifiers.MDF_AREAEXPOSURE);
7179 GetModifiersManager().DeactivateAllModifiers();
7180 }
7181
7182
7183 if(is_area_exposure)
7184 GetModifiersManager().ActivateModifier(eModifiers.MDF_AREAEXPOSURE);
7185 if(is_mask)
7186 GetModifiersManager().ActivateModifier(eModifiers.MDF_MASK);
7187
7188 // Stats
7189 if( GetPlayerStats() )
7190 {
7191 int blood_type = GetStatBloodType().Get();
7192 GetPlayerStats().ResetAllStats();
7193 GetStatBloodType().Set(blood_type);
7194 }
7195
7196 // Agents
7197 if( m_AgentPool )
7198 m_AgentPool.RemoveAllAgents();
7199
7200 // Damage System
7201 DamageZoneMap zones = new DamageZoneMap;
7202 DamageSystem.GetDamageZoneMap(this,zones);
7203 SetHealth("", "Health", GetMaxHealth("","Health"));
7204 SetHealth("", "Shock", GetMaxHealth("","Shock"));
7205 SetHealth("", "Blood", GetMaxHealth("","Blood"));
7206
7207 for( int i = 0; i < zones.Count(); i++ )
7208 {
7209 string zone = zones.GetKey(i);
7210 SetHealth(zone, "Health", GetMaxHealth(zone,"Health"));
7211 SetHealth(zone, "Shock", GetMaxHealth(zone,"Shock"));
7212 SetHealth(zone, "Blood", GetMaxHealth(zone,"Blood"));
7213 }
7214 // uncon
7215 if(IsUnconscious())
7216 DayZPlayerSyncJunctures.SendPlayerUnconsciousness(this, false);
7217
7218 // set max
7219 if( set_max )
7220 {
7221 GetStatWater().Set(GetStatWater().GetMax());
7222 GetStatEnergy().Set(GetStatEnergy().GetMax());
7223 }
7224
7225
7226 // fix up inventory
7227 FixAllInventoryItems();
7228
7229 //remove bloody hands
7230 PluginLifespan module_lifespan = PluginLifespan.Cast( GetPlugin( PluginLifespan ) );
7231 module_lifespan.UpdateBloodyHandsVisibilityEx( this, eBloodyHandsTypes.CLEAN );
7232 }
7233
7234 void CheckSoundEvent()
7235 {
7236 if(m_SoundEvent != 0)
7237 {
7238 PlaySoundEventEx(m_SoundEvent, false, true,m_SoundEventParam);
7239 m_SoundEvent = 0;
7240 m_SoundEventParam = 0;
7241 }
7242 }
7243
7244 void TestSend()
7245 {
7246 if( GetGame().IsClient() ) return;
7247 RequestSoundEvent(1234);
7248 //Math.RandomInt(1,4096)
7249 }
7250
7251 void SetStaminaState(eStaminaState state)
7252 {
7253 if( state != m_StaminaState )
7254 {
7255 m_StaminaState = state;
7256 //PrintString("m_StaminaState:"+m_StaminaState.ToString());
7257 SetSynchDirty();
7258 }
7259 }
7260
7261 int GetStaminaState()
7262 {
7263 return m_StaminaState;
7264 }
7265
7266 void UpdateQuickBarExtraSlots()
7267 {
7268 m_QuickBarBase.updateSlotsCount();
7269 }
7270
7271 bool Save()
7272 {
7273 // saved player must be alive and not captive
7274 if (GetPlayerState() == EPlayerStates.ALIVE && !IsRestrained())
7275 {
7276 GetHive().CharacterSave(this);
7277 Debug.Log("Player "+this.ToString()+ " saved as alive");
7278
7279 return true;
7280 }
7281 return false;
7282 }
7283
7284 // agent transfer
7285
7286 static ref array<Object> SPREAD_AGENTS_OBJECTS = new array<Object>;
7287 static ref array<CargoBase> SPREAD_AGENTS_PROXY_CARGOS = new array<CargoBase>;
7288
7289
7291 void SpreadAgentsEx(float distance = 3,float chance = 0.25)
7292 {
7293 if(Math.RandomFloat01() > chance)
7294 return;
7295
7296 GetGame().GetPlayers(m_ServerPlayers);
7297 float dist_check = distance * distance;//make it sq
7298 PluginTransmissionAgents plugin = PluginTransmissionAgents.Cast(GetPlugin(PluginTransmissionAgents));
7299
7300 foreach(Man target: m_ServerPlayers)
7301 {
7302 if (vector.DistanceSq(GetWorldPosition(), target.GetWorldPosition()) < dist_check && target != this)
7303 {
7304 plugin.TransmitAgents(this, target, AGT_AIRBOURNE_BIOLOGICAL, 1);
7305 }
7306 }
7307 }
7308
7309 void SpreadAgents()//legacy method
7310 {
7311 SpreadAgentsEx(3,1);
7312 }
7313
7314 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
7315 override int GetAgents()
7316 {
7317 return m_AgentPool.GetAgents();
7318 }
7319
7320 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
7321 override void RemoveAgent(int agent_id) //removes a single agent type from the player agent pool
7322 {
7323 m_AgentPool.RemoveAgent(agent_id);
7324 }
7325
7326 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
7327 override void RemoveAllAgents()
7328 {
7329 m_AgentPool.RemoveAllAgents();
7330 }
7331
7332
7333 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
7334 override void InsertAgent(int agent, float count = 1) //adds a single agent type to the player agent pool
7335 {
7336 m_AgentPool.AddAgent(agent,count);
7337 }
7338
7339 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
7340 int GetSingleAgentCount(int agent_id)
7341 {
7342 return m_AgentPool.GetSingleAgentCount(agent_id);
7343 }
7344
7345 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
7346 float GetSingleAgentCountNormalized(int agent_id)
7347 {
7348 int max_count = PluginTransmissionAgents.GetAgentMaxCount(agent_id);
7349 return m_AgentPool.GetSingleAgentCount(agent_id) / max_count;
7350 }
7351
7352 float GetTotalAgentCount()
7353 {
7354 return m_AgentPool.GetTotalAgentCount();
7355 }
7356
7357 void PrintAgents()
7358 {
7359 m_AgentPool.PrintAgents();
7360 }
7361
7362 void ImmuneSystemTick(float value, float deltaT)
7363 {
7364 m_AgentPool.ImmuneSystemTick(value, deltaT);
7365 }
7366
7367 void AntibioticsAttack(float value)
7368 {
7369 m_AgentPool.AntibioticsAttack(value);
7370 }
7371
7372 //Get aim (player crosshair) position
7373 vector GetAimPosition()
7374 {
7375 float min_distance = 0.5; //min distance, default = 5m
7376
7377 vector from = GetGame().GetCurrentCameraPosition();
7378 vector to = from + (GetGame().GetCurrentCameraDirection() * min_distance);
7379 vector contactPos;
7380 vector contactDir;
7381 int contactComponent;
7382
7383 DayZPhysics.RaycastRV( from, to, contactPos, contactDir, contactComponent, NULL, NULL, NULL, false, true );
7384
7385 return contactPos;
7386 }
7387
7388
7389 bool CanEatAndDrink()
7390 {
7391 ItemBase mask = ItemBase.Cast(GetInventory().FindAttachment(InventorySlots.MASK));
7392 return (!mask || (mask && mask.AllowFoodConsumption()));
7393 }
7394
7395 //get modifier manager
7396 ModifiersManager GetModifiersManager()
7397 {
7398 return m_ModifiersManager;
7399 }
7400
7401 PlayerStat<float> GetStatWater()
7402 {
7403 if( !m_StatWater && GetPlayerStats())
7404 {
7405 m_StatWater = PlayerStat<float>.Cast(GetPlayerStats().GetStatObject(EPlayerStats_current.WATER));
7406 }
7407 return m_StatWater;
7408 }
7409

7411 {
7412 if( !m_StatToxicity && GetPlayerStats() )
7413 {
7414 m_StatToxicity = PlayerStat<float>.Cast(GetPlayerStats().GetStatObject(EPlayerStats_current.TOXICITY));
7415 }
7416 return m_StatToxicity;
7417 }

7500 void ToggleHeatBufferVisibility( bool show )
7501 {

7504 }
7505
7507 string GetLastUAMessage()
7508 {
7509 return m_UALastMessage;
7510 }
7511
7512 void SetLastUAMessage(string pMsg)
7513 {
7514 m_UALastMessage = pMsg;
7515
7516 if( m_UALastMessageTimer.IsRunning() )
7517 {
7518 m_UALastMessageTimer.Stop();
7519 }
7520
7521 m_UALastMessageTimer.Run(PlayerConstants.LAST_UA_MSG_LIFETIME, this, "ClearLastUAMessage", null);
7522 }
7523
7524 protected void ClearLastUAMessage()
7525 {
7526 if( m_UALastMessageTimer.IsRunning() )
7527 {
7528 m_UALastMessageTimer.Stop();
7529 }
7530
7531 m_UALastMessage = "";
7532 }
7533
7536
7538 void ForceUpdateInjuredState()
7539 {
7540 m_InjuryHandler.CheckValue(true);
7541 }
7542
7543 // -------------------------------------------------------------------------
7544 void GetDebugActions(out TSelectableActionInfoArray outputList)
7545 {
7546 PluginTransmissionAgents plugin_trans_agents = PluginTransmissionAgents.Cast( GetPlugin(PluginTransmissionAgents) );
7547
7548 string name;
7549 int id;
7550 map<int,string> agent_list = plugin_trans_agents.GetSimpleAgentList();
7551
7552 for(int i = 0; i < agent_list.Count(); i++)
7553 {
7554 name = agent_list.GetElement(i);
7555 id = agent_list.GetKey(i);
7556
7557 outputList.Insert(new TSelectableActionInfo(SAT_DEBUG_ACTION,EActions.DEBUG_AGENTS_RANGE_INJECT_START + id, "Inject " + name));
7558 outputList.Insert(new TSelectableActionInfo(SAT_DEBUG_ACTION,EActions.DEBUG_AGENTS_RANGE_REMOVE_START + id, "Remove " + name));
7559 }
7560 }
7561
7562 //-------------------------------------------------------------
7566
7567 override void OnSyncJuncture(int pJunctureID, ParamsReadContext pCtx)
7568 {
7569 super.OnSyncJuncture(pJunctureID, pCtx);
7570
7571 switch( pJunctureID )
7572 {
7573 case DayZPlayerSyncJunctures.SJ_INJURY:
7574 eInjuryHandlerLevels level;
7575 bool enable;
7576 DayZPlayerSyncJunctures.ReadInjuryParams(pCtx, enable, level);
7577 m_InjuryHandler.SetInjuryCommandParams(enable, level);
7578 break;
7579 case DayZPlayerSyncJunctures.SJ_PLAYER_STATES:
7580 GetSymptomManager().SetAnimation(pCtx);
7581 break;
7582 case DayZPlayerSyncJunctures.SJ_QUICKBAR_SET_SHORTCUT:
7583 OnQuickbarSetEntityRequest(pCtx);
7584 break;
7585 case DayZPlayerSyncJunctures.SJ_INVENTORY:
7586 GetInventory().OnInventoryJunctureFromServer(pCtx);
7587 break;
7588 case DayZPlayerSyncJunctures.SJ_INVENTORY_REPAIR:
7589 GetInventory().OnInventoryJunctureRepairFromServer(pCtx);
7590 break;
7591 case DayZPlayerSyncJunctures.SJ_ACTION_INTERRUPT:
7592 case DayZPlayerSyncJunctures.SJ_ACTION_ACK_ACCEPT:
7593 case DayZPlayerSyncJunctures.SJ_ACTION_ACK_REJECT:
7594 m_ActionManager.OnSyncJuncture(pJunctureID,pCtx);
7595 break;
7596 case DayZPlayerSyncJunctures.SJ_WEAPON_ACTION_ACK_ACCEPT:
7597 case DayZPlayerSyncJunctures.SJ_WEAPON_ACTION_ACK_REJECT:
7598 case DayZPlayerSyncJunctures.SJ_WEAPON_SET_JAMMING_CHANCE:
7599 m_WeaponManager.OnSyncJuncture(pJunctureID,pCtx);
7600 break;
7601 case DayZPlayerSyncJunctures.SJ_UNCONSCIOUSNESS:
7602 DayZPlayerSyncJunctures.ReadPlayerUnconsciousnessParams(pCtx, m_ShouldBeUnconscious);
7603 break;
7604 case DayZPlayerSyncJunctures.SJ_PLAYER_ADD_MODIFIER:
7605 GetSymptomManager().SetAnimation(pCtx);
7606 break;
7607 case DayZPlayerSyncJunctures.SJ_KURU_REQUEST:
7608 float amount;
7609 if(DayZPlayerSyncJunctures.ReadKuruRequest(pCtx, amount))
7610 {
7611 if(GetAimingModel() && IsFireWeaponRaised())
7612 {
7613 GetAimingModel().RequestKuruShake(amount);
7614 }
7615 }
7616 break;
7617 case DayZPlayerSyncJunctures.SJ_GESTURE_REQUEST :
7618 m_EmoteManager.OnSyncJuncture(pJunctureID, pCtx);
7619 break;
7620 case DayZPlayerSyncJunctures.SJ_WEAPON_LIFT:
7621 SetLiftWeapon(pJunctureID, pCtx);
7622 break;
7623 case DayZPlayerSyncJunctures.SJ_ADS_RESET:
7624 m_ResetADS = true;
7625 break;
7626 case DayZPlayerSyncJunctures.SJ_DELETE_ITEM:
7627 SetToDelete(pCtx);
7628 break;
7629 case DayZPlayerSyncJunctures.SJ_BROKEN_LEGS:
7630 m_BrokenLegsJunctureReceived = true;
7631 DayZPlayerSyncJunctures.ReadBrokenLegsParamsEx(pCtx, m_BrokenLegState);
7632 break;
7633 case DayZPlayerSyncJunctures.SJ_SHOCK :
7634 DayZPlayerSyncJunctures.ReadShockParams(pCtx, m_CurrentShock);
7635 break;
7636 case DayZPlayerSyncJunctures.SJ_STAMINA:
7637 m_StaminaHandler.OnSyncJuncture(pJunctureID, pCtx);
7638 break;
7639 case DayZPlayerSyncJunctures.SJ_STAMINA_MISC:
7640 m_StaminaHandler.OnSyncJuncture(pJunctureID, pCtx);
7641 break;
7642 }
7643 }
7644
7645 bool IsItemsToDelete()
7646 {
7647 return m_ItemsToDelete.Count() > 0;
7648 }
7649
7650 void SetToDelete(ParamsReadContext pCtx)
7651 {
7652 EntityAI item;
7653 pCtx.Read(item);
7654 AddItemToDelete(item);
7655 }
7656
7657 override void AddItemToDelete(EntityAI item)
7658 {
7659 if (item)
7660 {
7661 item.SetPrepareToDelete();
7662 m_ItemsToDelete.Insert(item);
7663 }
7664 }
7665
7666 bool CanDeleteItems()
7667 {
7668 return !(IsEmotePlaying() || GetThrowing().IsThrowingAnimationPlaying() || GetDayZPlayerInventory().IsProcessing() || (GetActionManager() && GetActionManager().GetRunningAction()));
7669 }
7670
7671 override void JunctureDeleteItem(EntityAI item)
7672 {
7673 DayZPlayerSyncJunctures.SendDeleteItem(this, item);
7674 }
7675
7676 void UpdateDelete()
7677 {
7678 int count = m_ItemsToDelete.Count();
7679 if (count > 0)
7680 {
7681 if (CanDeleteItems())
7682 {
7683 EntityAI itemToDelete;
7684
7685 if (GetGame().IsClient() && GetGame().IsMultiplayer())
7686 {
7687 InventoryLocation il = new InventoryLocation();
7688 for (int i = count - 1; i >= 0 ; i--)
7689 {
7690 itemToDelete = m_ItemsToDelete.Get(i);
7691 if (itemToDelete != null)
7692 {
7693 itemToDelete.GetInventory().GetCurrentInventoryLocation(il);
7694 }
7695
7696 if (itemToDelete == null || (GetItemInHands() == null && il.GetType() == InventoryLocationType.UNKNOWN))
7697 {
7698 m_ItemsToDelete.Remove(i);
7699 }
7700 }
7701 }
7702 else
7703 {
7704 for (int j = count - 1; j >= 0 ; j--)
7705 {
7706 itemToDelete = m_ItemsToDelete.Get(j);
7707 if (itemToDelete == null)
7708 {
7709 m_ItemsToDelete.Remove(j);
7710 }
7711 else
7712 {
7713 itemToDelete.Delete();
7714 m_ItemsToDelete.Remove(j);
7715 }
7716 }
7717 }
7718 }
7719 }
7720 }
7721
7722 override bool HeadingModel(float pDt, SDayZPlayerHeadingModel pModel)
7723 {
7725 if ( GetEmoteManager().IsControllsLocked() || (GetActionManager() && GetActionManager().GetRunningAction() && GetActionManager().GetRunningAction().IsFullBody(this)) )
7726 {
7727 m_fLastHeadingDiff = 0;
7728 return DayZPlayerImplementHeading.ClampHeading(pDt, pModel, m_fLastHeadingDiff);
7729 }
7730
7731 return super.HeadingModel(pDt, pModel);
7732 }
7733
7734 override bool IsInventorySoftLocked()
7735 {
7736 return m_InventorySoftLocked;
7737 }
7738
7739 override void SetInventorySoftLock(bool status)
7740 {
7741 m_InventorySoftLocked = status;
7742 }

7744 void SetLoadedQuickBarItemBind(EntityAI entity, int index)
