7747 m_aQuickBarLoad.Insert(new Param2<EntityAI, int>(entity,index));
7748 }
7749
7750 override bool IsLiftWeapon()
7751 {
7752 return m_LiftWeapon_player;
7753 }
7754
7755 //Server
7756 bool ReadLiftWeaponRequest(int userDataType, ParamsReadContext ctx)
7757 {
7758 bool state;
7759 ctx.Read(state);
7760
7761 ScriptJunctureData pCtx = new ScriptJunctureData;
7762 pCtx.Write(state);
7763
7764 SendSyncJuncture(DayZPlayerSyncJunctures.SJ_WEAPON_LIFT, pCtx);
7765
7766 return true;
7767 }
7768
7769 void SetLiftWeapon(int pJunctureID, ParamsReadContext ctx)
7770 {
7771 bool state;
7772 ctx.Read(state);
7773
7774 m_ProcessLiftWeaponState = state;
7775 m_ProcessLiftWeapon = true;
7776
7777 //Print("SetLiftWeapon | STS: " + GetSimulationTimeStamp());
7778 }
7779
7781 void SendLiftWeaponSync(bool state)
7782 {
7783 HumanCommandWeapons hcw;
7784 //SP version
7785 if (!GetGame().IsMultiplayer())
7786 {
7787 m_LiftWeapon_player = state;
7788
7789 hcw = GetCommandModifier_Weapons();
7790 if( hcw )
7791 hcw.LiftWeapon(state);
7792
7793 GetWeaponManager().OnLiftWeapon();
7794
7795 return;
7796 }
7797
7798 ScriptInputUserData ctx = new ScriptInputUserData;
7799
7800 if (GetGame().IsMultiplayer() && GetGame().IsClient() && !ctx.CanStoreInputUserData())
7801 {
7802 //Print("ctx unavailable");
7803 return;
7804 }
7805 else if (GetGame().IsMultiplayer() && GetGame().IsClient() && ctx.CanStoreInputUserData())
7806 {
7807 //Print("sending ECB cancel request");
7808 ctx.Write(INPUT_UDT_WEAPON_LIFT_EVENT);
7809 ctx.Write(state);
7810 ctx.Send();
7811 }
7812 }
7813
7814 override void CheckLiftWeapon()
7815 {
7816 // lift weapon check
7817 if ( GetInstanceType() == DayZPlayerInstanceType.INSTANCETYPE_CLIENT /*GetGame().IsClient()*/)
7818 {
7819 Weapon_Base weap;
7820 if ( Weapon_Base.CastTo(weap, GetItemInHands()) )
7821 {
7822 bool limited = weap.LiftWeaponCheck(this);
7823
7824 if (limited && !m_LiftWeapon_player)
7825 SendLiftWeaponSync(true);
7826 else if (!limited && m_LiftWeapon_player)
7827 SendLiftWeaponSync(false);
7828 }
7829 else if (m_LiftWeapon_player)
7830 {
7831 SendLiftWeaponSync(false);
7832 }
7833 }
7834 }
7835
7836 override void ProcessLiftWeapon()
7837 {
7838 if (m_ProcessLiftWeapon)
7839 {
7840 HumanCommandWeapons hcw = GetCommandModifier_Weapons();
7841 if( hcw )
7842 hcw.LiftWeapon(m_ProcessLiftWeaponState);
7843
7844 GetWeaponManager().OnLiftWeapon();
7845 m_LiftWeapon_player = m_ProcessLiftWeaponState;
7846 m_ProcessLiftWeapon = false;
7847
7848 //Debug.Log("SimulationStamp_server: " + this.GetSimulationTimeStamp());
7849 }
7850 }
7851
7852 override void HideClothing(ItemOptics optic, bool state)
7853 {
7854 super.HideClothing(optic, state);
7855 array<int> clothingArray = new array<int>;
7856 Clothing clothes;
7857
7858 if (state && DayZPlayerCameraOptics.Cast(m_CurrentCamera))
7859 {
7860 if (GetInstanceType() == DayZPlayerInstanceType.INSTANCETYPE_CLIENT)
7861 {
7862 clothingArray.Insert(InventorySlots.BACK);
7863 clothingArray.Insert(InventorySlots.SHOULDER);
7864 clothingArray.Insert(InventorySlots.MELEE);
7865 if(optic.GetCurrentStepFOV() < GameConstants.DZPLAYER_CAMERA_FOV_IRONSIGHTS/*0.5*/ )
7866 {
7867 clothingArray.Insert(InventorySlots.BODY);
7868 clothingArray.Insert(InventorySlots.VEST);
7869 }
7870
7871 SetInvisibleRecursive(true,this,clothingArray);
7872 }
7873 }
7874 //showing should be instant (called directly, not via CallLater)
7875 else
7876 {
7877 if (GetInstanceType() == DayZPlayerInstanceType.INSTANCETYPE_CLIENT)
7878 {
7879 /*for(int i = 0; i < GetInventory().AttachmentCount(); i++)
7880 {
7881 Print("attachment slot ID: " + GetInventory().GetAttachmentSlotId(i));
7882 clothingArray.Insert(GetInventory().GetAttachmentSlotId(i));
7883 }*/
7884 clothingArray = {InventorySlots.BACK,InventorySlots.BODY,InventorySlots.VEST,InventorySlots.SHOULDER,InventorySlots.MELEE};
7885
7886 SetInvisibleRecursive(false,this,clothingArray);
7887 }
7888 }
7889 }
7890
7891 void RequestUnconsciousness(bool enable)
7892 {
7893 DayZPlayerSyncJunctures.SendPlayerUnconsciousness(this, enable);
7894 }
7895
7896 override void SetDeathDarknessLevel(float duration, float tick_time)
7897 {
7898 //super.SetDeathDarknessLevel(duration, tick_time);
7899
7900 float actual_tick = tick_time;
7901 if (GetDamageDealtEffect())
7902 m_DamageDealtEffect = null;
7903
7904 if (GetFlashbangEffect())
7905 m_FlashbangEffect = null;
7906
7907 float percentage;
7908 if ( duration > 0 )
7909 percentage = 1 - ( (duration - m_DeathDarkeningCurrentTime) / duration );
7910
7911 m_DeathDarkeningCurrentTime += actual_tick;
7912
7913 if (!GetDamageDealtEffect() && !IsAlive())
7914 {
7915 m_DeathDarkeningParam.param1 = percentage;
7916 PPERequesterBank.GetRequester(PPERequester_DeathDarkening).Start(m_DeathDarkeningParam);
7917 }
7918
7919 if ( m_DeathDarkeningCurrentTime >= duration && m_DeathEffectTimer )
7920 {
7921 m_DeathEffectTimer.Stop();
7922 m_DeathDarkeningParam.param1 = 1.0;
7923 PPERequesterBank.GetRequester(PPERequester_DeathDarkening).Start(m_DeathDarkeningParam);
7924 }
7925 }
7926
7927 override bool IsInFBEmoteState()
7928 {
7929 if (!IsEmotePlaying())
7930 return false;
7931 if ( (m_EmoteManager.m_Callback && m_EmoteManager.m_Callback.m_IsFullbody) || m_EmoteManager.m_IsSurrendered )
7932 {
7933 return true;
7934 }
7935 return false;
7936 }
7937
7939 void EndSurrenderRequest(SurrenderData data = null)
7940 {
7941 if (m_EmoteManager)
7942 m_EmoteManager.EndSurrenderRequest(data);
7943 }
7944
7945 bool IsSurrendered()
7946 {
7947 if (m_EmoteManager)
7948 return m_EmoteManager.m_IsSurrendered;
7949
7950 return false;
7951 }
7952
7953 bool IsPlayerLoaded()
7954 {
7955 return m_PlayerLoaded;
7956 }
7957
7958 //disconnected, caused problems. Awaiting refactor
7959 override void CheckAnimationOverrides()
7960 {
7961 //FB gesture slideposeangle override
7962 if (IsInFBEmoteState() && IsControlledPlayer() && IsPlayerSelected())
7963 {
7964 OverrideSlidePoseAngle(Math.PI2);
7965 }
7966 else if (!IsInFBEmoteState() && IsControlledPlayer() && IsPlayerSelected())
7967 {
7968 OverrideSlidePoseAngle(m_OriginalSlidePoseAngle);
7969 }
7970
7971 //+add more, if needed
7972 }
7973
7974 /*void OnSurrenderEnd()
7975 {
7976 }*/
7977
7978 bool CanRedirectToWeaponManager (notnull EntityAI item, out bool isActionPossible)
7979 {
7980 isActionPossible = false;
7981 Magazine mag = Magazine.Cast(item);
7982 Weapon_Base wpn = Weapon_Base.Cast(item.GetHierarchyParent());
7983 if (mag && wpn)
7984 {
7985 if (GetWeaponManager().CanDetachMagazine(wpn, mag))
7986 {
7987 //Print("[inv] PlayerBase.CanRedirectToWeaponManager OK, can detach mag=" + mag + " from wpn=" + wpn);
7988 isActionPossible = true;
7989 }
7990 else
7991 {
7992 //Print("[inv] PlayerBase.CanRedirectToWeaponManager cannot detach mag=" + mag + " from wpn=" + wpn);
7993 }
7994 return true;
7995 }
7996 return false;
7997 }
7998
7999 // Inventory actions with redirection to weapon manager
8000 override bool PredictiveTakeEntityToTargetInventory (notnull EntityAI target, FindInventoryLocationType flags, notnull EntityAI item)
8001 {
8002 bool can_detach;
8003 if (CanRedirectToWeaponManager(item,can_detach))
8004 {
8005 InventoryLocation il = new InventoryLocation();
8006 if (can_detach && target.GetInventory().FindFreeLocationFor(item, flags, il))
8007 {
8008 return GetWeaponManager().DetachMagazine(il);
8009 }
8010 return false;
8011 }
8012 return super.PredictiveTakeEntityToTargetInventory(target, flags, item);
8013 }
8014
8015 override bool PredictiveTakeEntityToInventory (FindInventoryLocationType flags, notnull EntityAI item)
8016 {
8017 bool can_detach;
8018 if (CanRedirectToWeaponManager(item,can_detach))
8019 {
8020 InventoryLocation il = new InventoryLocation();
8021 if (can_detach && GetInventory().FindFreeLocationFor(item, flags, il))
8022 {
8023 return GetWeaponManager().DetachMagazine(il);
8024 }
8025 return false;
8026 }
8027 return super.PredictiveTakeEntityToInventory(flags, item);
8028 }
8029
8030 override bool PredictiveTakeEntityToTargetAttachment (notnull EntityAI target, notnull EntityAI item)
8031 {
8032 Weapon_Base parentWpn = Weapon_Base.Cast(target);
8033 Magazine mag = Magazine.Cast(item);
8034 if (parentWpn && mag)
8035 {
8036 if( GetWeaponManager().CanAttachMagazine(parentWpn, mag) )
8037 return GetWeaponManager().AttachMagazine(mag);
8038
8039 return false;
8040 }
8041 return super.PredictiveTakeEntityToTargetAttachment(target, item);
8042 }
8043
8044 override bool PredictiveTakeEntityToTargetAttachmentEx (notnull EntityAI target, notnull EntityAI item, int slot)
8045 {
8046 Weapon_Base parentWpn = Weapon_Base.Cast(target);
8047 Magazine mag = Magazine.Cast(item);
8048 if (parentWpn && mag)
8049 {
8050 if( target.CanReceiveAttachment(item,slot) && GetWeaponManager().CanAttachMagazine(parentWpn, mag) )
8051 return GetWeaponManager().AttachMagazine(mag);
8052
8053 return false;
8054 }
8055 return super.PredictiveTakeEntityToTargetAttachmentEx(target, item,slot);
8056 }
8057
8058 override bool PredictiveTakeEntityToTargetCargo (notnull EntityAI target, notnull EntityAI item)
8059 {
8060 bool can_detach;
8061 if (CanRedirectToWeaponManager(item,can_detach))
8062 {
8063 InventoryLocation il = new InventoryLocation();
8064 if (can_detach && target.GetInventory().FindFreeLocationFor(item, FindInventoryLocationType.CARGO, il))
8065 {
8066 return GetWeaponManager().DetachMagazine(il);
8067 }
8068 return false;
8069 }
8070 return super.PredictiveTakeEntityToTargetCargo(target,item);
8071 }
8072
8073 override bool PredictiveTakeEntityToTargetCargoEx (notnull CargoBase cargo, notnull EntityAI item, int row, int col)
8074 {
8075 bool can_detach;
8076 if (CanRedirectToWeaponManager(item, can_detach))
8077 {
8078 if (can_detach)
8079 {
8080 InventoryLocation dst = new InventoryLocation;
8081 dst.SetCargoAuto(cargo, item, row, col, item.GetInventory().GetFlipCargo());
8082
8083 return GetWeaponManager().DetachMagazine(dst);
8084 }
8085 return false;
8086 }
8087 return super.PredictiveTakeEntityToTargetCargoEx (cargo, item, row, col);
8088 }
8089
8090 override bool PredictiveDropEntity (notnull EntityAI item)
8091 {
8092 bool can_detach;
8093 if (CanRedirectToWeaponManager(item,can_detach))
8094 {
8095 if (can_detach)
8096 {
8097 vector m4[4];
8098 Math3D.MatrixIdentity4(m4);
8099 GameInventory.PrepareDropEntityPos(this, item, m4);
8100 InventoryLocation il = new InventoryLocation;
8101 il.SetGround(item, m4);
8102 return GetWeaponManager().DetachMagazine(il);
8103 }
8104 return false;
8105 }
8106 return super.PredictiveDropEntity(item);
8107 }
8108
8109 override bool PredictiveSwapEntities (notnull EntityAI item1, notnull EntityAI item2)
8110 {
8111 ForceStandUpForHeavyItemsSwap(item1, item2);
8112 //Print("PlayerBase | PredictiveSwapEntities");
8113 Magazine swapmag1 = Magazine.Cast(item1);
8114 Magazine swapmag2 = Magazine.Cast(item2);
8115
8116 if (swapmag1 && swapmag2)
8117 {
8118 Weapon_Base parentWpn;
8119
8120 if (Class.CastTo(parentWpn, swapmag1.GetHierarchyParent()))
8121 {
8122 if (GetWeaponManager().CanSwapMagazine(parentWpn, swapmag2) )
8123 {
8124 Print("[inv] PlayerBase.PredictiveSwapEntities: swapping mag1=" + swapmag1 + " to parent wpn=" + parentWpn + " of mag1=" + swapmag1);
8125 return GetWeaponManager().SwapMagazine(swapmag2);
8126 }
8127 else
8128 {
8129 Print("[inv] PlayerBase.PredictiveSwapEntities: can not swap magazines");
8130 return false;
8131 }
8132 }
8133
8134 if (Class.CastTo(parentWpn, swapmag2.GetHierarchyParent()))
8135 {
8136 if (GetWeaponManager().CanSwapMagazine(parentWpn, swapmag1) )
8137 {
8138 Print("[inv] PlayerBase.PredictiveSwapEntities: swapping mag1=" + swapmag1 + " to parent wpn=" + parentWpn + " of mag2=" + swapmag2);
8139 return GetWeaponManager().SwapMagazine(swapmag1);
8140 }
8141 else
8142 {
8143 Print("[inv] PlayerBase.PredictiveSwapEntities: can not swap magazines");
8144 return false;
8145 }
8146 }
8147 }
8148
8149 EntityAI item_hands;
8150 EntityAI item_ground;
8151 if ( IsSwapBetweenHandsAndGroundLargeItem(item1,item2,item_hands,item_ground) && !m_ActionManager.GetRunningAction() )
8152 {
8153 ActionManagerClient mngr_client;
8154 CastTo(mngr_client,m_ActionManager);
8155
8156 ActionTarget atrg = new ActionTarget(item_ground,null,-1,vector.Zero,-1.0);
8157 if ( mngr_client.GetAction(ActionSwapItemToHands).Can(this,atrg,ItemBase.Cast(item_hands)) )
8158 {
8159 mngr_client.PerformActionStart(mngr_client.GetAction(ActionSwapItemToHands),atrg,ItemBase.Cast(item_hands));
8160 return true;
8161 }
8162 return super.PredictiveSwapEntities( item1, item2);
8163 }
8164 else
8165 return super.PredictiveSwapEntities( item1, item2);
8166 }
8167
8168 override bool PredictiveForceSwapEntities (notnull EntityAI item1, notnull EntityAI item2, notnull InventoryLocation item2_dst)
8169 {
8170 ForceStandUpForHeavyItemsSwap(item1, item2);
8171
8172 InventoryLocation il = new InventoryLocation;
8173 if ( item1.IsHeavyBehaviour() && item1.GetInventory().GetCurrentInventoryLocation(il) && il.GetType() == InventoryLocationType.GROUND && !m_ActionManager.GetRunningAction() )
8174 {
8175 //Print("override bool PredictiveForceSwapEntities (notnull EntityAI item1, notnull EntityAI item2, notnull InventoryLocation item2_dst)");
8176 ActionManagerClient mngr_client;
8177 CastTo(mngr_client,m_ActionManager);
8178
8179 ActionTarget atrg = new ActionTarget(item1,null,-1,vector.Zero,-1.0);
8180 if ( mngr_client.GetAction(ActionSwapItemToHands).Can(this,atrg,ItemBase.Cast(item2)) )
8181 {
8182 mngr_client.PerformActionStart(mngr_client.GetAction(ActionSwapItemToHands),atrg,ItemBase.Cast(item2));
8183 }
8184 return true;
8185 }
8186 else
8187 return super.PredictiveForceSwapEntities( item1, item2, item2_dst );
8188 }
8189
8190 override void PredictiveTakeEntityToHands(EntityAI item)
8191 {
8192 if ( item.IsHeavyBehaviour() && !m_ActionManager.GetRunningAction() && !item.GetHierarchyParent() )
8193 {
8194 ActionManagerClient mngr_client;
8195 if (CastTo(mngr_client,m_ActionManager))
8196 {
8197 ActionTarget atrg = new ActionTarget(item,null,-1,vector.Zero,-1.0);
8198
8199 if ( mngr_client.GetAction(ActionTakeItemToHands).Can(this,atrg,null) )
8200 {
8201 mngr_client.PerformActionStart(mngr_client.GetAction(ActionTakeItemToHands),atrg,null);
8202 }
8203 /*).Can(this,
8204 mngr_client.ActionStart(mngr_client.GetAction(ActionTakeItemToHands),mngr_client.FindActionTarget(),null);
8205 return;*/
8206 }
8207 }
8208 else
8209 super.PredictiveTakeEntityToHands(item);
8210 }
8211
8212 override bool PredictiveTakeToDst (notnull InventoryLocation src, notnull InventoryLocation dst)
8213 {
8214 EntityAI item = src.GetItem();
8215 if(item)
8216 {
8217 bool can_detach;
8218
8219 if (CanRedirectToWeaponManager(item,can_detach))
8220 {
8221 if (can_detach)
8222 {
8223 return GetWeaponManager().DetachMagazine(dst);
8224 }
8225 return false;
8226 }
8227 return super.PredictiveTakeToDst(src,dst);
8228 }
8229 return false;
8230 }
8231
8232 bool IsSwapBetweenHandsAndGroundLargeItem(notnull EntityAI item1, notnull EntityAI item2, out EntityAI item_hands, out EntityAI item_ground)
8233 {
8234 InventoryLocation il = new InventoryLocation;
8235 if (item1.GetInventory().GetCurrentInventoryLocation(il) && il.GetType() == InventoryLocationType.HANDS)
8236 item_hands = item1;
8237 if (item2.GetInventory().GetCurrentInventoryLocation(il) && il.GetType() == InventoryLocationType.HANDS)
8238 item_hands = item2;
8239 if (item1.GetInventory().GetCurrentInventoryLocation(il) && il.GetType() == InventoryLocationType.GROUND)
8240 item_ground = item1;
8241 if (item2.GetInventory().GetCurrentInventoryLocation(il) && il.GetType() == InventoryLocationType.GROUND)
8242 item_ground = item2;
8243
8244 return item_hands && item_ground && item_ground.IsHeavyBehaviour();
8245 }
8246
8248 void SetHairLevelToHide(int level, bool state, bool was_debug = false)
8249 {
8250 if (was_debug && GetInstanceType() != DayZPlayerInstanceType.INSTANCETYPE_CLIENT)
8251 return;
8252
8253 if (!m_CharactersHead)
8254 {
8255 ErrorEx("No valid head detected on character!");
8256 return;
8257 }
8258
8259 if (level == -1) //hide/show ALL
8260 {
8261 m_HideHairAnimated = !m_HideHairAnimated;
8262 for (int i = 0; i < m_CharactersHead.m_HeadHairSelectionArray.Count(); i++)
8263 {
8264 //m_CharactersHead.SetSimpleHiddenSelectionState(i,m_HideHairAnimated);
8265 SelectionTranslation stt = SelectionTranslation.Cast(m_CharactersHead.m_HeadHairHidingStateMap.Get(i));
8266 stt.SetSelectionState(m_HideHairAnimated);
8267 m_CharactersHead.m_HeadHairHidingStateMap.Set(i,stt);
8268#ifdef DEVELOPER
8269 if ( !GetGame().IsDedicatedServer() )
8270 {
8271 PluginDiagMenu diagmenu = PluginDiagMenu.Cast(GetPlugin(PluginDiagMenu));
8272 diagmenu.m_HairHidingStateMap.Set(i,m_HideHairAnimated);
8273 }
8274#endif
8275 }
8276 return;
8277 }
8278 else //hide/show selected level only
8279 {
8280 bool switchState;
8281 if (was_debug)
8282 {
8283#ifdef DEVELOPER
8284 if ( !GetGame().IsDedicatedServer() )
8285 {
8286 PluginDiagMenu diagmenuu = PluginDiagMenu.Cast(GetPlugin(PluginDiagMenu));
8287 switchState = !diagmenuu.m_HairHidingStateMap.Get(level);
8288 diagmenuu.m_HairHidingStateMap.Set(level, switchState);
8289 }
8290#endif
8291 }
8292 else
8293 {
8294 switchState = !state;
8295 }
8296 //m_CharactersHead.SetSimpleHiddenSelectionState(level,switchState);
8297 stt = SelectionTranslation.Cast(m_CharactersHead.m_HeadHairHidingStateMap.Get(level));
8298 stt.SetSelectionState(switchState);
8299 m_CharactersHead.m_HeadHairHidingStateMap.Set(level,stt); //nescessary?
8300 }
8301 }
8302
8303 void HideHairSelections(ItemBase item, bool state)
8304 {
8305 if ( !item || !item.GetHeadHidingSelection() || !m_CharactersHead)
8306 return;
8307
8308 int slot_id; //item currently attached (or detaching from) here
8309 string slot_name; //item currently attached (or detaching from) here
8310 string str
8311 int idx;
8312 int i;
8313 item.GetInventory().GetCurrentAttachmentSlotInfo(slot_id,slot_name);
8314
8315 if (item.HidesSelectionBySlot())
8316 {
8317 for (i = 0; i < item.GetInventory().GetSlotIdCount(); i++)
8318 {
8319 if (item.GetInventory().GetSlotId(i) == slot_id)
8320 {
8321 str = item.GetHeadHidingSelection().Get(i);
8322 idx = m_CharactersHead.m_HeadHairSelectionArray.Find(str);
8323 SetHairLevelToHide(idx,state);
8324 }
8325 }
8326 }
8327 else
8328 {
8329 for (i = 0; i < item.GetHeadHidingSelection().Count(); i++)
8330 {
8331 str = item.GetHeadHidingSelection().Get(i);
8332 idx = m_CharactersHead.m_HeadHairSelectionArray.Find(str);
8333 SetHairLevelToHide(idx,state);
8334 }
8335 }
8336 UpdateHairSelectionVisibility();
8337 }
8338
8339 void UpdateHairSelectionVisibility(bool was_debug = false)
8340 {
8341 if (!m_CharactersHead)
8342 return;
8343 bool shown;
8344 bool exception_hidden = false;
8345 int i;
8346 SelectionTranslation stt;
8347
8348 //hide/show beard
8349 if ( IsMale() && m_CharactersHead.GetBeardIndex() > -1 && !was_debug )
8350 {
8351 SetHairLevelToHide(m_CharactersHead.GetBeardIndex(),GetLifeSpanState() != LifeSpanState.BEARD_EXTRA);
8352 }
8353
8354 //show all first
8355 for (i = 0; i < m_CharactersHead.m_HeadHairHidingStateMap.Count(); i++)
8356 {
8357 m_CharactersHead.SetSimpleHiddenSelectionState(i,true);
8358 }
8359 //then carve it up
8360 for (i = 0; i < m_CharactersHead.m_HeadHairHidingStateMap.Count(); i++)
8361 {
8362 stt = m_CharactersHead.m_HeadHairHidingStateMap.Get(i);
8363 shown = stt.GetSelectionState();
8364 if (!shown)
8365 {
8366 if ( /*IsMale() && */!m_CharactersHead.IsHandlingException() )
8367 {
8368 m_CharactersHead.SetSimpleHiddenSelectionState(i,shown);
8369 UpdateTranslatedSelections(stt);
8370 //Print("hidden idx: " + i);
8371 }
8372 else
8373 {
8374 exception_hidden = true;
8375 }
8376 }
8377 }
8378
8379 //exceptions handled differently; hides hair
8380 if ( exception_hidden )
8381 {
8382 m_CharactersHead.SetSimpleHiddenSelectionState(m_CharactersHead.GetHairIndex(),false);
8383 if ( IsMale() )
8384 m_CharactersHead.SetSimpleHiddenSelectionState(m_CharactersHead.GetBeardIndex(),false);
8385 }
8386 }
8387
8388 void UpdateTranslatedSelections(SelectionTranslation stt)
8389 {
8390 int index;
8391 array<int> translatedSelectinosArray = stt.GetTranslatedSelections();
8392 for (int i = 0; i < translatedSelectinosArray.Count(); i++)
8393 {
8394 index = translatedSelectinosArray.Get(i);
8395 //if (index > -1)
8396 m_CharactersHead.SetSimpleHiddenSelectionState(index,false); //safe this way, only hiding/carving from shown parts
8397 }
8398 }
8399
8401 void CheckHairClippingOnCharacterLoad()
8402 {
8403 ItemBase headgear = ItemBase.Cast(GetInventory().FindAttachment(InventorySlots.HEADGEAR));
8404 ItemBase mask = ItemBase.Cast(GetInventory().FindAttachment(InventorySlots.MASK));
8405
8406 HideHairSelections(headgear,true);
8407 HideHairSelections(mask,true);
8408 }
8409
8410 bool IsNVGWorking()
8411 {
8412 return m_ActiveNVTypes && m_ActiveNVTypes.Count() > 0;
8413 }
8414
8415 bool IsNVGLowered()
8416 {
8417 return m_LoweredNVGHeadset;
8418 }
8419
8420 int GetNVType()
8421 {
8422 if (!m_ActiveNVTypes || m_ActiveNVTypes.Count() == 0)
8423 {
8424 return NVTypes.NONE;
8425 }
8426 else
8427 {
8428 return m_ActiveNVTypes[m_ActiveNVTypes.Count() - 1];
8429 }
8430 }
8431
8432 array<int> GetNVTypesArray()
8433 {
8434 return m_ActiveNVTypes;
8435 }
8436
8438 void SetNVGWorking(bool state)
8439 {
8440 //Deprecated, below is for legacy's sake
8441 AddActiveNV(NVTypes.NV_GOGGLES);
8442 }
8443
8444 void SetNVGLowered(bool state)
8445 {
8446 m_LoweredNVGHeadset = state;
8447 }
8448
8449 void AddActiveNV(int type)
8450 {
8451 if ( !m_ActiveNVTypes || (GetGame().IsMultiplayer() && GetGame().IsServer()) )
8452 {
8453 #ifdef DEVELOPER
8454 Error("AddActiveNV | illegal server-side call!");
8455 #endif
8456
8457 return;
8458 }
8459
8460 if ( m_ActiveNVTypes.Find(type) == -1 ) //TODO - set instead?
8461 m_ActiveNVTypes.Insert(type);
8462 }
8463
8464 void RemoveActiveNV(int type)
8465 {
8466 if ( !m_ActiveNVTypes || (GetGame().IsMultiplayer() && GetGame().IsServer()) )
8467 {
8468 #ifdef DEVELOPER
8469 Error("RemoveActiveNV | illegal server-side call!");
8470 #endif
8471
8472 return;
8473 }
8474
8475 if ( m_ActiveNVTypes.Find(type) != -1 ) //TODO - set instead?
8476 m_ActiveNVTypes.RemoveItem(type);
8477 }
8478
8479 void ResetActiveNV()
8480 {
8481 m_ActiveNVTypes.Clear();
8482 }
8483
8484#ifdef DEVELOPER
8485 void DEBUGRotateNVG()
8486 {
8487 NVGoggles nvg;
8488
8489 if ( FindAttachmentBySlotName("Eyewear") )
8490 {
8491 nvg = NVGoggles.Cast(FindAttachmentBySlotName("Eyewear").FindAttachmentBySlotName("NVG"));
8492 }
8493 else if ( FindAttachmentBySlotName("Headgear") )
8494 {
8495 nvg = NVGoggles.Cast(FindAttachmentBySlotName("Headgear").FindAttachmentBySlotName("NVG"));
8496 }
8497
8498 if ( nvg )
8499 {
8500 nvg.RotateGoggles(nvg.m_IsLowered);
8501 }
8502 }
8503#endif
8504
8505 void AdjustBandana(EntityAI item, string slot_name)
8506 {
8507 if (Bandana_ColorBase.Cast(item))
8508 {
8509 if (slot_name == "Headgear")
8510 {
8511 item.SetSimpleHiddenSelectionState(0,1);
8512 item.SetSimpleHiddenSelectionState(1,0);
8513 }
8514 else if (slot_name == "Mask")
8515 {
8516 item.SetSimpleHiddenSelectionState(0,0);
8517 item.SetSimpleHiddenSelectionState(1,1);
8518 }
8519 }
8520 }
8521
8522 //client-side
8523 void UpdateCorpseStateVisual()
8524 {
8525 //Print("---Prettying up corpses... | " + GetGame().GetTime() + " | " + this + " | " + GetType() + "---");
8526 //Print("m_DecayedTexture = " + m_DecayedTexture);
8527 int state = Math.AbsInt(m_CorpseState);//negative sign denotes a special meaning(state was forced to a live player), but we are only intetested in the positive value here
8528 if( state == PlayerConstants.CORPSE_STATE_DECAYED )
8529 {
8530 EntityAI bodypart;
8531 ItemBase item;
8532
8533 string path;
8534 int idx;
8535 int slot_id;
8536 array<string> bodyparts = {"Gloves","Body","Legs","Feet"};
8537
8538 for (int i = 0; i < bodyparts.Count(); i++)
8539 {
8540 slot_id = InventorySlots.GetSlotIdFromString(bodyparts.Get(i));
8541 bodypart = GetInventory().FindPlaceholderForSlot( slot_id );
8542 item = ItemBase.Cast(GetInventory().FindAttachment( slot_id ));
8543
8544 if( bodypart )
8545 {
8546 path = "cfgVehicles " + bodypart.GetType();
8547 idx = bodypart.GetHiddenSelectionIndex("personality");
8548 if( idx > -1 )
8549 {
8550 bodypart.SetObjectTexture(idx,m_DecayedTexture);
8551 }
8552 }
8553 if( item )
8554 {
8555 path = "cfgVehicles " + item.GetType();
8556 idx = item.GetHiddenSelectionIndex("personality");
8557 if( idx > -1 )
8558 {
8559 item.SetObjectTexture(idx,m_DecayedTexture);
8560 }
8561 }
8562 }
8563
8564 SetFaceTexture(m_DecayedTexture);
8565 }
8566 }
8567
8568 void SetDecayEffects(int effect = -1)
8569 {
8570 int boneIdx = GetBoneIndexByName("Spine2");
8571 Particle p;
8572
8573 switch (effect)
8574 {
8575 case PlayerConstants.CORPSE_STATE_MEDIUM :
8576 //play medium sound/flies particle
8577 if (!m_FliesEff)
8578 m_FliesEff = new EffSwarmingFlies();
8579
8580 if ( m_FliesEff && !SEffectManager.IsEffectExist(m_FliesIndex) )
8581 {
8582 m_FliesEff.SetDecalOwner( this );
8583 m_FliesIndex = SEffectManager.PlayOnObject(m_FliesEff, this, "0 0.25 0");
8584 p = m_FliesEff.GetParticle();
8585 AddChild(p, boneIdx);
8586 if ( !m_SoundFliesEffect )
8587 {
8588 PlaySoundSetLoop(m_SoundFliesEffect, "Flies_SoundSet", 1.0, 1.0);
8589// ErrorEx("DbgFlies | CORPSE_STATE_MEDIUM | m_SoundFliesEffect created! " + m_SoundFliesEffect,ErrorExSeverity.INFO );
8590 }
8591 }
8592 break;
8593 case PlayerConstants.CORPSE_STATE_DECAYED :
8594 //play serious sound/flies particle
8595 if ( !m_FliesEff )
8596 m_FliesEff = new EffSwarmingFlies();
8597
8598 if ( m_FliesEff && !SEffectManager.IsEffectExist(m_FliesIndex) )
8599 {
8600 m_FliesEff.SetDecalOwner( this );
8601 m_FliesIndex = SEffectManager.PlayOnObject(m_FliesEff, this, "0 0.25 0");
8602 p = m_FliesEff.GetParticle();
8603 AddChild(p, boneIdx);
8604 if ( !m_SoundFliesEffect )
8605 {
8606 PlaySoundSetLoop(m_SoundFliesEffect, "Flies_SoundSet", 1.0, 1.0);
8607// ErrorEx("DbgFlies | CORPSE_STATE_DECAYED | m_SoundFliesEffect created! " + m_SoundFliesEffect,ErrorExSeverity.INFO );
8608 }
8609 }
8610 break;
8611 //remove
8612 default:
8613 SEffectManager.DestroyEffect( m_FliesEff );
8614// ErrorEx("DbgFlies | StopSoundSet | exit 3 ",ErrorExSeverity.INFO );
8615 StopSoundSet(m_SoundFliesEffect);
8616 break;
8617 }
8618 }
8619
8620 void PreloadDecayTexture()
8621 {
8622 int idx;
8623 int slot_id;
8624
8625 idx = GetHiddenSelectionIndex("decay_preload");
8626 if (idx > -1)
8627 {
8628 SetObjectTexture(idx,m_DecayedTexture);
8629 //Print("'decay_preload'" + m_DecayedTexture +" loaded on " + GetModelName());
8630 }
8631 else
8632 {
8633 //Print("No 'decay_preload' selection found on " + this);
8634 }
8635 }
8636
8637 void SetLastMapInfo(float scale, vector pos)
8638 {
8639 m_LastMapScale = scale;
8640 m_LastMapPos = pos;
8641 }
8642
8643 bool GetLastMapInfo(out float scale, out vector pos)
8644 {
8645 scale = m_LastMapScale;
8646 pos = m_LastMapPos;
8647
8648 return m_LastMapScale != -1.0;
8649 }
8650
8651 override bool PhysicalPredictiveDropItem(EntityAI entity, bool heavy_item_only = true)
8652 {
8653 vector dir;
8654 ItemBase item = ItemBase.Cast(entity);
8655
8656 if (GetItemInHands() == item) //from hands
8657 {
8658 //HOTFIX
8659 return PredictiveDropEntity(item);
8660
8661 if (entity.ConfigGetString("physLayer") != "item_large" && heavy_item_only)
8662 {
8663 return PredictiveDropEntity(item);
8664 }
8665 else
8666 {
8667 dir = GetOrientation();
8668 //item.m_ItemBeingDropped = true;
8669 return GetHumanInventory().ThrowEntity(item,dir,0);
8670 }
8671 }
8672 else //from anywhere else
8673 {
8674 ActionManagerClient mngr_client;
8675 if (CastTo(mngr_client,m_ActionManager))
8676 {
8677 ActionTarget atrg = new ActionTarget(null, null, -1, vector.Zero, -1);
8678 if ( mngr_client.GetAction(ActionDropItemSimple).Can(this,atrg,item) )
8679 {
8680 //Param1<bool> p1 = new Param1<bool>(false);
8681 //p1.param1 = heavy_item_only;
8682 mngr_client.PerformActionStart(mngr_client.GetAction(ActionDropItemSimple),atrg,item/*,p1*/);
8683 return true;
8684 }
8685 return false;
8686 }
8687 else
8688 return true;
8689 }
8690 }
8691
8692 override void SetProcessUIWarning(bool state)
8693 {
8694 m_ProcessUIWarning = state;
8695 }
8696
8697 void dmgDebugPrint(TotalDamageResult damageResult, int damageType, EntityAI source, int component, string dmgZone, string ammo, vector modelPos, float speedCoef)
8698 {
8699 /*Print("ProjectileDebugging | Damage Health: " + damageResult.GetDamage(dmgZone,"Health") + " | Component: " + component + " | Zone: " + dmgZone + "| Timestamp: " + GetSimulationTimeStamp());
8700 Print("ProjectileDebugging | speedCoef: " + speedCoef);
8701 Print("ProjectileDebugging | GetWorldTime(): " + GetWorldTime());
8702 Print("-----------------------------------------------");*/
8703 }
8704
8705 //Use this method to process additionnal dmg to legs specifically (must use the dmg system to fire relevant events)
8706 //Legzone is a dummy to inflict damage once and NOT transfer damage to other zones. All leg zones will drop to 0 anyway
8707 void DamageAllLegs(float inputDmg)
8708 {
8709 array<string> legZones = new array<string>;
8710 legZones.Insert("LeftLeg");
8711 legZones.Insert("RightLeg");
8712 legZones.Insert("RightFoot");
8713 legZones.Insert("LeftFoot");
8714
8715 for (int i = 0; i < legZones.Count(); i++)
8716 {
8717 DecreaseHealth(legZones[i],"",inputDmg);
8718 }
8719 }
8720
8722 void TryHideItemInHands(bool hide, bool force = false)
8723 {
8724 if ( !hide && ((!IsSwimming() && !IsClimbingLadder() && !IsInVehicle() && !AnimCommandCheck(HumanMoveCommandID.CommandSwim | HumanMoveCommandID.CommandLadder | HumanMoveCommandID.CommandVehicle)) || force) )
8725 {
8726 GetItemAccessor().HideItemInHands(false);
8727 }
8728 else
8729 {
8730 GetItemAccessor().HideItemInHands(true);
8731 }
8732 }
8733
8735 bool CheckAndExecuteStackSplit(FindInventoryLocationType flags, notnull EntityAI item, notnull EntityAI target)
8736 {
8737 float stackable = item.GetTargetQuantityMax();
8738 if ( !(stackable == 0 || stackable >= item.GetQuantity()) )
8739 {
8740 InventoryLocation il = new InventoryLocation;
8741 if ( target && target.GetInventory().FindFreeLocationFor( item, flags, il ) )
8742 {
8743 ItemBase itemB;
8744 if ( CastTo(itemB, item) )
8745 {
8746 itemB.SplitIntoStackMaxToInventoryLocationClient( il );
8747 return true;
8748 }
8749 }
8750 }
8751 return false;
8752 }
8753
8754 bool CheckAndExecuteStackSplitToInventoryLocation(InventoryLocation il, notnull EntityAI item)
8755 {
8756 float stackable = item.GetTargetQuantityMax();
8757 if ( !(stackable == 0 || stackable >= item.GetQuantity()) )
8758 {
8759 ItemBase itemB;
8760 if ( CastTo(itemB, item) )
8761 {
8762 itemB.SplitIntoStackMaxToInventoryLocationClient( il );
8763 return true;
8764 }
8765 }
8766 return false;
8767 }
8768
8769 override protected bool TakeEntityToInventoryImpl(InventoryMode mode, FindInventoryLocationType flags, notnull EntityAI item)
8770 {
8771 if ( CheckAndExecuteStackSplit(flags, item, this) )
8772 {
8773 syncDebugPrint("[inv] " + GetDebugName(this) + " STS=" + GetSimulationTimeStamp() + " Take2Inv(SPLIT) item=" + GetDebugName(item));
8774 return true;
8775 }
8776
8777 return super.TakeEntityToInventoryImpl(mode, flags, item);
8778 }
8779
8780 override protected bool TakeEntityToCargoImpl(InventoryMode mode, notnull EntityAI item)
8781 {
8782 if ( CheckAndExecuteStackSplit(FindInventoryLocationType.CARGO, item, this) )
8783 {
8784 syncDebugPrint("[inv] " + GetDebugName(this) + " STS=" + GetSimulationTimeStamp() + " Take2Cgo(SPLIT) item=" +GetDebugName(item));
8785 return true;
8786 }
8787
8788 return super.TakeEntityToCargoImpl(mode, item);
8789 }
8790
8791 override protected bool TakeEntityAsAttachmentImpl(InventoryMode mode, notnull EntityAI item)
8792 {
8793 if ( CheckAndExecuteStackSplit(FindInventoryLocationType.ATTACHMENT, item, this) )
8794 {
8795 syncDebugPrint("[inv] " + GetDebugName(this) + " STS=" + GetSimulationTimeStamp() + " Take2Att(SPLIT) item=" + GetDebugName(item));
8796 return true;
8797 }
8798
8799 return super.TakeEntityAsAttachmentImpl(mode, item);
8800 }
8801
8802 override void TakeEntityToHandsImpl(InventoryMode mode, EntityAI item)
8803 {
8804 if ( CheckAndExecuteStackSplit(FindInventoryLocationType.HANDS, item, this) )
8805 {
8806 syncDebugPrint("[inv] " + GetDebugName(this) + " STS=" + GetSimulationTimeStamp() + " Take2Hands(SPLIT) item=" + GetDebugName(item));
8807 return;
8808 }
8809
8810 super.TakeEntityToHandsImpl(mode, item);
8811 }
8812
8813 override protected bool TakeEntityToTargetInventoryImpl(InventoryMode mode, notnull EntityAI target, FindInventoryLocationType flags, notnull EntityAI item)
8814 {
8815 if ( CheckAndExecuteStackSplit(flags, item, target) )
8816 {
8817 syncDebugPrint("[inv] " + GetDebugName(this) + " STS=" + GetSimulationTimeStamp() + " Take2TargetInv(SPLIT) item=" + GetDebugName(item));
8818 return true;
8819 }
8820
8821 return super.TakeEntityToTargetInventoryImpl(mode, target, flags, item);
8822 }
8823
8824 override protected bool TakeEntityToTargetCargoImpl(InventoryMode mode, notnull EntityAI target, notnull EntityAI item)
8825 {
8826 if ( CheckAndExecuteStackSplit(FindInventoryLocationType.CARGO, item, target) )
8827 {
8828 syncDebugPrint("[inv] " + GetDebugName(this) + " STS=" + GetSimulationTimeStamp() + " Take2TargetCgo(SPLIT) item=" + GetDebugName(item));
8829 return true;
8830 }
8831
8832 return super.TakeEntityToTargetCargoImpl(mode, target, item);
8833 }
8834
8835 override protected bool TakeEntityToTargetAttachmentImpl(InventoryMode mode, notnull EntityAI target, notnull EntityAI item)
8836 {
8837 if ( CheckAndExecuteStackSplit(FindInventoryLocationType.ATTACHMENT, item, target) )
8838 {
8839 syncDebugPrint("[inv] " + GetDebugName(this) + " STS=" + GetSimulationTimeStamp() + " Take2TargetAtt(SPLIT) item=" + GetDebugName(item));
8840 return true;
8841 }
8842
8843 return super.TakeEntityToTargetAttachmentImpl(mode, target, item);
8844 }
8845
8846 override protected bool TakeToDstImpl(InventoryMode mode, notnull InventoryLocation src, notnull InventoryLocation dst)
8847 {
8848 if ( CheckAndExecuteStackSplitToInventoryLocation(dst, dst.GetItem()) )
8849 {
8850 syncDebugPrint("[inv] " + GetDebugName(this) + " STS=" + GetSimulationTimeStamp() + " Take2Dst(SPLIT) item=" + GetDebugName(dst.GetItem()));
8851 return true;
8852 }
8853
8854 return super.TakeToDstImpl(mode, src, dst);
8855 }
8856
8857 override vector GetCenter()
8858 {
8859 return GetBonePositionWS( GetBoneIndexByName( "spine3" ) );
8860 }
8861
8862
8863 // contaminated areas - temp stuff
8864 void ContaminatedParticleAdjustment()
8865 {
8866 if ( GetCommand_Move() && m_ContaminatedAroundPlayer && m_ContaminatedAroundPlayerTiny)
8867 {
8868 float playerSpeed = GetCommand_Move().GetCurrentMovementSpeed();
8869 //Print( playerSpeed );
8870
8871 // 1 - prone, crouch
8872 // 2 - jog
8873 // 3 - sprint
8874 float particleLifetime = 5.25;
8875 float particleSpeed = 0.25;
8876 if ( playerSpeed >= 1 )
8877 {
8878 particleLifetime = 3.5;
8879 particleSpeed = 3.25;
8880 }
8881 if ( playerSpeed >= 2 )
8882 {
8883 particleLifetime = 2.5;
8884 particleSpeed = 5.25;
8885 }
8886 if ( playerSpeed >= 3 )
8887 {
8888 particleLifetime = 1.5;
8889 particleSpeed = 8.25;
8890 }
8891 m_ContaminatedAroundPlayer.SetParameter( 0, EmitorParam.LIFETIME, particleLifetime );
8892 m_ContaminatedAroundPlayer.SetParameter( 1, EmitorParam.LIFETIME, particleLifetime );
8893 m_ContaminatedAroundPlayer.SetParameter( 2, EmitorParam.LIFETIME, particleLifetime );
8894 m_ContaminatedAroundPlayer.SetParameter( 3, EmitorParam.LIFETIME, particleLifetime );
8895
8896 m_ContaminatedAroundPlayerTiny.SetParameter( 0, EmitorParam.VELOCITY, particleSpeed );
8897 vector transform[4];
8898 GetTransform(transform);
8899 m_ContaminatedAroundPlayer.SetTransform(transform);
8900 m_ContaminatedAroundPlayerTiny.SetTransform(transform);
8901 }
8902 }
8903
8904 void HandleGlassesEffect()
8905 {
8906 if (!IsControlledPlayer())
8907 return;
8908 int i;
8909
8910 if (m_ProcessRemoveGlassesEffects)
8911 {
8912 for (i = 0; i < m_ProcessRemoveGlassesEffects.Count(); i++)
8913 {
8914 PPERequesterBank.GetRequester(m_ProcessRemoveGlassesEffects[i]).Stop();
8915 }
8916 m_ProcessRemoveGlassesEffects.Clear();
8917 }
8918
8919 if (m_ProcessAddGlassesEffects)
8920 {
8921 for (i = 0; i < m_ProcessAddGlassesEffects.Count(); i++)
8922 {
8923 PPERequesterBank.GetRequester(m_ProcessAddGlassesEffects[i]).Start();
8924 }
8925 m_ProcessAddGlassesEffects.Clear();
8926 }
8927 }
8928}
